description:
More. For your money.

OnePay is a financial technology company, not a bank. Banking services provided by Coastal Community Bank or Lead Bank, Members FDIC. The OnePay CashRewards Mastercard is issued by Synchrony Bank pursuant to a license from MastercardÂ® International Incorporated. OnePay Debit Card is issued by banking partners Coastal Community Bank or Lead Bank, Members FDIC, pursuant to a license by Mastercard International Incorporated. Mastercard and the circles design are registered trademarks of Mastercard International Incorporated.

To see terms and conditions relating to OnePay's products, visit www.onepay.com/terms

Eligible deposits requirement met when your OnePay Cash account either (i) receives Direct Deposits totaling $500+ in the current or previous month or (i) had a balance of $5,000+ at the end of the previous month.

â€¡ï»¿ï»¿ï»¿Cash back is earned as OnePay Points, redeemable into a OnePay Cash account or other available options. Only available to customers who unlock OnePay Cash+ with eligible deposits. Spend cap applies to your total spend across the cash back categories you selected during the month. See onepay.com/rewards-terms.

**Must be 18 or older. When on, Savings Backup will be used before Fee-Free Overdraft. Overdraft balance is due right away. Eligible transactions are at the discretion of OnePay and may exclude certain transactions (e.g., bill pay, global transfers). See details at onepay.com/overdraft-details.

+Based on a 12 month loan with $25 monthly payments and a 0% APR. You can choose how much youâ€™d like to pay towards your monthly payment, with a minimum of $1. If you choose an amount less than the full monthly payment, the remainder will be paid from the loan proceeds held in your Credit Builder lockbox. Use of the Credit Builder Program does not guarantee that your credit score will improve. Credit score improvement is dependent on your specific circumstances and a variety of factors, including your financial behavior. Failure to make monthly minimum payments on time may negatively impact your credit score. See onepay.com/legal/licenses.

â€ Cash back is earned as OnePay Points, redeemable as a deposit into a OnePay Cash account pursuant to the OnePay Rewards Terms. Individual reward details can be found in the OnePay app. 


âˆžSubject to credit approval. Cash back is earned as points on purchases made with your OnePay CashRewards Mastercard, which can be redeemed as a statement credit or as a deposit into a OnePay Cash account. 


ÊŒÊŒOffer is valid for new accounts only and may only be applied once. Cash back is earned as points, which can be redeemed as a statement credit or as a deposit into a OnePay Cash Account. See onepay.com/rewards-terms. for details. Limited time offer. We reserve the right to change or discontinue this offer at any time.

ÊŒDirect deposit required. Funds availability may vary depending on when your employer sends paycheck data.

++Currency exchange rates vary. 

Â© Copyright 2025 One Finance, Inc.

summary: Pay, bank & build credit.

scraped_reviews.content: I haven't been able to transfer money between internal accounts for about a week. When I contacted the support chat (the only way to get support) they kept blaming me and refused to submit a bug report for an hour. The same error shows up in web and mobile. The supervisor tried to end the chat early and I'm not sure they've still done anything about it. I have emailed them and received no reply. The error persists to this day.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Sincerest apologies. Can you please reach out to us at socialsupport@onepay.com and include the user name attached to your review? We'd like to look into this for you.

scraped_reviews.content: I like the app, and how I can add all my cards and transfer money to other accounts. However, the ATM page said that there would be no fee at a specific ATM. I used that ATM 4 times, because I thought there was no fee. Turns out that it's only fee free if you have One Plus. That information was extremely hard to find and they knew damn well I didn't have One Plus. I could've gone across the street to Walmart and it wouldn't been free. They refuse to refund!
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Sincerest apologies. Can you please reach out to us at socialsupport@one.app? We'd like to look into this for you.

scraped_reviews.content: It's easy to use for the most part. The one thing I would love changed is the showing of all accounts combined as one amount. If I put money into savings, I DO NOT want to see it. When the app is opened and the dashboard is showing, it combines all savings AND checking with one total and it makes me think that total is what I have in my checking. I do deliveries and get paid after each delivery so my account fluctuates so frequently, it's hard to just know what is in my account
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Weâ€™re going to continue to evolve One and the One app in the coming months. Thank you for the feedback here! We really appreciate it and will share with our team. In the meantime, please reach out to our Support team if you have any questions at socialsupport@one.app.

scraped_reviews.content: This app is only good to get instant pay from Spark, but otherwise, the actual "Bank" features are terrible. I've deposited checks, and they take very long to process. If you ever have to dispute a transaction, that's also a long process. I could only recommend this if it's the only option you have or if you are using it to get paid for your spark orders. Other than that, dont use ONE. Update: I deposited a check on a Tuesday, and it is now Monday, and it still hasn't gone through. Horrible.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Sincerest apologies. We'd like to know more about your experience with us. Please reach out to our team at socialsupport@one.app.

scraped_reviews.content: I used a different app to open a savings account, but it's handled over here unfortunately. They will not let me withdraw my money unless I send them a bank statement! Or use their debit card that I never had any interest in having! 0/10, not worth it, and I still don't have my money back! They have long wait times with no sound or notification from the website when you get connected, and they push you really hard to send a statement or use their debit card & then just disconnect suddenly! Scam.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Sincerest apologies! We would love to take a look at the issue. Please reach out to us at socialsupport@onepay.com and include the user name attached to your review so we can help. Thanks!

scraped_reviews.content: It is a good app to use...until you have to change your phone number. Then you won't have access to your balance. It's simple..cancel the old account and update with the new number. You will have to pay ATM fees to view balance or calll onepay everytime you want to keep up with your balance...and they will have an attitude when you do. Not recommended
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Sincerest apologies! We would love to take a look at the issue. Please reach out to us at socialsupport@onepay.com and include the user name attached to your review so we can help. Thanks!

scraped_reviews.content: It's a good app.I don't like the fact that I can only load so much money on there it really should be unlimited. Also, i've noticed that it's taking out a bigger amount to hold back a couple times when I pay a bill or something and that really messes me up and I don't know if im getting that money back or not it put me in the negative 175 dollars when I made a 280 phone bill payment an I had the money on there to make the payment
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Sincerest apologies! Thank you for sharing your thoughts here. We'd like to know more about your experience with us. Please reach out to us at socialsupport@onepay.com and include the user name attached to your review.

scraped_reviews.content: Nice user interface, too many steps to log on. It seems like an overkill to enter your mobile number, get the code to enter, enter a pass code, then enter via fingerprint. I also don't like that it isn't intuitive on the current balance. Sometimes it seems like pending payments are part of the balance, other times not. The layout of the app is good.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Sincerest apologies! Our support team would be happy to help! Please contact us at socialsupport@onepay.com and include the user name attached to your review so that we can assist further.

scraped_reviews.content: I have tried for over a month to link my bank account with my OnePay account. It has not worked. I got sent an email telling me to attach a pdf with my bank statements from OnePay customer service, so I did that, but my account was never linked... I'm not pleased with this app and I'd delete it if I didn't work at Walmart. Edit: They reached out roughly 20 minutes after my review. I emailed them and they linked my account just now. 3 Star only because of how long I've waited in total.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Sincerest apologies. Can you please reach out to us at socialsupport@onepay.com and include the user name attached to your review? We'd like to look into this for you.

scraped_reviews.content: Terrible. I got a new card to use for Walmart with this app. You can only have one physical card. They tell you to just use the virtual card instead if you need more than one. Problem is the virtual card doesn't work anywhere, keeps getting declined. I used the app to chat nothing they can do of course, told to call a number. Call the number and the robot says it's the wrong number for my account and hangs up. Chat in the app again and solution is to hope it starts working eventually.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Sincerest apologies! We would love to take a look at the issue. Please reach out to us at socialsupport@onepay.com and include the user name attached to your review so we can help. Thanks!

scraped_reviews.content: Really more like 41/2 stars. The chatbot helps a lot but you can get an agent fast if needed. They added the ability to get an advance which is a plus if they are primary bank. The usage of zelle is the only thing missing. Also the fee(s) transfering from your own bank accounts unless it is a Onepay account.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thanks so much for your review! We sincerely appreciate this feedback!

scraped_reviews.content: Hacked! Have had less than a week and they were affected by the Amazon server shutdown. I lost my funds that i added after they assured me they were safe. Do not use Walmart one pay banking!! Edit: horrific customer service experience when trying to close the account. I only wish I could post some of the screenshots of our conversation. In the end, i couldn't close the account but could only notify the CS agent that it would lie dormant, never to be used again by it's owner. DO NOT USE ONE PAY!!
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Sincerest apologies! We would love to take a look at the issue. Please reach out to us at socialsupport@onepay.com and include the user name attached to your review so we can help. Thanks!

scraped_reviews.content: More often than not I get the error "Your payment attempt could not be completed at this time" any time I try to add money to my One Pay account. This happens whether I try to transfer it straight from my linked bank account or through Google Pay. It is immensely frustrating and I am cancelling my account immediately. I do not recommend this app as it will cause you to pull your hair out every time you order groceries from Walmart.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Sincerest apologies! Our support team would be happy to help! Please contact us at socialsupport@onepay.com and include the user name attached to your review so that we can assist further.

scraped_reviews.content: One pay is really convenient for me because I shop a lot at Walmart and it gives me a percentage of my money back, which is great. It also gives me money back on other merchants, and on gas and things that are important! And it has everything I want in an app including a savings account, a credit builder, which I am currently using now, and much more!! It's my everything card!!ðŸ˜€
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thank you for your review! We're glad to hear you're enjoying OnePay! ðŸ’™

scraped_reviews.content: This is an excellent banking app, I have used a few, this one has all of the features I have been looking for. *2 days early pay with direct deposit, and it truly comes 2 days early! * deposit checks remotely. *Discounts with many companies. *Get cash back from many of the places I shop! There is much more, those are just a few examples!
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thanks so much for your review! We sincerely appreciate this feedback! ðŸ’™

scraped_reviews.content: Slooooow. It used to be decent enough, but in recent months has become ridiculously slow. It shouldn't take seconds to move between sections. I lack faith in their programmers and therefore their security practices(if you fail so bad at the basics, how can I trust you with the hard stuff?), so will limit my usage of this service.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Sincerest apologies! Our support team would be happy to help! Please contact us at socialsupport@onepay.com and include the user name attached to your review so that we can assist further.

scraped_reviews.content: I really like that there are no fees with this company. No monthly charge, and if you have direct deposits, the overdraft protection is a lifesaver. The bill pay is easy to use, and transferring money to other people and banks is quick and reliable, I never have to wait more than a day to see it reflected in the other accounts. Deposit/withdraw money at any Walmart, also free. It's super convenient! The app always works properly, and I love the colors and layout of everything.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thank you so much for your review and for being a part of OnePay!ðŸ’™

scraped_reviews.content: They steal your money! I wasn't paying enough attention one month and it seemed like I had less than I should skip next month I kept a close eye and $20 missing here, $10 missing there.. without being accounted for! Then, they refuse to do anything about it or refund it! Plus, I made a return at a store with my card and the refund was never credited. Onepay would not help, the store wouldn't help so I was just out $150 for nothing!
scraped_reviews.replyContent: We're sorry to hear that! We would love to take a look at this for you. Please reach out to us at socialsupport@onepay.com and include the user name attached to your review. Thank you!

scraped_reviews.content: They have pretty good customer service. But the rewards program is non existent. You have to spend $100 to get $1.00. (I was thinking they promise $10 per $100) I spent around $200 but only got $0.27. I thought 27 points meant $27. Also, it seems that you must use One Pay debit to get the full points, I mainly used other cards connected to my One Pay account. Or pay hundreds in one setting. Sadly It just doesn't work out for me.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thank you so much for leaving a review. Apologies for the issues you are experiencing! Our customers' account security is very important to us. Can you please reach out to us at socialsupport@one.app and include the user name attached to your review so we can assist? Thank you!

scraped_reviews.content: I really like the One Pay card, but the app keeps freezing up after I enter my passcode, and it won't let me into my account until I fully restart my phone. I'm now having to restart my phone every time I want to use the app. I don't know how to contact the company because the automated help chat doesn't actually help. I will gladly increase my score and update the review if they can this problem. it's been going on for about a month now.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Sincerest apologies! We would love to take a look at the issue. Please reach out to us at socialsupport@onepay.com and include the user name attached to your review so we can help. Thanks!

scraped_reviews.content: Horrible app. Walmart+ lured me into using the "onepay wallet" to earn cash back. However, when trying to set up an account, I was not approved (did not even get to try to take a photo of my ID). After two hours with customer service, they could not resolve the issue. So much for the "rewards". I guess I shouldn't expect more from a company affiliated with Walmart.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Sincerest apologies! Weâ€™d like to know more about your experience. Can you please reach out to us at socialsupport@onepay.com? Thank you!

scraped_reviews.content: horrible . everytime I would make a payment it would come up error and when I relied on auto pay it wouldn't go through on its own and in the end I ended up paying a $5 fee and 5 points taken off my credit report because of them , I was only recently able to pay it all off in one payment because I reached out to customer service and complained. Would not recommend. affirm is so much better.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Sincerest apologies! Our support team would be happy to help. Please contact us at socialsupport@onepay.com and include the username attached to your review so that we can assist further.

scraped_reviews.content: *EDIT Suddenly my email and mobile aren't attached to my account. Contacted Walmart and reported OnePay to them.* I'm unable to log into my OnePay account, can't even finish the setup because everytime it asks me to set a passcode, it doesn't go through/gets stuck loading. I have contacted support twice, in the end they were able to reset my passcode, but 1st time, English was confusing to understand, 2nd time (just now as of this post) they said they sent an email twice and I never got them.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Sincerest apologies. Can you please reach out to us at socialsupport@onepay.com and include the user name attached to your review? We'd like to look into this for you.

scraped_reviews.content: I had my doubts at first about using this for my spark payments because I had been used to direct deposit to my credit union checking account. But, this app is great with all of the cash back and is easy to use. I'm actually saving more money than I did before and spending less. It has a lot of great features and the debit card can be used anywhere like any bank card. I should have made the switch earlier.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thank you for your review! We're glad to hear you're enjoying OnePay!

scraped_reviews.content: very easy to use. I love that I can find a transaction I made 2 minutes before and it's there in my account statement with the details of the purchase. my favorite is the rewards! finding them and activating them and then watching my points rise until I decide to cash them in is pretty cool. there's many more perks and benefits that I really enjoy as well.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thank you for your review! We're glad to hear you're enjoying OnePay!ðŸ’™

scraped_reviews.content: I like this banking app more than any I've had so far. there is a couple things I don't like about it like showing my combined total balance when I first open the app. I would prefer that it only show what is in my checking not my savings too. I would also like to know, if possible, how to change the amount transfered to my savings with auto-save if there is no option for that, I would like there to be. otherwise this is a great banking app!!
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thank you so much for leaving a review. Weâ€™re going to continue to evolve OnePay and the app in the coming months. Stay tuned! Please feel free to reach out if you face any issue. Our email address is socialsupport@onepay.com. We are always here and ready to help. :blue_heart:

scraped_reviews.content: The app has only been useful to see transactions. We haven't been able to deposit money into the card account at our local WalMart at all, and the app doesn't show "Cash Control" as indicated in the online instructions. As of yet, the initial amount deposited when the card was activated has been the only time there was money put on. Very useless piece of plastic currently representing 5 cents.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Sincerest apologies. Can you please reach out to us at socialsupport@onepay.com and include the user name attached to your review? We'd like to look into this for you.

scraped_reviews.content: They spam me with emails about all the points I have earned but the points do not ever transfer to the app. So they are useless and the emails are getting annoying hearing about more and more money that I can't actually access. I have tried several times to get help from customer service and they were not helpful in any way. They just keep giving me these generic responses that don't apply to the situation. Like oh you need to have a minimum of 25 points. Okay have 3200. That's more than 25
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Sincerest apologies. Can you please reach out to us at socialsupport@onepay.com and include the user name attached to your review? We'd like to look into this for you.

scraped_reviews.content: this app and bank always has issues. support chat magically gets disconnected when trying to get help. they are holding over $100 of mine hostage. they finalized part of the transaction but are still holding my overpayment amount in limbo. now they're saying I have to wait 5 days to get my money back from a transaction that's already been finalized.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Lucas! We're sorry to hear about the trouble you experienced while trying to reach out and with the login process. Our support email is socialsupport@onepay.com. Our team has already contacted you at your registered email address, so please keep an eye out for our response.

scraped_reviews.content: The One company closed my account because they noticed "suspicious activity" on it, but would not describe to me what exactly that included right after I had bought an inexpensive item without any trouble. Now, I cannot open another account with them for "90 days" as one of their workers explained. Terrible experience and will never use again.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Sincerest apologies! We would love to take a look at the issue. Please reach out to us at socialsupport@onepay.com and include the user name attached to your review so we can help. Thanks!

scraped_reviews.content: Should be 0 stars! I have been wondering why for 2 months I kept finding games being installed on my phone. It started after the installation of this app. I don't play games. Especially free crapware stuff. In other words, basically this app is no better than a virus. pretty sure it's not going to stop either. I had no problems until I added this app and I only added it for the card. One pay, you have lost my business. I see how you make your money now.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Sincerest apologies. Can you please reach out to us at socialsupport@onepay.com and include the user name attached to your review? We'd like to look into this for you.

scraped_reviews.content: One of the highest savings percentage. Options of worldwide transfers. Cash back offers at Walmart, that will amaze you. Staff that's available, and eager to help. Deposits immediately put through. I fell in love with this app, and the blue card. The numbers are on the back of the card smaller than usual, preventing numbers from being seen easily like other cards. One Pay will stand out in the future even more than it already does. A personal favorite app of mine, with great security behind it.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thanks so much for your review and for being a part of OnePay! ðŸ’™

scraped_reviews.content: I have been using OnePay since March 2024, but it seems OK. No fees or anything seems cheap & affordable, but one problem is that if I have my card depleted for a specific period of time, my debit card will no longer be reloadable. I have no idea if this is some security tactic or something. But, please double down on fake advertising saying "Reloadable Debit Cards." at my local Walmart.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Sincerest apologies! Our support team would be happy to help! Please contact us at socialsupport@onepay.com and include the user name attached to your review so that we can assist further.

scraped_reviews.content: It works horrible on my Android phone. Every time I login it keeps spinning, spinning and spinning. It would not jump into front home page on app right away. And if I don't open the app for few days, it will ask me to enter my phone # to login so I can get a code. I became patient with it for about one month until I finally quit using. Bye!.. I used the Apple version now. No issues.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Sincerest apologies! We'd like to know more about your experience with OnePay. Please reach out to our team at socialsupport@onepay.com with the email address associated with your OnePay account and include the user name attached to your review.

scraped_reviews.content: I used this app every day from phone, for a long time but a couple weeks ago, things changed. All I had to do, to log in was to enter my passcode. No problem, instant access, fast, convenient, as I am always on the go and busy. A couple weeks ago it asked for my passcode as usual, but never logged in. Changed passcode but didnt help. I went to the web site after that and still got the same results. Spoke to someone on chat who said there were no changes and re-install app. Still not working!
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Sincerest apologies. Can you please reach out to us at socialsupport@onepay.com? We'd like to look into this for you.

scraped_reviews.content: I'm sure it's a great app for someone that doesn't need their money when they deposit a check but if you need your check right away do not use this app!! They will hold your check and not post it to your account for 5 to 6 days! And when you call you'll get some foreign speak in person that cannot help you and will not help you They simply read from a script the same thing you call about. I'll give it three stars because the checking and savings are great but not deposits.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Sincerest apologies. Can you please reach out to us at socialsupport@onepay.com and include the user name attached to your review? We'd like to look into this for you.

scraped_reviews.content: Too many notifications. My notifications are set to 1 per day and yet I get around two dozen. I don't need all of these ads. I only need to see when a transaction occurs. Edit: I guess that was my own fault for not exploring the settings within the app. Developers reached out to me and explained how to correct the issue. Thank you.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Sincerest apologies. Can you please reach out to us at socialsupport@one.app and include the user name attached to your review? We'd like to look into this for you.

scraped_reviews.content: UPDATE: One reached out to me quickly via email as well, and an app update was soon issued which fixed the problem of the start screen freezing upon opening. They even provided my a $10 credit, which was very kind! This is hands down the best bank for a checking account. I've been using it for years now and recommend it to everyone.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Sincerest apologies! We would love to take a look at the issue. Please reach out to us at socialsupport@one.app and include the user name attached to your review so we can help. Thanks!

scraped_reviews.content: WRONG....they provide no ability to view declined transactions. support will ask which declined transaction your looking for. I didn't ask for you to tell me....should have them available for the account owner. This is of vital importance. Onepay has no credible reason/excuse not to have this option for its customers. one star is one to many at this point.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Sincerest apologies. We'd like to know more about your experience with us. Please reach out to our team at socialsupport@onepay.com.

scraped_reviews.content: NOT HAPPY!! I thought the onepay app would be more like target. where you can link your bank account and it just comes out of your checking. plus you do not have any auto deductions on your available. everything is done manually. I will be cancelling my onepay account until you change things.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Sincerest apologies! Our support team would be happy to help! Please contact us at socialsupport@onepay.com and include the user name attached to your review so that we can assist further.

scraped_reviews.content: Overall, it's a great app, I have my monthly VA payments sent here, and I can use the account to pay my bills, or I can send money to my other checking account also. I'm happy with it, once you add over 500 a month you get plus, which I have, so I also use the credit building.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thanks so much for your review! We sincerely appreciate this feedback!

scraped_reviews.content: Have been using this app since simple shut down and it was great until Walmart invested and it's just been more and more annoying to use to the point where I might switch somewhere else if they don't make an option to turn off all the notifications except when I get paid and make a purchase.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Sincerest apologies! Our support team would be happy to help! Please contact us at socialsupport@onepay.com and include the user name attached to your review so that we can assist further.

scraped_reviews.content: No complaints about the app itself. The display is simple and straightforward and easy to use. My only complaint is with the login process, which is kind of tedious. I have to enter my phone number every time I want to login so I can get my 2FA code. I wish that the app would remember it, or better yet support an authenticator app for this part.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thank you for sharing your thoughts here. We'd like to know more about your experience with Onepay. Please reach out to our team at socialsupport@onepay.com and include the user name attached to your review.

scraped_reviews.content: signed up for a Walmart credit card apparently through this service, with the clearly stated promise that it was a soft credit check, that would not affect my credit score. I immediately got an alert, from a reputable service (literally one of the big 3) that they ran a hard check, that would affect my score.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Sincerest apologies. Can you please reach out to us at socialsupport@onepay.com and include the user name attached to your review? We'd like to look into this for you.

scraped_reviews.content: I really enjoy the service but sending offers and marketing notifications to someone when they've got "offers and updates" turned off in the app is unacceptable. I only want to be notified when money has been spent. I don't want to get notified about doordash savings or referral incentives. You spam me enough about them in the app, anyway.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Sincerest apologies! We would love to take a look at the issue. Please reach out to us at socialsupport@onepay.com and include the user name attached to your review so we can help. Thanks!

scraped_reviews.content: I wish I could put it back to 0. the communication is lacking when there are issues to be resolved. It is impossible to reach technical support and that's who the representatives always say that you have to talk to. I have been trying for 2 weeks to get an issue resolved between one pay and spark. If one pay would have never restricted my account due to their agent there would be no issues but they did and now they haven't helped to fix their error.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Sincerest apologies! Our support team would be happy to help! Please contact us at socialsupport@onepay.com and include the user name attached to your review so that we can assist further.

scraped_reviews.content: careful when downloading this app it's alright I guess but yea if for whatever reason you want to deactivate your account, you need to give them a big explanation or alot of them, you have to call them and it's just a mess to get out of it, it's been a full day and I'm still waiting and doing everything i can to see if I can get out of this smh
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Sincerest apologies. Can you please reach out to us at socialsupport@onepay.com and include the user name attached to your review? We'd like to look into this for you.

scraped_reviews.content: OnePay has quickly become my favorite banking app. The rewards programs are great and they make it so easy to navigate and switch your reward preferences. I constantly find myself pleasantly surprised when I'm able to trade in my points for actual cash instantly back into my account ðŸ˜
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thanks so much for your review and for being a part of OnePay! ðŸ’™

scraped_reviews.content: This is a terrible app. The phone number i am using is new to me and apparently whoever had the number before me had a One pay account. I was able to login to this other person's account using only the phone number. When I tried to speak to an agent about the issue they had no clue what inwas talking about and said I must have had the other person's account passcode as well, which I didn't. The ease of which I was able to login to someone else's account, without realizing it, was very concerning
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Can you please reach out to us at socialsupport@one.app? We'd like to look into this for you.

scraped_reviews.content: Out of nowhere internal team "Detected unusual activity on your account" and on Halloween no less. And then without telling me what the issue was they decided it was best to just close my account without REAL RHYME OR REASON! I called support and spoke to a supervisor and filed a complaint. I used to rave like a mad cow about how great OnePay was but not anymore. Went from best bank to Public Enemy #1. I HIGHLY ADVISE AGAINST using them as a bank and if you have one; go with someone else!!!!
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Sincerest apologies! Our support team would be happy to help! Please contact us at socialsupport@onepay.com and include the user name attached to your review so that we can assist further.

title: The Roku App (Official)
description:
Get to know the must-have streaming sidekick! 

Use the free RokuÂ® mobile app to:
â€¢ Control your Roku devices with a convenient remote
â€¢ Use your voice or keyboard to quickly search for entertainment
â€¢ Enjoy private listening with headphones
â€¢ Stream free movies, live TV, and more on the go with The Roku Channel  
â€¢ Cast media files from your phone, like videos and photos, to your TV 
â€¢ Add and launch channels on your Roku devices
â€¢ Enter text on your Roku device more easily with your mobile keyboard


You must connect your phone or tablet to the same wireless network as your Roku device to use certain features of the mobile app. Some features require a compatible Roku device and may require logging into your Roku account.


Feature availability:
â€¢ Voice search is available in English in the US, UK, and Canada. Itâ€™s also available in Spanish in Mexico and the US.
â€¢  The Roku Channel can be viewed in the mobile app in the US only. 
â€¢  Some channels require payment, can change, and vary by country.

For more information, go to http://support.roku.com
Privacy Policy: go.roku.com/privacypolicy
CA Privacy Notice: https://docs.roku.com/published/userprivacypolicy/en/us#userprivacypolicy-en_us-CCPA

summary: Turn your mobile device into the ultimate streaming companion

scraped_reviews.content: Changing my review to say the app works much better now. Went from not working at all to working consistently. only took them a long while lol. Im very thankful for it (when it's working properly) because evidently my household can keep track of a single remote. I can't even find the remote I just bought. It's still in the boxðŸ¤¦â€â™€ï¸ðŸ¤·â€â™€ï¸. So I, and other family members can use the app as a remote when needed! Thank you rokuðŸ˜˜

useless at worst, unoptimal at best. I tried connecting to my TV and it didn't show up. Then Itried to do it manually by IP addressâ€”nothing. It took 20-30 minutes of restarting my phone and my TV, unpliggimg my router, reconnecting everything, then searching for devices again. eventually it worked for a while, but had a couple seconds of latency for every input. then it disconnected and I couldn't find my device again. I spent more time trying to use the app than actually using it.

Issues watching on your mobile device. Will go through part of a show and after the commercial break will start from the beginning. If you try to fast forward to resume where you left off, you have to go through the commercials again and it still takes you right back to the beginning. Have tried restarting/reinstalling the app but the same thing happens.

Yes, this app is nice for controlling streaming devices when the original remote can't be found but, it does have some downsides. There's no volume adjustment or power options. I'm guessing that's because a streaming device is hooked up to a television but it still sucks. When I had Roku TV, I remember the app was able to do both these things. I'm not sure there's a way to make these operations possible with the app through a streaming device though.

When the app works, it's great! But a lot of the time, it will randomly quit working and refuse to connect to my tv or headphone mode will stop working every few seconds. I've tried every solution that support has suggested, but it's something with the app. Very frustrating when I want to watch tv but am unable to due to not being able to use my headphones and watch.

The app went from working fine to not connecting to my TVs at all, except to turn them on, which isn't very helpful when you can't get connected to the TV again after it powers on. Doesn't make a lot of sense to me but oh well. I guess we will have to go buy another physical remote. This app is not very reliable.

I love Roku! I have been using a Roku box for over 30 years to access additional content. I have been off the cable game for over a decade thanks to Roku and Smart TVs. I buy content that I want to see, not 20 different channels of home shopping for junk that I don't want or a bunch of sports channels that are only on for a couple hours a week. There is so much more out there and that isn't making Jeff Bezos richer than he already is. Roku is reasonable and has channels for everyone! â¤ï¸â¤ï¸â¤

It's great, until it's not. It will work for a little while, then one day it just decides to not connect to my tv any longer, no matter what I do. But, the most frustrating part? I will literally be able to "wake up" (turn on) my tv WITH the Roku app, but then the app will still refuse to connect to my tv, therein not allowing me to use the remote feature. Definitely a bug that needs fixing. But dont worry, just like a hot n cold ex, next week it will work again out of the blue. ðŸ™„

Doesn't have ads and it works perfectly. Love it and I use it everytime I lose my remote. Though there is one problem.. The sound buttons to my remote stopped working and usually I would use this app to fix the problem but... There are no sound buttons. (My TV only has a power off button). I would really appreciate it if you could add those. If you do I'll definitely change to 5 stars!

Great in theory. When it works. When it works it's awesome. I constantly lose my Roku remote so this is all I use now. The issue is that it's always disconnecting. And takes forever to reconnect. Also incredibly delayed. I will turn the sound down or up and it takes some time to actually work after clicking the buttons. Definitely needs work for sure, it used to work perfectly a while ago but the last couple of updates have definitely done more bad than good.

It works, but it's lacking. Biggest gripe is that it doesn't minimize, picture in picture (so it can be kept accessible, to the side), float over apps, nor keep the screen alive. The settings indicate it does, but it doesn't. Every freaking time I want to mute commercials (so I don't go deaf), I have to wake my phone, key password, and start Roku app again. Frustrating! Also missing a bunch of buttons/ functionality.

Help, App worked great at first, but after the last couple updates, it is slow and, most times, fails to open. The only error message I get is, "Would you like to close the Roku app or wait?" I've kept up with the updates, and nothing has gotten better. I've cleared the cache on all apps and restarted my phone. no changes.

every other day it doesn't connect. It use to work but the last month or so the app doesn't connect to the tvs or the roku devices on any of phones or tablets we have. Even after troubleshooting and contacting them every single time Roku offers nothing for a solution. This is clearly an app issue. I'm fed up. Like every family we loose the remotes so we all just use our phones. Ready to switch to litterally anything else everytime you think they fix it wait 2 days. Good luck

It's SO close to 5-stars & also just 1-star. There is a fatal flaw. I have a credit card on file for subscriptions. One day when the card expired, the app reminded me to update my payment method. I did so within a short period of time - there were no charges pending & no "active" subscriptions. But from that time in May-2025 until now I continue to get that same app notification. I've rechecked the method, cleared the cache, uninstalled it for a few months etc. Nothing works. Like, Dudes!!

Absolutely love it! I have 3 TVs using roku sticks and as long as my internet stays stable, I couldn't ask for a better option to a cable box. I wouldn't say no to a remote that had numbers on it so I didn't have to hunt for the channels I want but other than that, it saves me $30/month in cable box fees and I have everything I want or need.

Using the roku app is very easy. I can connect it to my roku. TV. And watch It's Live TV channels from all my devices. It is very easy to set up setting up an account with roku is optional. You do not have to do it. It is free and does not cost money of any kind unless you purchase something through them. The roku app is good for friends and family. Or those couch ðŸ¥” Like me

Edit Update - While I can connect headphones now, I spend the majority of shows rewinding and trying to reconnect. The app will randomly drop the headphone connection. I really enjoy the app and it works wonderfully, but the whole reason I downloaded it was to use the headphone option the pictures displayed. After downloading the app I discovered that I am unable to listen to the audio through my phone using headphones. I'm really disappointed. I would love to give it a higher rating.

absolute garbage. I bought this for my elderly parents. I was hoping to create a hassle free entertainment experience. Sadly, even after you pay for subscriptions nothing on the device actually integrates with subscription. Every subscribed service requires a complex login on TV. And the Roku shows channels you don't have access to causing frustration. it's just a garbage device. It doesn't work.

Roku is the worst. They actually put ads on the home screen of the TV that I paid for. No ads on any of my other smart devices. They automatically download apps to your tv. Talk about invasive! I returned the TV after 2 days. There's no way to block or remove them. Never, EVER buying roku garbage again!!!!

I love Roku-have for years now. I remember when they had numbered channels. Alot of throwbacks/classics I used to love mixed with new or recent things. Love how they have channels dedicated specifically to one single show and movie channels. Last but certainly not least, you can't beat the fact that it's FREE(the service/app and free live TV). REALLY hope the introduction of Howdy doesn't cause things to change where it's not available for free anymore (although Howdy is only $2.99).

Overall this is very useful for controlling my Roku TV. It's nice always having a remote in my pocket that works anywhere I am connected to my wifi. But I really wish there was a small preview window of the TV on the remote so I could control it from the other room or so I don't have to look back and forth since the buttons aren't tactile. Also, there's a significant wait while the remote connects.

Buying a Roku TV is just buying ads. It only searches through very few of the free apps I downloaded. Most searches turn into a waste of time and an ad for an app service subscription. I would think that a "smart" TV would at least be able to search through the programs within the apps already downloaded on the Roku TV. I can do more for entertainment with my laptop computer or even my cell phone than the "smart" TV allows. If all other "smart" TVs are like Roku, I want a dumb TV.

Update: App still doesn't work. Issues below are still issues. - This app hasn't worked for years. I mainly use it as a remote for our TV, but it can't connect anymore. I tried uninstalling the app, entering the IP address, made sure mobile app control was enabled and that both devices were on the same WiFi network, restarted both devices, unplugged the TV and plugged it back in.. I'm at wit's end with this app, but at least the physical remote kinda works (at a very specific angle)

I only use this for the remote portion because my original one got stolen. It works pretty okay for the most part but most times I have to close out the app and reopen it even if my phone has only been locked for maybe 30 minutes or so. It would be nice to be able to use my on-screen keyboard across all the apps and not just some of them in which I'm forced to use only the directional pad with the keyboard on the TV. also I have a complaint about the directional pad on the remote app.

It works great. I wish I could find the physical remote controller but this app does everything it does in Hisense or Roku so power on/off and adjust volume or channels on live TV, my only compliant is to find the channel list to resume to broadcast stations instead of the hundreds of satellite apps offering themed viewing. I mean reruns don't rock my boat as an all day binge, I'm used to going from channels 2-49 and that basic option is difficult to find again.

perfect replacement for missing remote. functions exactly as remote. Programmed to multiple units. It replicates the unit its paired. For example my living room TV, the remote has volume controls so when the app connects it also has volume controls. In my kids bedroom the roku connect is not the model with volume controls and when my app switches to that room it replicates the remote and therefore has no volume control. The app is perfect and operates exactly as intended

Double Billed for an App !!! This past July I purchased an annual subscription to Paramount Plus through the Roku channel. The charge was denied initially. I then went directly to Paramount website and purchased the subscription. The next day I saw Roku retried the card and it went through. Since then I have been trying to get someone to refund one of the charges. Crooks!

I have been using Roku for years. we have three TVs in the house and three Roku's. I love the fact that you are able to sign in at different places if they have the Roku. I've seen that at quite a few hotels. They just came out with Howdy. Not any new movies but a few different ones and it's commercial free! if I get a new TV it will probably be a Roku TV

Roku players are the worst. They disconnect several times a week. Very frustrating. Watching something and then it disconnects. WIFI has excellent signal but it can't connect to the network. It says to move the player around when it is an inch away from the router. The 2nd player is 15ft away. Come on. I bought a stick and it doesn't connect at all. I am really tired of it, only 1 works sometimes. I am not the only one with this problem. Looking into another device. Don't buy Roku players

I don't care for my Roku TV that much. I find that its glitchy and some apps like HBO for example, do not work well on it at all. While those apps work perfectly fine on the other TVs in our house. Even our TVs that are furthest from the router perform faster and with far less glitches. So, unfortunately, Roku, you only get 3 stars from me.

Love this app under normal circumstances. My only complaint is I wish this app could detect my Roku when sharing out a wifi hotspot. I tried to manually connect by specifying the IP address of the Roku, but it just doesn't see it. I can use a ping app to ping the IP, and I do get a reply from the Roku. But no luck with this app. using an s25 ultra.

FAIR WARNING: Everything has to be connected on the same wifi (system ?) for the app to work properly, that is the ONLY way I have gotten it to work. That said, It works great as a replacement for when the mini humans play with the remote control and forget where it is... also, it seems the app can control any unit from any place that wifi can reach. It is also easy to switch between, and name, all units in range. It is very much recommended for me.

As far as roku in itself perfectly satisfied, put the remote app. There are way too many glitches. For example, you pause the TV, but every time you get a message or some type of a notification on your phone, it will unpause. And start playing. And if you're switching between apps, you have to reload the app every single time to get it to reconnect.

Reciently, it is very slow. To the point of the remote feature not working at all. The audio through phone headphones, has stopped working for more than 5 seconds. It has also stopped connecting or even being able to connect the Roku. I have very good wifi, and everything is in the same room. Wife has issues with her phone as well. The app has stopped working properly.

This app has been useless since the update. I've uninstalled and reinstalled it 3 times and it usually works once after the reinstall. It freezes, crashes, or is as slow as dial-up. I hate it because it ran at lightning speed before the last big update. I could always count on being able to control my TVs within seconds of opening the app. I could find the physical remote, take it apart, reassemble it, and change the batteries twice before the app could even load up the main menu now.

This was one of the best apps hardware combos out there. It use to be flawless for me, I could connect to my 5 different tvs through my house, control the but more importantly be able to connect with my headphones and watch TV. Not only has the app been severally unstable it won't connect to my headphones at all. It freezes all the time now. So disappointing, when I tell you I had no issues in the past, I mean it connected right away, didn't kick me off, it was perfection. Now, nothig work

I absolutely LOVE Roku. Tons of free streaming channels (some of which can't be found on PAY cable or satellite anymore!), & ability to login to pay services that I have as well. I now prefer Roku TVs and buy Roku streaming devices for TVs that don't have it installed & bought devices for all of my relatives for Christmas. The app controls the basics and also acts like a remote for your TV or streaming device, so don't bother with an ad-riddled 3rd Party remote app. This is all you need.

Easy to use and very efficient. I actually prefer the app to the remote it comes with! The big downside currently is that when trying to download pictures to the Roku app for the photo stream option I run into issues. If I try to upload more than 8 individual pictures at a time it freezes my whole phone and won't let me open most apps (just gets a black screen) until I completely restart my phone. It's happened to me on several occasions over the last few months so not a fluke. please fix!

Was 5 star. now App closes as soon as it opens. I restarted the phone. I deleted the app and reinstalled it. I deleted cache and data numerous times. internet is working for all other home devices. the roku device is working also. the app is not working. it opens up long enough to load, I can see it is connected to my device then an alert pops up saying the app keeps closing and then it closes. ive had this app since 2019 and it has never given me a problem before. And yes it is updated.

Problems with last update. I've been using this app for almost 2 years with no problems. Now the bottom menu is too touchy. I'll use the remote and go to put my phone down - and my TV switches to another input or streaming service. It happens multiple times a day. I'm going to be trying other Roku compatible remote apps on this store.

horrible. All we have are Roku sticks and tvs. This app can fund none of them. They have all of my devices listed but won't connect. Saying make sure they're on the same network. THEY ARE! Phone support was also of no help. I deleted all devices from my account. then set them back up USING THE APP. They connected, even added the streaming apps. This was a few hours ago. Go on to the app, to make sure it works, NO DEVICES FOUND!

great when it works, me and my husband have the same phone, and his remote always works, but mine doesn't. I have to restart my phone every time. it crashes, and stalls won't work. I've updated it and everything. It's annoying to restart my phone every time to use it. I've closed apps cleared cache. my wifi is great. There's no reason for it to do what it does. I'm seeing others with the same complaint.

I would love it if it didn't stop opening after a while, it opens and gives me the homepage, but empty and unresponsive. I have to re-download it after a while just to get it to work again, which means reconfigure it to my TV. This is my third time re-downloading it, it would be more if I used it more often, but since it's unreliable, I don't. Please let me know once this bug is fixed.

move the power button somewhere so where I'm not hitting it by accident all the time! Why is this app so hard to start sometimes? Edit.... After installing a bunch of other Roku remote apps, I do like this one the best you don't get annoying adds popping up all the time and most of the other remote apps don't have IT'S THE Best! Update the best app I have found that is free, update again, after reading reviews, I am not set for automatic updates. may have older version,

I have to uninstall and reinstall this app so many times. It just randomly freezes or begins to operate extremely slow. But this only occurs on the android app. Fresh reinstall works for a little while. Edited. Right after I left the 2 star review it did it again. Just totally unresponsive. Here we go again. Uninstall/reinstall. Never had a single issue with the IPhone app.

I use the app only for the Remote feature, because it works way better than the handheld remote, on which I actually removed the buttons that allow quick navigation to other streaming platforms because they're too easy to press in a darkened room. It seems that the same annoyance is baked into the app version, in which the My Roku tab hovers at the bottom of the remote with just enough of the quick navigation buttons showing to catch an errant press and whisk you away from your stream.ðŸ‘ŽðŸ‘ŽðŸ‘ŽðŸ‘ŽðŸ‘Ž

I really like the app and the choices of shows available. The app is easy to use, and of course, multiple profiles. You even have a choice of remotes with different features. I like the earphone option. If I want to watch something and can't hear it so well, I can plug in the earphones so I can hear and not disturb everyone else in other rooms. I have recently found a remote that is USB chargeable instead of batteries. That's kinda nifty.

I've not had any issues with the app other than an occasional inability to connect to one of my devices. However now my private listening isn't working which we really depend on since one of us works early in the morning and one is a night owl. I know how to troubleshoot a tech issue and have done everything short of restoring my phone which I will not be doing. Please fix it.

I'm not sure if it's because I have an old Roku TV or what, but this app refuses to connect to my TV anymore (the better part of 4 years). I have zero connection issues otherwise, whether it be the Internet or my phone, and all software is up to date. I used to be able to do a reset and it would temporarily fix it, but it won't even connect manually with an IP address.

works great on IOS, but constantly stops working on my Android. I can control the volume and hear clicks when I try to navigate the home screen, but no movement on screen. I checked for updates available: none. I restart the TLC TV, App and my phone, but that doesn't help. I do love listening to TV through earbuds/Bluetooth on my phone when it does work properly though!

title: Meesho: Online Shopping App
description:
Discover quality products across fashion, home essentials, beauty, and more; at affordable prices. 

For Indian businesses, Meesho provides a platform to reach millions of customers nationwide with easy order management and secure payments.

1. Quality Products at Affordable  Prices
Access a wide range of fashion,home & kitchen, kids & baby care, and beauty & personal care products at prices that fit your budget.

2. Free Delivery/ Free Shipping
Meesho offers Free Delivery on all orders with no minimum order value. 

3. Cash On Delivery (COD) Available
 Pay only when you receive your products with the easy COD option.

4. Free Returns/Refunds
We offer a 7-Day Free Return & Refund Policy with which you will get the money back, no questions asked. 

5. Safe & Timely Payments
Our payment gateways are safe, secure & quick for online payments. Your online transactions and payment details are safeguarded. 



How to Shop on the Meesho App

Download the App: Explore a wide range of products.

Add to Cart: Shop for quality products across categories.

Choose Payment: Opt for Cash on Delivery or secure online payment.

Get Your Order: Receive your products with free shipping.


Empower Your Business as a Seller:
List & Sell: Upload products easily and reach millions of customers.

Order Management: Track orders, manage inventory, and fulfill shipments effortlessly.

Grow Your Earnings: Access tools to optimize pricing, visibility, and sales.


Ready to start your e-commerce journey in India?
Download Meesho today and redefine how you shop and sell online.

summary: Shop for yourself or start selling online in Indiaâ€” all on the Meesho app.

scraped_reviews.content: good products, but genuinely one of the worst delivery times I've seen. the expected delivery time is often more than 2 weeks, and they sometimes still don't meet them. there are orders I've made at the start of the month that still haven't been shipped. very unreliable shipping, not recommended if you need the product delivered on time
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi, thank you so much for bringing this issue to our attention and please accept our apology for the unfortunate situation. Please open this https://bit.ly/3BqCWC2 and share your details, so that our team can get back to you. Customer satisfaction is our number one priority and we request you to provide us another chance.

scraped_reviews.content: I was a regular customer of meesho. Even ordered almost 25 items from them on one go for my room decor. However, had an issue with the delivery of one items, I was really sad to see how they responded to their regular customer and their issues. Customer service is horrible. Parcel is being received 5-10 days after the given date.. very bad experience....
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi, thank you so much for bringing this issue to our attention and please accept our apology for the unfortunate situation. Please open this https://bit.ly/3BqCWC2 and share your details, so that our team can get back to you. Customer satisfaction is our number one priority and we request you to provide us another chance.

scraped_reviews.content: All is good but The product arrived very late. please improved this . I am facing persistent issues where almost all my orders are arriving late. Additionally, I constantly receive 'delivery attempt failed' notifications, even though I was available at the time of delivery. This is a recurring logistics problem that is causing inconvenience to many customers, not just me. I urge Meesho to investigate and resolve these delivery issues as quickly as possible.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi, we appreciate your concern in bringing this to our notice and this is not the standards which we have set at Meesho. Please fill this form: https://bit.ly/3BqCWC2 and share your details, so that our team can resolve your concern. This makes us all the more keener to ensure this instance doesnâ€™t repeat.

scraped_reviews.content: Best Experience Till Now! Iâ€™ve been shopping on Meesho for more than a year, and honestly, Iâ€™ve never faced any major issues with my orders. The products I received have always matched my expectations in terms of quality and accuracy. Of course, minor issues can happen occasionally, but Iâ€™ve never had any trouble with returns-the process is always smooth and hassle-free. Thank you Meesho!
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi, Wow, we were blown away by your positive words, we really appreciate the time you took to write such a detailed review! Thanks again!

scraped_reviews.content: I had a very frustrating experience with the Meesho app.I placed an order which was accepted and even showeda delivery date. But when the time came, the deliverywas delayed and then the ordler was cancelled automatically without any explanation. I thought it might be a one-time issue, so I tried ordering again using another ID. Shockingly the same thing happened again -accepted the order delayed the delivery, and then cancelled it on its own. This happened twice, wasting my time and try
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi, we appreciate your concern in bringing this to our notice and this is not the standards which we have set at Meesho. Please fill this form: https://bit.ly/3BqCWC2 and share your details, so that our team can resolve your concern. This makes us all the more keener to ensure this instance doesnâ€™t repeat.

scraped_reviews.content: very bad experience, Apps cannot open on my phone, its shows verification failed, contact customer service. I call them but they says Meesho will be closing soon, so they can not do anything. What kind of behaviour is that? I ordered 3 items in Meesho, one item delivered, but different size. now i can not return. whenever i press return button, its shows unexpected errors. same issue with me
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi, Thanks so much for bringing this issue to our attention and please let me apologize for the unacceptable way in which youâ€™ve been treated. Keeping our customers happy is our number one priority and weâ€™d like to ask you for another chance to retain you as a customer.

title: Peloton - Fitness & Workouts
description:
Kickstart your fitness journey with the Peloton App. Enjoy strength training, meditation, yoga, Pilates, walking, and easy-start ab workouts. Experience energetic classes on any bike, treadmill, rowing machine or during a walk outdoors. No equipment? No worries.

WHAT'S IN IT FOR YOU?
â€¢ Find a variety of workouts that fulfill your fitness and cardio goals, such as strength training to build muscle, indoor and outdoor running, cycling, yoga, HIIT, meditation, stretching, Pilates, Barre, and more. Whether aiming for a healthier body or a peaceful mind, our cardio, training, and gym workouts are available on your Android phone, tablet, or TV.
â€¢ Peloton is designed to keep you going, boosting health and muscle strength with artist series, goal-based offerings, and challenges that make working out on the Peloton App a fun experience. Whether doing yoga at home, running outside, or hitting the gym for strength training, Peloton has you covered. Exercise with Peloton and push yourself to the next level of fitness. Our class offerings provide full guidance, helping you achieve your goals, no matter your fitness level or experience.
â€¢ With every workout, from walking to Pilates to ab workouts, designed for your body and health, exercise has never been this fun. Break a sweat and reach your fitness goals anytime, anywhere, whether you're walking, stretching, or running.

DISCOVER, LOVE, REPEAT
â€¢ Thousands of workouts that you can take anytime, anywhere, with or without any equipment. From cardio to stretching to Pilates, we've got you covered. Guided workouts can help you achieve your fitness goals anywhere you go.
â€¢ Let our world-class instructors, including Pilates and ab experts, motivate you during every workout. Track your progress and stay motivated with the Peloton Watch App on Wear OS watches.
â€¢ Join live classes or explore our library of instructor-led ab workouts and running sessions for a studio fitness experience to get moving whenever you're ready to sweat- on the go, at the gym, or at home.
â€¢ Schedule, stack, and bookmark classes. Whether running at the gym or doing yoga at home, Peloton will enhance your workout experience. Use the Peloton App to exercise and stay organized in your fitness journey.

TRANSFORM YOUR FITNESS JOURNEY
Filter workouts for muscle strength, length, time, and music type to help you hit your health and fitness goals.
Energize your fitness routine and muscle health. With expert trainers and great music, our classes provide guidance to enhance your fitness journey.
Track your classes and activities like outdoor walks, runs, gym workouts, and yoga. Connect a heart rate monitor or download the Peloton Watch App for your Wear OS watch. The app provides real-time metrics designed to support your health goals and keep you moving forward. With Tiles, your Peloton streak seamlessly integrates with your weekly activity report on your Wear OS device. Stay motivated, and never miss a step when you track your workouts, walks, or runs.

Watch Complication: Workouts are now just one tap away. Add the Peloton complication to your Wear OS watch face to start and track workouts directly from your watch.

From version 3.36.0, the app requires Android 7.1 or higher. Version 3.35.0 supports devices with older Android versions.
By completing your purchase, you certify that you are at least 18 years old and that you understand and agree to the Terms of Service (https://www.onepeloton.com/terms-of-service) and acknowledge the Privacy Policy (https://www.onepeloton.com/privacy-policy). By subscribing to our App Membership at the applicable price (exclusive of taxes), you will be automatically charged monthly or annually, as applicable, until you cancel. Auto-renewal may be turned off in your Account Setting in Play store after purchase. No cancellation of the current subscription is allowed during an active subscription period. A user that cancels during a subscription month will not be charged for the following month.
