Plan your next trip with KAYAK. Download now to start planning a great trip.
summary: Find, compare & book flights, hotels and car rental with KAYAKâ€™s travel app.

scraped_reviews.content: I have been using this app for about a decade or as long as it's been out. probably. Up until recently, I always gotten the best deals on here for plane tickets and for cars. But lately it's been giving me random low prices that that do not exist on the vendor's page. for example, looking for a plane ticket to Europe. Once I click to go buy it on the airlines page, it's $1,000 more. Unfortunately this app has become just another scam. It's a true bummer.
scraped_reviews.replyContent:
Thank you for your feedback.

We get how frustrating it can be to see a price that quickly becomes unavailable. Flight prices can change rapidly due to demand and inventory updates from airlines and booking partners.

If youâ€™d like to provide more details about your search or experience, please use this support form: www.kayak.com/android-support

scraped_reviews.content: The "explore" feature is useless and never gives you the correct price for what you want. Whenever you select one of the dates, the price will increase exponentially. The same thing happens if you select the "show me the best dates" feature. It says you can click non-stop as a filter, but when you do, it does not actually follow your filter instructions.

Good searches but do not book through them. I used the Kayak app after seeing a good fare online. After booking, I was contacted by the travel agency insisting I purchase seat assignments for an additional $250. This felt excessive, so I declined and instead went directly through the airlineâ€™s website. There, I was able to reserve the same seats for only $50. The experience left me disappointed, as it seems like Kayak and the travel agency tried to take advantage of me.
scraped_reviews.replyContent:
Thank you for sharing your experience. Weâ€™re sorry to hear about the disappointing situation you encountered.

To help us investigate further, could you please provide additional details about your experience with the travel provider you booked through? You can share this information using our contact form here: www.kayak.com/android-support

scraped_reviews.content: Do not use Flight Movers. Kayak allows people to search for flights on Flight Movers. That company scams people into "purchasing" a very "discounted" ticket. I say "purchase" because you put in your Credit Card information only to find out later, by a phone call that the flight has terms such as you having to arrive at the airport 5 to 6 hrs before your flight and can bring NO bags. So they try to convince you to "upgrade" to a regular ticket without those crazy terms. Then steal your CC info.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thank you for sharing your experience. We take such feedback seriously. Could you please provide more details, such as your booking number and traveler names, via our contact form? Our support team will then be able to look into the matter promptly. You can reach us here: www.kayak.com/android-support

scraped_reviews.content: It used to be really good, but recently it's just awful. They often direct you to book at shady sites, half the time the price they show isn't actually available when you try to book (just repeatedly keeps saying "Booking failed" and suggesting trying again, without ever actually updating the prices), it's incredibly slow, and arguably worst of all, doesn't show the best deals, even when Skyscanner or the airlines' own sites do.
scraped_reviews.replyContent:
Hi there,

Thanks for your feedback. If you could share a specific example via www.kayak.com/support, we'll gladly look into it.

Best,
Scott
KAYAK

scraped_reviews.content: I really like the kayak app.. it's great for finding prices for many different booking sites. The problem is the search error issue still hasn't been fixed after all these years. Sometimes when I search flights it will only pull about 10 to 20% of the results. Instead of kayak saying "search error" it just displays the results with the majority of the flights missing. There's no easy way to get it to search again either, once it thinks it has all the results it just keeps showing the same.

I find Kayak to have the most customizable flight alerts. It's still the only service I know of to offer flexible dates on searches. However, functionality is not great. For ex when i get push notifications for a low price, it doesn't bring me to the alert. I have to manually navigate to the saved search and sometimes i can't even find the low price i was alerted to. Plus there doesn't seem to be a way to opt out of email alerts.

Does as well as any other app and better than any I've tried, including the over-advertised Trivago. Love the ability to track any flight (even see where it is enroute) and the ability to view all departures and arrivals for ALL flights at any airport. I also like the fly to anywhere feature that will show current best rates all over the country, displayed on a map. It also keeps track of all past trips and total miles travelled. I can't think of any negatives.

Pretty good for comparing prices. But beware their instant book functionality - they shamelessly (and probably illegally) bait and switch. I agreed to a charge for a flight and then on the confirmation they told me they'd charged me double what I'd agreed to. If I hadn't been able to immediately cancel and get a refund, I would probably have reported this to law enforcement. (I might still do so.)
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello and thank you for your feedback. For assistance raising a complaint to the agency you booked with, please contact our consumer team directly at: www.kayak.com/android-support

scraped_reviews.content: In the past the app has been pretty accurate with prices. But there's a huge bug in the saved trips right now, where most of the prices in those lists are not refreshing. I have to click on the flight (if it even lets me, doesn't always) to go see what the actual price is, but even then I see the old price when I return to the saved trip. This started after this last update.

wish sorting time options included "latest" instead of ONLY earliest. My significant other is in a different state and I like to leave as late as possible the night before my work week. I have to scroll tons to the bottom. The time sorter is buggy so that's not an option. other than that, I have no complaints. Great app, I like the color coded days for when my flying is flexible and I want to find a good flight quickly

The app no longer works for hotel searches. For the past 6 months everytime i search for a hotel, it floods my list with hotels that arent available for the selected dates. I never find one hotel available until i scroll past 100 unavailable listings. On top of this huge error/glitch, there is no way to quickly contact customer service, it is impossible to contact Kayak through their app, i spent an hour trying to find a "contact" button or phone number or email. Big waste of time over and over.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Adam. Feel free to share information about your experience via www.kayak.com/support. We'll gladly take a closer look.

scraped_reviews.content: Ads used to be the same size as the other listings. Now they're huge, take up 2 screens worth of scrolling, and pop up while scrolling or attempting to click on a listing. This type of advertising doesn't work, no one wants it, and its driving people away from the app. EDIT: Thank you very much for fixing the ad issue. I had quit using it for a while, but after last update, the ads have went back to a reasonable size, and no longer take over the screen while scrolling

I actually really like Kayak but hated the share list flow. Someone shared a list with me via email. The email stated I needed the app (I dont want it). Got the app. I was expecting the email to deep link me to the list. Didn't work. It opened an in-app browser to get the app that I was currently using. I want to use mobile web. Uninstalling. Also, I want to log in with my password, not email otp
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello James, thank you for sharing. Could you please share this information via www.kayak.com/support . We'll gladly take a closer look. Best, The KAYAK Team

scraped_reviews.content: Best app for finding low cost airfare that I've been able to find ANYWHERE, and I've looked almost everywhere online. It is super simple, and easy to use it even includes an option of adding additional baggage ( i.e carry on & up to 2 checked bags)fees to the total cost of the airfare. This is only app that I have found that has this, and baggage fees are very important because of the total amount spent. Go and try it out, what have you got to lose. It also includes car, and hotel searches.

This app exceeds my expectations. I'm a first time traveler and Kayak has helped me stay organized, keep me up to date and everything in one place. Alot less stress on my part. Instead of trying to remember what app I used for what reservation and having to search through troves of emails I can just go to kayak and with a few clicks I have every important piece of information. Absolutely love it and recommend it. Especially for first time travelers who have no experience in this area.

Kayak didn't update my confirmation number/ record locator when my flight changed so I couldn't check in at all. The app showed "Access denied" when I tried to check in on the app. Couldn't check in on the airline website because it technically didn't exist anymore. The airport was confused as well, and I missed my flight, but I just booked another one by just googling and checking prices. Kayak does not have options available to request refunds and there is no support line for you to call.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi there. Feel free to share information about your booking via www.kayak.com/support. We'll gladly take a closer look.

scraped_reviews.content: App keeps giving a failure message for searches. Update: I always keep the app up to date. It now shows flights initially but when you click on the the flight often it will say that it is unavailable. Update: When using multiple day search (+/- days) the results vary depending on the date picked even if you choose one of the overlapping dates. App has really continually gotten worse with updates.
scraped_reviews.replyContent:
Hi there, thank you for your message. Please try installing the latest version of the app, that usually does the trick. If the problem persists, please send feedback via www.kayak.com/support and the relevant team will take a look.

Best,
KAYAK

scraped_reviews.content: Used KAYAK for years and has always been my go to comparison app. Today I was checking flights, decided on BA, hit "view deal" where it takes you to the BA site and then says "processing payment" at that point i closed the window as obviously I was viewing deal NOT buying flights! I best not have not been sold flight tickets! Update to reply: I reviewed what happened! Kayak forwarded me to BA, then IMMEDIATELY came up with processing payment!
scraped_reviews.replyContent:
Thank you for your feedback. When you select "view deal," you are directed to the airlineâ€™s website, and KAYAK does not handle or process any payments. Your flight is only booked once you complete the payment process on the airlineâ€™s site.

If you have any further questions, feel free to reach out via our contact form: www.kayak.com/android-support

scraped_reviews.content: im not sure whats happening. but. as of lately. after search finishes i goto "sort by best, cheapest, quickest,earliest " and no matter what option i pick. the search displays halfway down the results list. gotta scroll 15/20 secs to the top of the results. *note that same issue happens on mommondo and cheapflights Fold 7

They pretend to be a booking site, until you have an issue, and then they're "just a search engine, sorry we can't help!" I booked a hotel through them, and a bunch of crucial information was subsequently never sent to me. Like the fact that the place does not accept children. Which we found out on the day of. Security deposit? Sorry, nonrefundable. Kayak's position? Sorry, we're just a search engine, can't help. Avoid. Or just use it as a search engine, but buy through the actual site

I have a bad experience with this app., they don't want to help me with the flight that is cancelled because of the closure of the airline. I already approached them but still they don't have any action. I paid another 175 euro for the arrangement of cancelled flight instead of helping me to fix this. Another one I made a move to call every single contact from this app but still it's hard to reach out.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello and thank you for your feedback. As a free search engine, KAYAK cannot manage reservations. However, if your have trouble reaching out to the travel provider you booked with, please contact our support team via the following contact form: www.kayak.com/android-support

scraped_reviews.content: Not picking up all parts of trips from easyJet and Jet2 e-mails e.g. missing return flight on one and missing hotel on another one. Also the order is sometimes wrong - should be flight, hotel, return flight but the hotel sometimes appears first. No apparent way to reorder?

Good travel site aggregator. Would be nice to be able to book directly through Kayak. I most enjoy the convenience of being able to email my bookings to Kayak and then see a detailed itinerary, which includes booking reference numbers and all original booking documentation.
Check out Kayak, they have advantageous deals. Search platforms provide more options for less cost which helps tremendously.

My son's flight is still on the ground down because of a fog delay (1 hour delay) but the app shows that they took off 20 minutes ago. shows air speed and altitude while they are still sitting on the ground.
scraped_reviews.replyContent:
Thank you for your feedback out.

Please note that KAYAK displays flight information as provided directly by the airline. Occasionally, there can be delays in updating the real-time flight data, which may cause discrepancies like the one you described.

We recommend monitoring the airlineâ€™s official channels for the most up-to-date information.

scraped_reviews.content: not sure why, but the filters for baggagev don't seem to work anymore. The number of bags entered used to be included in the price of a fare. But now only returns fares without bags.
scraped_reviews.replyContent:
Thank you for your feedback.

Our baggage fee calculator tool relies on the data provided by airlines. This means that sometimes fares without checked bags might be displayed even if you have selected baggage options.

If you have any specific search details or screenshots to share, please do so using our contact form: www.kayak.com/android-support

scraped_reviews.content: Surely this had been superceded by Google maps? kayak only lets you leave a review if you booked through their app, they are clearly on the side of the hotel.

It was my first time to use Kayak and I got what I want. A cheaper and a faster flight to the Philippines. So, I downloaded the app and I will be using it from now on. I highly recommend Kayak. It saves me time and money.

wow!!!! talk about apps using data from other apps: saved flighta on Momondo app with an emailaddress. registered the same email address in Kayak.....and all my saved flights show up in Kayak!!!!!!! what a violation.
This app is phenomenal, I've never seen an app that helps me keep track of all of my reservations like this one does. Truly useful, not just for finding the best deals, but also great at that too!
Kayak is hands down the best flight search engine. I have used many, but always come back to Kayak. Thank you for this wonderful app!
Top place to find tickets. Easy to use, great customer support. Thank you. Job well done.

My flight date was change and no one from Kayak let me know. I found out by calling to confirm my flight. plus it cost me another $50USD to re-issue the ticket for the next day. I had to reschedule bus, pickups etc pretty poor service. Will never use this site EVER again
scraped_reviews.replyContent:
Thank you for sharing your experience.

Please keep in mind that KAYAK is a travel search engine that helps you compare prices but does not control flight schedules. These are managed by the airlines or travel providers you book with.

We recommend contacting the airline directly to discuss compensation or options related to your changed flight.

scraped_reviews.content: Every time I book a room, even though I put 2 or 3 guests. Once confirmed. It states 1 guest. As much as I contact customer service. They claim they'll fix it. I always have to contact the property directly. So basically I pay Kayak fees and I do the Job Kayak should do.
scraped_reviews.replyContent:
Hello and thanks for your feedback.

KAYAK is a free travel search engine that helps you compare prices and options online. The actual bookings and guest details are managed by the accommodation providers.

Kindly contact the accommodation directly to make any changes, as they are ultimately responsible for handling your reservation.

scraped_reviews.content: Rip off city!! Scam Alert!! Don't use kayak. I picked a Date range and was given a price. Paid for the tickets and was given tickets to the wrong departure date, Now the correct dates are $380 additional. Why do you ask for dates if you are changing date ranges, then its my fault for not checking to make sure Kayak is not changing the dates around. Apparently its a feature
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello and thank you for your feedback. Your selected dates will be clearly displayed on the booking page prior to confirming your payment. If you're having trouble contacting the provider you booked with feel free to reach out to our support team at: www.kayak.com/android-support

scraped_reviews.content: For weeks now. the mobile app has been very slow to find flights. on both wifi and on mobile data. I've restarted my phone. still it spins and thinks and doesn't connect. trying other travel apps such as Skyscanner. work a charm. fast and connected.
keeps trying to get me to sign in (and skip button meant to not be clickable )or leave a rating when the rest of the app works well

my ride was secured until they told me I had to show up with a piece of paper bill that said that I lived where I lived and all that stuff 30 minutes before picking up the car... that wasn't able to be done especially in traffic!! this is the kind of business that shouldn't get business! then I went and ran into another car yesterday on the 27th I drove all the way to the airport to be declined because I didn't get off the plane... this is some BS
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thank you for sharing your experience. We take such feedback seriously. Could you please provide more details, such as your booking number and traveler names, via our contact form? Our support team will then be able to look into the matter promptly. You can reach us here: www.kayak.com/android-support

scraped_reviews.content: I love using Kayak to search for flights. very practical and reliable.
just doesn't load stays after typing in address. constantly refreshing
I really like looking at kayak for the best deals, and they are good about alerting you to the air fare deals
Bad UI, used to be good now the sliders and settings control is tedious.
Great work guys..love the app sooooooo muchðŸ˜Š makes traveling booking for my clients easier and faster.
not a stable app, keeps closing down, even after multiple restarts
scraped_reviews.replyContent:
Thank you for your feedback.

To help us investigate and address this problem, please share more details about your device and the issues you're facing using this support form: www.kayak.com/android-support

We appreciate your help and patience as we work to improve your experience.

Best regards,
The KAYAK Support Team

scraped_reviews.content: Never use the "book with Kayak" option. I used it, my credit card was charged and both the airline and the agent Kayak used do not have any information about my booking. both send me in circles and as of now, my payment was taken and no one offers a refund...
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello and thank you for your feedback. We are sorry to hear about your booking experience. Our support team is here to help you identify or contact the company you booked with if you have trouble doing so. Kindly reach out to us at www.kayak.com/android-support

scraped_reviews.content: Great. Simple and what you want. Bought my flight â‚¬70 than what was charged.

I cannot save filters such as preferred landing time for every search. So every time I begin a search for a different destination, I have to reinsert all my filters again such as take off time, landing time, number of stops. I've moved over to other booking Apps now.
scraped_reviews.replyContent:
Hello and thank you for feedback regarding our search filters. We are taking your suggestion into consideration for possible future improvements.

All the Best,
The KAYAK team

scraped_reviews.content: Amazing! I wasn't planning a trip to Barcelona, but I put in my vacation days in Kayak just in case. When Kayak popped up and told me it was less than $400, I couldn't resist! Thanks to Kayak, I'm going for cheap!
hands down the best resource for finding the most economical price with the filters you need. I never book a trip without kayaking

title: Today Weather:Data by NOAA/NWS
description: Today Weather is a beautiful & simple-to-use weather app that provides the world's most accurate local weather forecasts. Features: â— Global weather data sources: Apple WeatherKit, Accuweather.com, Dark Sky, Weatherbit.io, OpenWeatherMap, Foreca.com, Here.com, Open-Meteo.com, Visual Crossing Weather, Global Forecast System (GFS), etc. â— Separated data sources for each country: Weather.gov (U.S. National Weather Service), UK Met Office, ECMWF (European Centre for Medium-Range Weather Forecasts), Weather.gc.ca (Canada's official weather source), Dwd.de (Germany's Meteorological Service), Aemet.es (The State Meteorological Agency of Spain), Meteofrance.com (METEO FRANCE SERVICES), Bom.gov.au (Australia's official weather forecasts), Smhi.se (Swedish Meteorological), Dmi.dk (Danish Meteorological Institute), Yr.no (The Norwegian Meteorological Institute), Met.ie (The Irish National Meteorological Service), MeteoSwiss, JMA (Japan Meteorological Agency), CMA (Chinese Meteorological Administration), KMA (Korea Meteorological Administration), GEM (Global Environmental Multiscale Model). â— Personalize your phone/tablet with the coolest and fully customizable widgets. â— Easy to view weather information anywhere in the world. â— Prepare for anything with 24/7 weather forecast and chance of rain. â— Protect your health with air quality, UV index and pollen count. â— Catch the beautiful moments of sunrise, sunset, full moon night with provided information. â— Severe Weather Warnings: Receive timely alerts for severe weather, helping you stay safe and prepared. â— Radar: A weather radar is used to locate precipitation, calculate its motion, estimate its type (rain, snow, hail, etc.), and forecast its future position and intensity. â— Rain, snow alarm: Alerts you when rain is approaching. â— Take and share photo with weather information for friend. â— Daily weather forecast notification. â— Other useful information: actual temperature, humidity, visibility, dew point, air pressure, wind speed and direction. Widgets: â— Enhance your home screen with beautifully designed, highly functional weather widgets. Explore options like clock weather widgets, radar widgets, detailed weather charts, and the stylish HTC clock weather widget for a personalized experience.. â— Make it truly yours: Customize every detail, from background colors to text styles and icons, for a personalized look that matches your style. Share weather photos with users around the world: â— If youâ€™re a person who likes to travel, take photos and share them with everyone, this feature is very useful for you. It helps you to store photos of the places youâ€™ve been to and these photos will be shared with other users who come to these places. â— You can see photos of the weather around you or places you're going to. â— Let's share your beautiful weather photos with us! Wear OS: â— Wear OS is a streamlined version of the app, and contains only the most important features from the weather service. Search for locations around the world and get a weather forecast for the coming days. â— Weather tile and complication. Thanks so much for trying Today Weather! Don't hesitate to shoot us a note at todayweather.co@gmail.com if you have any questions.
descriptionHTML:
Today Weather is a beautiful & simple-to-use weather app that provides the world's most accurate local weather forecasts.

Features:
â— Global weather data sources: Apple WeatherKit, Accuweather.com, Dark Sky, Weatherbit.io, OpenWeatherMap, Foreca.com, Here.com, Open-Meteo.com, Visual Crossing Weather, Global Forecast System (GFS), etc.
â— Separated data sources for each country: Weather.gov (U.S. National Weather Service), UK Met Office, ECMWF (European Centre for Medium-Range Weather Forecasts), Weather.gc.ca (Canada's official weather source), Dwd.de (Germany's Meteorological Service), Aemet.es (The State Meteorological Agency of Spain), Meteofrance.com (METEO FRANCE SERVICES), Bom.gov.au (Australia's official weather forecasts), Smhi.se (Swedish Meteorological), Dmi.dk (Danish Meteorological Institute), Yr.no (The Norwegian Meteorological Institute), Met.ie (The Irish National Meteorological Service), MeteoSwiss, JMA (Japan Meteorological Agency), CMA (Chinese Meteorological Administration), KMA (Korea Meteorological Administration), GEM (Global Environmental Multiscale Model).
â— Personalize your phone/tablet with the coolest and fully customizable widgets.
â— Easy to view weather information anywhere in the world.
â— Prepare for anything with 24/7 weather forecast and chance of rain.
â— Protect your health with air quality, UV index and pollen count.
â— Catch the beautiful moments of sunrise, sunset, full moon night with provided information.
â— Severe Weather Warnings: Receive timely alerts for severe weather, helping you stay safe and prepared.
â— Radar: A weather radar is used to locate precipitation, calculate its motion, estimate its type (rain, snow, hail, etc.), and forecast its future position and intensity.
â— Rain, snow alarm: Alerts you when rain is approaching.
â— Take and share photo with weather information for friend.
â— Daily weather forecast notification.
â— Other useful information: actual temperature, humidity, visibility, dew point, air pressure, wind speed and direction.

Widgets:
â— Enhance your home screen with beautifully designed, highly functional weather widgets. Explore options like clock weather widgets, radar widgets, detailed weather charts, and the stylish HTC clock weather widget for a personalized experience..
â— Make it truly yours: Customize every detail, from background colors to text styles and icons, for a personalized look that matches your style.

Share weather photos with users around the world:
â— If youâ€™re a person who likes to travel, take photos and share them with everyone, this feature is very useful for you. It helps you to store photos of the places youâ€™ve been to and these photos will be shared with other users who come to these places.
â— You can see photos of the weather around you or places you're going to.
â— Let's share your beautiful weather photos with us!

Wear OS:
â— Wear OS is a streamlined version of the app, and contains only the most important features from the weather service. Search for locations around the world and get a weather forecast for the coming days.
â— Weather tile and complication.

Thanks so much for trying Today Weather! Don't hesitate to shoot us a note at todayweather.co@gmail.com if you have any questions.
summary: Powered by U.S. National Weather Service. Customizable widgets, radar & warnings

scraped_reviews.content: Even has options to customize font and icon size on widgets. Also amazing widget variety, and that's really what I was looking for. I just so happened to find an incredible app that is accurate, easy to use, easy to customize, lovely on the eyes, not cluttered and a chore to look at. Simple, effective, elegant, functional. Bought the ad-free version within days. Use it on my Samsung Galaxy phone and tablet.
scraped_reviews.replyContent:
Hello! ðŸŒ¤ï¸

Wow â€” thank you so much for your wonderful review and support! ðŸ™
Weâ€™re thrilled to hear you enjoy the widgets, customization options, and overall design.
Your feedback truly motivates us to keep improving Today Weather. ðŸ’™

â€“ Today Weather Team

scraped_reviews.content: Paid version. This has just about everything you'd want in a weather app: radar, 7 and 15 day forecasts, sun and moon rise/set, wind, detailed text description of weather, rain forecast graph, and other handy items. The best widgets I've seen in a weather app. I wish I could make the default area covered in the Radar feature panel a bit smaller. Good tablet layout. Worth the money. The Today weather data source is extremely accurate no matter where you are. It always works and never has bugs.
scraped_reviews.replyContent:
Hi, Thanks for the review. If you find the app useful, recommend it to your friends. Your good experience is our pleasure. If you have any questions, please contact todayweather.co@gmail.com.
Have a nice day,
TW Team.

scraped_reviews.content: I'm trying 4 different weather apps before I commit to one long term. There's a lot to like about this app but the fundamental flaw is that it is *always* 5Â° to 8Â° different from other 4 apps I'm using as a control group (AccuWeather, Google Weather, Weather, and Weather Underground, all of which cluster within 3Â° of each other, at most.) It makes me curious about their source data.

Very nice, accurate and reliable. no glitch or crashes on my android. 29 customizable widgets, well done! I love the look, well organized and aestheticly pleasing. a ton of weather providers to choose from even in the free version. I opted for the yearly plan $5 bucks. I am switching from MyRadar to Today Weather after 5 years. you definitely want to give this one try.

Overall I do like this app for its user interface and the choice of sources. There are a few improvements that could be made such as a hurricane tracker. But as of the most recent update, when the app sends out a notification, the status bar information disappears. Once the notification is dismissed, the status bar reappears. Please fix.

The last, and best, of the old school weather apps. Shows you all the weather details like humidity (many modern weather apps hide this stuff). It has a simple, customizable UI that lets you hide stuff you don't want. The widgets have a refresh button and there are tons of widgets to choose from. Doesn't have a subscription, and includes multiple weather sources like AccuWeather and NOAA. This is the last of the old school good weather apps to feature all of the above things.

Best by far!!! The free weather apps that come with my Samsung phone are riddled with ads and pop ups making it nearly impossible to find the information you're looking for. Additionally, you have two choices for a widget and if those don't work for your screen set up, you're out of luck. Today Weather has an amazing amount of widgets and when you open it to find out the details of the upcoming weather, there are only one or two, well placed ads and no pop ups. Take a chance on this one!!!

Recently this app hasn't been loading at all. I can see that it was just recently updated, but this has been happening on and off for almost 8 months. it was something I could ignore before since it only lasted an hour or so, but now I can't load anything. ðŸ˜… Otherwise, this is my go-to weather app bc of the accuracy. EDIT: Tried to switch weather source, and the app crashed.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi! Thanks for your feedback and for using Today Weather. We're sorry to hear about the recent loading issue. Could you please try switching to a different weather data source in the app settings? This can help determine if the issue is tied to a specific provider. Let us know how it goes!

scraped_reviews.content: use to be amazing. Its been getting neglected as of late. Now when you first open it, it always says "Oppps, something went wrong". This is with five bars of connection and the only app that can't see a connection when first opening. closing it and reopening it immediately and it works find. Wait an hour and try it again and you get the "opps" error again
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi, sorry for the issue. Could you confirm if the error happens on your phone or watch? Also, please try switching to another weather data source in the app settings to see if it helps. Weâ€™re here to assist and improve your experience. Thanks for your support!

scraped_reviews.content: I really like this weather app. It's very simple and has everything you need and nothing you don't. It's very lightweight and loads quickly. It has lots of different options for where you can source your weather data from. The design is clean, modern and attractive. Overall, I really love it and it's my new main weather app for the forseeable future.

This is just a great overall weather app! Accurate forecasts, the ability and flexibility to pick your data source for the weather forecasts and radar (very useful if you're traveling, especially out of country), no intrusive ads and really smooth and easy navigation of the app. There's also plenty types of customizable widgets with settings and notification info/alerts. I'd say maybe improve on the aesthetics of the app and keep improving the speed and gathering of weather data. Thanks!ðŸ‘
scraped_reviews.replyContent:
Thank you so much for your thoughtful and positive review! ðŸ˜Š Weâ€™re thrilled youâ€™re enjoying the app and its features. We hope over time it continues to meet your expectations. If it does, weâ€™d be grateful if you consider updating your review to 5 stars! Your support means the world to us.

Best regards,
The Today Weather Team

scraped_reviews.content: Missing wind data. The wind plugin is inadequate. It would be nice to have the wind info in the daily and hourly sections, similar to the temperature. Otherwise, it is clean looking and adequate for general use. I paid for the app to support the team. Respond: Seems the team doesn't read email and only respond to review only. Disappointing. There is no detail wind data in the "next 7 days" section. Also, 7 days is sometimes not far ahead enough. Please add more days or another section.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Pháº§n giÃ³ cÅ©ng cÃ³ á»Ÿ pháº§n miÃªu táº£ chi tiáº¿t cá»§a ngÃ y Ä‘Ã³ báº¡n, báº¡n xem láº¡i giÃºp mÃ¬nh nhÃ© :)

scraped_reviews.content: General very good. I was disappointed to see the links to the source data was removed for allergy information tho. Maybe it's no longer coming from AccuWeather, but it was handy to be able to drill down for more details. Especially since only grass and tree pollen is recorded now. On the plus side, more data about air quality tho. Still not sure it's worth $7 to remove ads when other apps are cheaper, but still making up my mind.

I've got a severe thunderstorm going on right on top of me, & there's no mention of it, nor any lightening tracking (nor anything else, for that matter), on my phone! Come on folks! Please do better. I uninstalled Weather Bug because it wouldn't update my Actual location (instead of a location over 10 miles away), & here in CO - that's a whole different set of weather!!!

The free version of this NOAA/NWS app has all the features I want and need, as well as many extra ones I can use if desired. It only took me a few minutes to navigate the app and then create my own widget to use from its many templates and customization choices. There's no "ad or promotion overload" to blow up my notifications, either, unlike other apps. This app is excellent.

FINALLY! A weather app that gives me all of the information I want, without enormous pictures, unnecessary video, or "weather news" (what the hell is weather news?), in an easy-to-see format that doesn't invite accidental taps or scrolling. The widgets look nice and clean. I used the free version for a week, and the only ad I saw was for upgrade. I tapped it to see how much it cost, and was first disappointed because it was monthly, but then saw "forever" for $9.49. YES, PLEASE!

I've been using for 5 years. I love the hourly weather accuracy & ability to save multiple locations, even international. The UI takes a bit to get used to, but is clean and customizable & has dark mode! The free version is so great I still have not bought the premium version, but I would just to support the developer because it is a great app, minimal ads, ads are the type you can easily ignore, they don't push you to buy the premium like most apps, and premium is reasonably priced! 10/10
scraped_reviews.replyContent:
Hi, Thank you for sharing your experience with Today Weather! We are happy to hear that our app is easy and intuitive for you. Our team always tries to make sure users have a great time using our app. For any questions, please contact todayweather.co@gmail.com.
Have a nice day,
TW Team.

scraped_reviews.content: This is by far the best weather app I have used yet. They acknowledge that they get their data from NOAA, they have ads, but nowhere near as intensively as the others. It has everything I want to see arranged in a very pleasing UI. The widgets are better than most others as well if you like to have the info on your screen at all times... Great app, thanks!!!!
scraped_reviews.replyContent:
Hi! Thank you for your review. Itâ€™s great to hear that you have a positive experience at Today Weather. Our team will be happy to hear that their hard work has paid off! If thereâ€™s anything we can do to serve you further, let us know via todayweather.co@gmail.com.
Have a wonderful day!
TW Team.

scraped_reviews.content: In the radar screen at the bottom, there's no way to save your settings. I make changes, and it always goes back to "wind", Celsius, and Km. You must have a way to save those settings in your radar screen. I have saved those settings in the main app itself but radar screen does not maintain those settings. Please fix this. Otherwise a great app.

Update:April 2019 The ads showed up again and I paid the annual subscription and they went away for a day but they are back and are still there. I wrote to the developer with no reply. If they don't reply soon, dropping down to one star and will uninstall. Nice, clean interface. Data appears accurate when compared to other weather sources. Nice widgets too.

Looks great, love the UI. However, I don't like the way you add other locations. I shouldn't have to add a location to just look at weather in another city. Then I have to go delete them later. I also had a lot of issues where I'd be looking at the overview of the weather and it would say "30% snow" but when you click on its says we're supposed to get 6 or 7 inches. It makes it seem incredibly inaccurate. Sometimes I also don't get weather alerts when they're active on other sites/apps.

Needed a replacement for DarkSky and like the general clean look of this app. Enough that I paid for a subscription. However, I would really like to request the ability to rearrange the order of the information. For example i'd like to have current weather map to be the top most item, not the last. Speaking of maps, i'd be nice to have more view options for the map as well. Some small improvements and this could be a five star app.

One of the best weather apps. It's user friendly and customizable. But it has its issues. I sometimes open the app and all of the text, like the temperature, location name, etc. is gone and I can only see the pictures and colors. So then I have to restart it. Also it would be nice for there to be a way to manually refresh the readings. And unless there's a high chance of precipitation it doesn't show the precipitation chance at all. If they fix the text bug it'll be a lot better.

This is the weather app I've been looking for for years. It has a clean, simple, beautiful interface with the option to arrange information however you'd like. You can also choose your forecast source from a long list of sites. I paid the $3 for the ad-free version and it is very worth it! My only complaint after a few days of use is that the app sometimes doesn't load or only loads partial information for a weather location. If this issue is fixed, I'd easily give it 5 stars!

I mostly like the app, great layout, I like the options, etc. My only gripe is the "feels like" temp is always wrong. It's not the data source either, as I've a) switched the source with same results, and b) checked the data source website and their number is different than what the app shows. So it makes the widget pointless to me. App has great potential otherwise though, I really do like it

Wow! I've had this weather app for a few years now and I think it's one of the best there is! Feature rich for the free version and even better for the paid (which I have). What really makes this app awesome is it's layout. Easy to read, organized very well with lots of options (especially customizing the look as a widget). With the paid version you can pick your weather information source from a nice provided selection. Give this a try. If you like it as much as I do go for the paid version!
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thank you so much for your support and for taking the time to share your experience! We're thrilled that you enjoy the app's features, layout, and customization options. Your feedback motivates us to keep improving. If you ever have suggestions, feel free to reach out. Happy forecasting! ðŸ˜ŠðŸŒ¤ï¸

scraped_reviews.content: I love the app. My only "complaint" is really a feature request. As a bicycle commuter, I need to be especially attentive to rain predictions and (more in fall and winter) the possibility of falling temperatures during the day, so I can dress appropriately. Your "Chance of Precipitation" chart is great for the rain issue. But your hourly temperatures (since they're just a series of number) make it easy to miss falling temperatures that might affect my afternoon commute. It would help me (and, I suspect, a lot of others) if you could create a line graph showing temperature for the next 24 hours as well. Ideally (for me) this would be superimposed on the "Chance of Precipitation" chart -- but, of course, it could be a separate chart as well.

I love the graphics, but the app no longer changes location when I go to a different place. I'm in an area where the weather can be radically different only a few miles away, and the app doesn't even show information for where I am, but instead for a town 22 miles from here! I was going to upgrade to Premium but I won't unless more accuracy can be guaranteed.

I purchased this app back in 2017 and it's been my go-to ever since. The information display is consistent, I appreciate being able to choose what theme to use, although I'd appreciate it if it would follow the default phone theme (feature request!). I really like that I can change between different data sources, especially since there can be differences between them regarding current and future weather conditions. The widgets I've tried work well and can be customized, although you have to make your choices when creating the widget to begin with; not a big deal to me. Changing data sources will affect how the widget displays. Overall, I really like Today Weather. I've tried others over the past couple of years, but I always come back to this one. Thank you!

I really like this app. It has a lot of great info. I like the widget because you can click on the clock and it brings up your alarms or click the weather and it brings that up (without going to the web). Unfortunately I have a new wall paper that is white where I have this and I can no longer see the widget. The stock weather widget has a semitransparent gray background. This one does allow for showing pictures but it takes up an extra row which I don't want to do. I'd come back if fixed.

Great app that's only a couple tweaks away from five stars. You need to make the panels rearrangeable - the radar shouldn't be at the bottom - and while the pictures are gorgeous, they need a temperature component. I'm getting too many palm trees at 18F! (EDIT: There are a lot of bugs with the weather providers. Several of them have the "feels like" temperature wrong and AccuWeather shows the previous day's forecast.)

I'm a long time user of the paid version. It used to be wonderful. The past year the widget disappears frequently, have to remove and replace it. Today, I noticed the radar no longer gives the future radar estimation. I click on the map, hit the play button and it takes me backwards 2 hours and then to current. I don't need to see where the rain WAS, I need to see where it IS and where it's HEADED.
scraped_reviews.replyContent:
Hello,
We have just updated the feature to help users change the data source for the radar.
To do this, please go to the app's settings. And if you want to use the old radar view, please select global radar map.
TW Team.

scraped_reviews.content: Used to love this app. I'm deleting it after I write my new review. It's happened several time now, that the temperature is wrong...no...WAY OFF! It's about 45 degrees out now and this app says 76 degrees. I deleted my city and reinstalled it. It was right for about 5 seconds, then went back to 76. Who need that garbage. There's plenty other weather apps that will at least give me the right temperature.

I was sad to have seen Wunderground taken off. I deleted it off my phone. Glad I checked back later to see The Weather Channel on. Rain accumulation, and hurricane tracking would be a nice addition. I think the weather map could be better. Integrated simultaneously cloud cover, rain precipitation, and lightning would be very nice along with a lightning ring. .

Finding the right weather app is shockingly hard. This one is clean, simple, and easy to read with some customization. There are a few things I would like to see added: View percent chance of precipitation on a graph instead of reading the summary. Reorder the different sections by choice. Ability to see more than 6 days on the future temperature chart.

this review would be 5 stars however there are a few important things missing. The widget background transparency is not adjustable so if you have a light or busy wallpaper it is impossible to see. This may be fixed by simply added the ability to change font colors, but it is also not available. That being said it's still the best weather app I've used.

I installed and deleted this app only today. This is why: INSTALLED because it has an Editor's Choice selection. Installed and started to set it up. Immediately uninstalled it. UNINSTALLED AND DELETED: I see no reason why anyone should have to pay for any feature on a weather app, that is automatically included on many, many other apps that have no in-app purchases for the non-Pro version, if the app has that choice to begin with.
scraped_reviews.replyContent:
Hi Connie,
We provides very much data source, data sources are not FREE!
We need the free to maintain the app.
Thank you!

scraped_reviews.content: I usually hate most play store apps, but this widget is very nice. Being able to select text and icon color is also great. The weather app itself is very simple and easy to navigate too. It shows me just what I want to see (the weather, lol) and nothing else. The radar/map is easy to navigate to, and most importantly, has an easy to access cloud cover button, which is very important to me. I might pay for this app just because it's so simple and convenient.
scraped_reviews.replyContent:
Hi! Thank you for the review. Itâ€™s great to hear that you have a positive experience at Today Weather. Our team will be happy to hear that their hard work has paid off! If thereâ€™s anything we can do to serve you further, let us know via todayweather.co@gmail.com.
Have a wonderful day!
TW Team.

scraped_reviews.content: Great app, horrible support. I've emailed the developers about annoying "small craft advisory" notifications as I drive through different cities on the highway, but got no reply. They are part of "severe" weather alerts and cannot be disabled individually. I get them daily. I want severe alerts, but not pointless ones. Edit: after many tries, support got back and fixed the issue. Small craft advisories now appear in the app, but a notification is not sent.

Definitely a top tier weather app. I LOVE the animated weather icons, that even animate in the status bar! Would love to be able to have a background color or image on the home screen vs. a block picture. The one thing I wish they'd beef up is the radar. It's ok, but you can't view past radar, only future. I would also like it if the radar preview on the home screen actually showed a snapshot of the current radar. It's just a generic map right now that you have to click into to view radar.
scraped_reviews.replyContent:
Hi, Thanks for your helpful suggestion. It has been sent to the development team and they will consider it for appropriate modifications in the following updates. If you have any questions or need help, please email us at todayweather.co@gmail.com for more support.
Thank you,
TW Team.

scraped_reviews.content: Love the clean interface and it has most of the information I want in my weather app. There are accessibility issues though. Condition icons should be described when reading charts like 24 hour and 7 day forecast. The precipitation chart reads out nothing when navigating wit TalkBack. Several buttons in the app report "unlabeled button if app were fully accessible, I'd probably pay for it., '.

Arrived on this app after Dark Sky ended. Initial impressions are positive! I love the wind map as the button to the radar screen. I've seen the wind map before but never occurred to me that it would be useful in a weather app! Seeing the data sources was cool, but could not find my back to it. I was a bit salty after Dark Sky ending for Android, but this is going to help with that for sure!

The first thing I noticed is that the app runs in full screen mode for some reason, covering my notification bar while it's open, making it incredibly awkward to use. I was always planning on paying to get rid of ads, but I can't even try out the app for 5 minutes without being bombarded by HUGE fullscreen ads that don't have an option to close them. There might be a good app hidden behind all this junk, but I don't really want to pay just to find out. Covering my navigation bar is NEVER okay.

Love the app. The UI is beautiful and the dark theme is great. I wish there were a few more options for the widgets but moreover, I wish the widgets were customizable. For example, I wish I could edit in a background and make it semi-transparent because wallpapers vary device to device. Light text on a light background doesn't work well.

I downloaded Today Weather years ago after Dark Sky became unavailable, and it has been a solid free replacement on my Android phone. I like that you can select which weather service's data you prefer to populate in the app, and the user interface is well designed while still providing a lot of information. Keep up the good work!
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello! ðŸ˜Š Thank you so much for your thoughtful review! Weâ€™re honored to be your go-to weather app after Dark Sky. Weâ€™re glad you enjoy the flexibility of choosing data sources and the detailed yet clean interface. Your support means a lot â€” weâ€™ll keep working hard to make it even better! ðŸŒ¤ï¸ â€“ TW Team

scraped_reviews.content: Looking for a replacement for NWS Now, which seems to have disappeared. Overall this has everything I want in a weather app. A couple of suggestions: 1) In the widgets with pictures, put a dark outline around the temperature so it shows up on light backgrounds. 2) I like being able to set a custom sound for alerts, so I can distinguish a weather alert from an incoming email. But please, add a feature where we can select what alerts we get notifications for. I don't need my phone whistling at me every 30 minutes for a Coastal Flood Watch. I do want it to whistle for a severe thunderstorm warning. Adding these minor tweaks would make it a 5 star app.

Like another reviewer said, not every alert needs to be categorized as severe. There was supposed to be snow today in the morning, it snowed for less than an hour, less than an inch of snow came down, the snow didn't stick, temperatures rose so no freezing and I'm still getting "severe" test alerts. Fantastic. I've gotten over 7 notifications, about 1-2 every hour. Being a test alert means that it doesn't even provide any info. It's literal spam. Do yourself a favor and find a better weather app

Interface is great and the app works smoothly overall. Unfortunately the weather forecast is rarely accurate, especially temperature. For example, in my area today, the forecast was 72F and for a large chunk of the afternoon we were in the 78F to 81F range. Not only that but the *current* temp was showing 73F when it was around 79F. If I can't trust the temperature the app is not very useful.

Beautiful app. Great, functional widgets. Widgets shortcut to alarm clock, weather, and calendar. App itself shows excellent radar snapshot that loads quickly and shows a layman useful image with projected movement for a few hours. The by the hour weather predictions are great for temperatures and there are pollen counts and the like for those it matters to. I deduct 1 star due to the precipitation prediction being hit or miss, but that may not be the app's fault.

If you have more than one location saved, you cannot tell it which location to report on.  So for example if you are travelling to another city and you add that in, it may warn you of rain because your home base is rainy instead of using whatever location that you want it to report on.  There needs to be a way to sort out the multiple locations and tell the app which one should be the current setting.

title: Camera for Android
description:
A simple and faster way to capture moments.
This is an native system HD camera app. You can easily to shoot excellent photos, utilizing all advantage of your phone or tablet.

Key features:
- 3 modes: camera, video recorder & panorama
- HD camera and video features
- Pinch to zoom
- smart panorama shooting 
- Countdown Timer

title: Microsoft 365 Copilot
description:
The Microsoft 365 Copilot app is your everyday productivity app for work and life that helps you find and edit files, scan documents, and create content on the go with access to Microsoft 365 Copilot Chat*, Word, Excel, PowerPoint, and PDFs all in one app. (formerly the Microsoft 365 (Office) app)

With Copilot for work, easily ask, create, and draft in a simplified chat experience to boost productivity.

*Copilot Chat in the Microsoft 365 Copilot app is available for Microsoft 365 Enterprise, Academic, and SMB subscribers with a work or education account. Microsoft 365 Personal and Family subscribers and free accounts can access Microsoft Copilot at copilot.microsoft.com and on the Copilot mobile app. It is available in these specific markets: https://support.microsoft.com/en-us/office/supported-languages-for-microsoft-copilot-94518d61-644b-4118-9492-617eea4801d8.

Word, Excel, PowerPoint, and Copilot all in one app:
â€¢ Collaborate with Copilot, your AI assistant, to catch up, ask questions, and draft content.
â€¢ Use Word to write and edit documents like resumes with professional templates.
â€¢ Use PowerPoint with tools like Presenter Coach to practice your presentation.
â€¢ Use Excel to manage your budget with spreadsheet templates.
â€¢ Try Designer* to create designs and edit photos in seconds with the power of AI.
*Designer is only available for personal Microsoft accounts. A Microsoft 365 Personal and Family subscription will be required to continue using premium features.

PDF capabilities:
â€¢ Scan PDF files and convert them into Word documents with the PDF converter tool.
â€¢ Edit PDF files on your device quickly and easily while on the go.
â€¢ PDF Reader allows you to access and sign PDFs.

Anyone can download the Microsoft 365 Copilot app for free. Access and save documents to the cloud by connecting a Microsoft Account (for OneDrive or SharePoint) or by connecting to a third-party cloud storage provider. Logging in with a personal Microsoft account or a work or school account connected to a Microsoft 365 subscription will unlock premium features within the app.

Subscription & Privacy Disclaimer

Monthly Microsoft 365 Personal and Family subscriptions purchased from the app will be charged to your App Store account and will automatically renew within 24 hours prior to the end of the current subscription period unless auto-renewal is disabled beforehand. You can manage your subscriptions in your App Store account settings.

This app is provided by either Microsoft or a third-party app publisher and is subject to a separate privacy statement and terms and conditions. Data provided using this store and this app may be accessible to Microsoft or the third-party app publisher, as applicable, and transferred to, stored and processed in the United States or any other country where Microsoft or the app publisher and their affiliates or service providers maintain facilities.
Please refer to Microsoft's EULA for Terms of Service for Microsoft 365. By installing the app, you agree to these terms and conditions: https://support.office.com/legal?llcc=en-gb&aid=SoftwareLicensingTerms_en-gb.htm
