Other replies from the maker say it's to maintain the game which is nonsense, this game does not require hundreds of ads from every player to run, this is an extremely malicious business practice. When I go to pay taxes I get two options, either I can watch an ad to skip paying them or I can pay them normally. Sounds good right? Well it's not, because you get an ad when you pay normally too.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi! We get your point of view on the ads. Unfortunately, as you may understand, they are necessary to manage the expenses of running the game. Our dev team is working on optimizing the time between ads so you can play more without interruptions. Thank you!

scraped_reviews.content: I really think you should give this game a try. It is a lot of fun, the clicking is not over powered like it is in many of these money games. They also offer far more things to do with your money. The only thing is the non-optional ads. Every time you buy stocks, buy property, buy an item, refill construction resources...every time you sell stocks! It is too much and constantly interrupts the game. They already have multitudes of optional ads to watch that I use all the time and a banner ad.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi! We get your point of view on the ads. Unfortunately, as you may understand, they are necessary to manage the expenses of running the game. Our dev team is working on optimizing the time between ads so you can play more without interruptions. Thank you!

scraped_reviews.content: 5 stars if ads got fixed. A really fun game tarnished by constant ads. I'd be willing to pay to remove ads, but having to watch an ad every time you spend money is beyond ridiculous. if you charged like $5 to remove ads I'd pay it in an instant. I'd consider $10 but not 100% certain that is the right amount. Also, not sure what the threshold for when cash on hand updates, but if we could see either a timer, or if the cash updated in real time that would be amazing.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi! Thanks for your feedback, it's really helpful for us to understand our players' need better. We'll use it to improve gameplay! Should you have more suggestions, please send them to our team at tterba26@gmail.com!

scraped_reviews.content: Pros. So far this game has been really refreshing. There are many different avenues to take to make money. There are no micro transactions. You just play. That being said I wouldn't mind paying 1 or 3 dollars to remove ads and still receive the benefits of watching an ad. Con. The game gets confused sometimes if you don't close the app after you get off of it. I had 800k worth of cars being sold but since I never fully closed the game when I got back on to check it never gave me my money.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thank you for playing the game and for being so invested in it, we'll take your suggestions into account for sure!

scraped_reviews.content: So far an amazing game! I love the simple yet professionally designed interface, and it is an actual demonstration of what a game about idling should be; it's a game you can get away from for a while, restock on things such as taxis and construction resources, and then close for the night. I do think there should be a way to get ride of ads however, such as 5$. Overall a great game.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Great suggestions, Cael! Thank you for playing the game and for being so invested in it, we'll take your suggestions into account for sure!

scraped_reviews.content: it's a fun game. I wish you could upgrade the amount of money per tap more. I also wish there were fewer ads. I wish the money per tap reward timer would start after you closed the ad. the most annoying thing is when i open the game hours after I stop playing and I haven't earned any money. I close the game with $800k balance after I've upgraded and bought stocks, etc. and 8 hours later, I open the game excited to do more upgrades, and my balance is still $800k. it's really frustrating.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello! Thank you so much for such a detailed review! We are glad to know that you care about the game. Your feedback will help us make the game better. We will try our best to take your suggestions into consideration for future updates.

scraped_reviews.content: This game is essentially just adware. It's next to impossible to get anywhere without watching dozens of ads just to get your feet off the ground. Then each time you do make progress (i.e. starting or expanding a business) it's another ad. I get the dev has to make money, but games lose a lot of appeal when 40% of my gameplay is watching fake gameplay of some other app. An ad free mode would do a lot of good.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello! Thank you so much for such a detailed review! We are glad to know that you care about the game. Your feedback will help us make the game better. We will try our best to take your suggestions into consideration for future updates.

scraped_reviews.content: Was a pretty good game until they added stealing your businesses due to the addition of required taxes that have to be paid every few days (requiring loading the game and watching ads every few days) [at least something along that line]. I was pretty upset at losing my businesses simply because I did not log in as often as they required (an apparent app change). No problem. I originally had everything maxed out in short order, so no need to play it anymore anyway. I uninstalled it. Bye.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Dear Curtis, we understand your frustration, change is sometimes difficult, especially when you're used to a certain version of the game. We kindly ask you to give it another try and spend some time playing, you may find that it's actually surprisingly fun! Thank you!

scraped_reviews.content: The game is very fun, but the only downside is that when you upgrade the clicks, it only upgrades for $10 per click, and it doesn't go any higher than that. I would have rated a five-star if you're able to upgrade like the clicks to like $1,000 per click or more. So then, when people click, do we click for a reason. Then they will see their money go up. So please increase the upgrades for the clicking. but I don't mind the ads. The only thing I wish you guys can add a countdown when a ad comes
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi there, we are glad to see youâ€™re enjoying our game. Thank you for this feedback, we will take it into consideration as we continue to improve the game!

scraped_reviews.content: This is a great game! It takes a while to get going which I appreciate! However once you purchase the holding companies, you own the stock market, and own all of the real estate, the game kind of get boring in the sense that all you can do is crypto trade until you have 95 trillion to get the last unique item and slowly work your way toward the final insignias. There needs to be more to buy whether it be real estate, more businesses, more stocks, more collectibles to purchase.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi, David! We are thrilled you like the game and understand how you feel about the ads. We're always working on improving your game experience, so keep checking back often!

scraped_reviews.content: This is an absolutely great concept, just it's impossible to actually make money in this game after a while. It would probably take hours just to even get 1 million dollars in the game. The ads aren't frequent, and most of the ads you get are purely from getting a clicking bonus. But, they sometimes don't even give the reward. It isn't even that fun either. It's just farming with no excitement, progress, or motivation to get further in the game. This game has potential but for now, it's a WIP.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thank you for your feedback! We're always working on improving our app. We hope that as we improve the game, your experience will only get better! If you have any opinions, ideas or suggestions that you think we could use, feel free to contact us.

scraped_reviews.content: I've been playing this game for over a month now as a little time killer. Overall, I think it's pretty enjoyable if you like to see numbers go up up up. Regarding the ads, I got sick of them too since trading stocks is buy/sell x100. I turn off my data to avoid them, but that shouldn't be necessary. Also, end game trying to get the achievements is basically log in, buy stocks that crashed and high cap crypto, log out, wait 30 minutes, sell repeat. I wish there were more ways to grind to the end.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi, Matt! We are thrilled you like the game and understand how you feel about the ads. We're always working on improving your game experience, so keep checking back often!

scraped_reviews.content: Awesome game!!! I really enjoy how it is a clicker game that you don't have to constantly click. However after an extended period of play and aquirering everything aside a few insignias and the last "Unique iteam" I dont see what exactly else to do. I would love to see and update with more real estate, businesses, stock options, and collections. Overall Great game only reason it's a 4/5 star is I want more. ðŸ‘
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi there, we are glad to see youâ€™re enjoying our game. Thank you for this feedback, we will take it into consideration as we continue to improve the game!

scraped_reviews.content: Game starts off decent, not too many ads, then you realize that pretty much the only way to actually buy anything is by using an auto clicker because the progression is so abysmally slow. Then once you have the money to start buying stuff, you get ads every few taps, and I don't mean the short 5-15 second ads you can close out of, no they're pushing FULL 30-60+ second ads, some of which are just a 15 second ad that loops 4+ times and the game basically becomes ad watching simulator. What a joke.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi! We are sorry you feel this way. However, as you might know, ads are necessary to manage the expenses of running the game. We have been working on improving ads display so that time between ads allows for fewer interruptions. Thank you for your kind feedback.

scraped_reviews.content: At first this game is interesting and somewhat addicting. Fun to play. The ads are a bit intrusive, but I can live with that. THE BAD PART: If you don't play the game for a few days, your tax bill is due, you get inundated with penalties, and rent income stops until you pay, which you can only pay by selling assets (unless you have a lot of money). So you go backwards. Why not have tax automatic? I don't wanna play now and just want to uninstall and play something else.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi! We're sorry for the inconvenience, however this is our game mechanics. Feel free to start over or, if you have any other questions, send them to our support.

scraped_reviews.content: A unique and yet simple fun game. While it's super simple and quite realistic ish game it could still use a few tweaks and add ons. It would be nice to see more ways to recive income and more to spend it on that could positively or negatively affect your career depending on choices. But it's definitely a different approach for a clicker game and I approve.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Tyler. We are glad to see youâ€™re enjoying our game. Thank you for this feedback, we will take it into consideration as we continue to improve the game!

scraped_reviews.content: Several bugs. The game will not let me sell skyscrapers. The project list says that they are ready to sell, but they don't have the '$' symbol that other buildings have when you can sell. Big bug to get money back. The game will not let me progress to level 6. And then, if you watch an ad to bypass the waiting period, the ad will play, but the waiting period clock is still there. I've watched 3 ads once and still had to wait. FIX THE BUGS!
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello! The issue has been brought to our attention, but we have already fixed it and everything should be fine now. If not please, contact our support team using this email: tterba26@gmail.com We will be happy to help!

scraped_reviews.content: The cart gets emptied itself when opened. I added different items from the application and it shows the count of items on the cart icon. As soon as open the cart, all items disappear and I cannot checkout because nothing is there. I tried restarting the app, even updated the app to latest version but same issue. This is very inconvenient as I had some credits which are due to expire today. May be that's why the app won't let me checkout!!! ðŸ˜•
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi, please clear your app's data and cache in your phone settings. This should fix the issue. If it persists, reach out via email at care@noon.com for UAE or KSA, and egypt@noon.com for Egypt with subject line "Review - [Google Play - Zubair Hameed]." We'll assist you further. Thanks.

scraped_reviews.content: Noon's subscription is the absolute worst. Even though they're all under the same name, each Noon product has its own rules. Noon Food is different, Noon Minutes is different. When I pay for a yearly subscription, I shouldn't have to pay extra for deliveries, and there shouldn't be any catches. But with Noon, it's just a waste. You pay for the yearly sub, and then you still have to pay extra. Seriously, don't bother with their subscription. Get Amazon Prime instead; it's a much better deal.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hala, could you please share more information through our support channels? We'll look into this in detail. For UAE or KSA, you can drop us an email at care@noon.com, and as for Egypt, it is egypt@noon.com with the email subject line "Review - [Google Play - Rafqut Mehedin Tomo]. Thank you.

scraped_reviews.content: One thing i hate and think Noon 15 Minutes should improve is that, when an item is out of stock, you should not charge the customer for the missing item, and please refund the money if you have charged them. It's frustrating to see an item missing during delivery but you are neither notified, nor was you refunded (they make you pay for the missing item). So unless the customer go out of their way to ask for refund, they just proceed life as it is and take people's money wrongly.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hala , thank you for sharing your feedback. Weâ€™re sorry to hear that your experience was just okay. We're always striving to improve, so if thereâ€™s anything specific we can do better, please feel free to get in touch with us at care@noon.com (for UAE and KSA) with the email subject line "Review - [Google PlayFaas Ihin-]." Thank you

scraped_reviews.content: Not ready for prime time. Delivery time is awful for most of the items, add at least 2 days to their delivery estimates. They devide 10 item orders to 10 individual orders/deliveries, waste of time and fuel. The app does not allow you to order more than quantity of 10 for each item, you have to place separate orders to get more than 10 pcs. There are a lot of dishonest sellers and there's no seller rating system. They don't allow reviews, so, I prefer to order from Amazon to save a lot of time.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Ataa, we are extremely sorry you didnâ€™t have the shopping experience we intend to provide. Could you please share your order number or more information on the issue through a direct message on our Facebook or Twitter. We'll look into this in detail and fix it for a smoother shopping experience in the future. We are always here to help. Shukran!

scraped_reviews.content: I have been having issues with this one restaurant which im unfortunately forced to order from as its the only the few restaurants open when im done from work, noon has not only failed to ensure its quality, double check the accuracy of the items listed, maintain standards for food handling, but also failed to address this issue. My complaint has been pending for almost a month now, i will no longer be using this platform.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello! We care about ensuring every customer has an ideal experience. Please contact us via email at (care@noon.com) if you're in Saudi Arabia or the UAE, or at (egypt@noon.com) if you're in Egypt, using the subject line 'Review - [Your name]'. Our team will assist you promptly. Thank you.

scraped_reviews.content: Horrible experience. I bought a blender with a good deal and unable to recieve it for 20 days now. I contacted them thrice whatsapp & phone and nobody is able to help. Last time, they asked to cancel the order because they are unable to get it from the supplier, yet the product is available on the site from the same supplier. Update : I contacted you again and you are still replying with ridiculous templates . The order is still on "processing status" and the product is still available on ur site
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Hossam, we'd love to hear about your shopping experience to improve ourselves in serving you better. Would you please be kind enough to share your order number or more information through a direct message on Facebook or Twitter. We'll get in touch with you to solve any issue you're facing. We are always here to help. Shukran!

scraped_reviews.content: I ordered from the Noon app and had the worst experience ever. My shipment was supposed to arrive on time, but even after 4 days of constant struggle with customer care, emails, and follow-ups, I still didnâ€™t receive my order. Noon itself didnâ€™t seem to know where my shipment was. After getting completely exhausted and frustrated, I ended up cancelling my order. This was the worst delivery experience Iâ€™ve had with Noon. Very disappointed.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hala, could you please share more information through our support channels? We'll look into this in detail. For UAE or KSA, you can drop us an email at care@noon.com, and as for Egypt, it is egypt@noon.com with the email subject line "Review - [Google Play - Muhammad Usman]. Thank you.

scraped_reviews.content: I have got the worst experience. I made an order today. it shows delivered but I'd didn't get my order. when I try to reach out for help all your customer care assistant say is let us get back to you in 10 minutes. up to now. the driver is not picking up at all. so they call with one number (04.......) i pick and no one talks then boom I am getting an email saying I am unreachable. so frustrating. the worst online experience i have ever got
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hala, could you please share more information through our support channels? We'll look into this in detail. For UAE or KSA, you can drop us an email at care@noon.com, and as for Egypt, it is egypt@noon.com with the email subject line "Review - [Google Play - Akatukunda Sheila]. Thank you.

scraped_reviews.content: I bought a middle st version mobile phone but after a few months it got locked due to country code and noon not accept exchange. Another thing was that I bought JBL Flip 6 and sent it home. But its battery does not last long and it does not connect quickly to Bluetooth devices. Since it has a 6 month warranty, I had the whole box with me. I asked to exchange it but they said it was not possible. I have deleted my account with a promise not to buy anything from noon from today. Thank you!
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hala, could you please share more information through our support channels? We'll look into this in detail. For UAE or KSA, you can drop us an email at care@noon.com, and as for Egypt, it is egypt@noon.com with the email subject line "Review - [Google Play - Khum Magar]. Thank you.

scraped_reviews.content: I will never trust or buy from Noon again. I was ordering some groceries and added a pack of blueberries for AED 7. When I tried to add more items, the order was processed automatically, and AED 22 was deducted from my account for delivery and driverâ€™s tip. I tried to cancel or modify my order, but it wasnâ€™t accepted. In the end, I had to pay AED 22 in delivery fees for one item that cost only AED 9. Very disappointing experience.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hala, could you please share more information through our support channels? We'll look into this in detail. For UAE or KSA, you can drop us an email at care@noon.com, and as for Egypt, it is egypt@noon.com with the email subject line "Review - [Google Play - faranak amini]. Thank you.

scraped_reviews.content: so now,the problem is,when you place an order,if the item is not available,restaurants call you and ask you to cancel from your side so you log into the app to find out theres no possibility to cancel once the restaurant has accepted the order since its clearly mentioned that there'll be no refund and apparently yall also have taken down the option to engage with an agent to elaborate the issue at hand,what options do we have?a different item weren't really craving for?a different app perhaps?

scraped_reviews.content: The service is extremely disappointing. Prices are already high, and on top of that, they add multiple extra charges like small order fees, service charges, and delivery fees â€” all of which defeat the purpose of offering a "50% discount on orders above 30 AED." If you're going to promote a discount, at least make it meaningful. scraped_reviews.content: I am extremely disappointed with my recent experience. My shipment was scheduled for delivery two days ago, received it after two days. This item was a birthday gift meant for yesterday only and because of the delay, the entire purpose is now meaningless. Noon has completely failed to deliver on time. I will never recommend ordering from Noon, especially if you are planning a surprise gift for your loved ones. Very poor service and unreliable delivery.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello, we apologize for any inconvenience caused; rest assured that we are here to help. Kindly note that we have passed the matter to the concerned team, and a team member will be in touch as soon as possible. Thank you.

scraped_reviews.content: horrible experience, they deliver wrong item and refuse to replace them with the right ordered items, they waste people money and time in a very bad way. The delivery was cancelled twice despite the fact that my address was updated and clear, they sent wrong items, i asked for replacement they refused and opened a ticket to return another item not the wrong item that i was referring to! dont use the app it seems that they try to send you the unwanted products they have

They do not get back to you within the stipulated time period, don't update you via any channel and then close the case without informing you. Disappointed. title: Moniepoint Personal Banking
description:
Moniepoint Personal Banking App â€“ Your Trusted Online Bank in Nigeria

Open a Moniepoint bank account and enjoy secure online banking from anywhere in Nigeria. With the Moniepoint Personal Banking app, you can send money instantly, receive payments, pay bills, buy airtime, and manage your savings account â€” all in one reliable mobile banking app. Experience modern digital banking that gives you control of your money. Moniepoint is the online bank made for your progress.

Your All-in-One Online Banking Solution

Moniepoint is more than a regular banking app â€” itâ€™s a complete mobile payment app designed to make personal banking simple. With your Moniepoint bank account, you can manage your money, savings, and bills anytime, anywhere.

Hereâ€™s what you can do with the Moniepoint Personal Banking App:

- Open a bank account instantly â€“ create your Moniepoint personal bank account in minutes and start banking online right away. - Send and receive money fast â€“ enjoy reliable mobile payments and transfers with instant notifications. - Earn up to 18% interest per annum â€“ grow your savings easily with flexible, fixed, or locked savings plans that match your goals. - Pay bills conveniently â€“ handle electricity, TV, betting, education, government collections, and internet payments from your phone in seconds. - Buy airtime and data â€“ recharge easily and get 2% cashback on every purchase. - Request your Moniepoint debit card â€“ get your bank card delivered quickly and use it on all ATMs and POS terminals nationwide. - Enjoy secure online banking â€“ advanced encryption keeps your bank account and data safe at all times. - Resolve issues instantly â€“ settle disputes or reach support right from the app. - Bank offline â€“ use *5573# to send money, check balance, or block your card without internet. - Earn Moniepoint Rewards â€“ get cashback on interbank transfers (for new users), and discounts on airtime top-ups, and data purchases.

Why Millions Trust Moniepoint in Nigeria

- Licensed and regulated by the Central Bank of Nigeria (CBN). - Insured by the Nigeria Deposit Insurance Corporation (NDIC) â€” your deposits are protected. - Trusted online bank serving millions of Nigerians. - Reliable personal banking app for everyday payments and savings. - 24/7 customer support for all your mobile banking needs. With Moniepoint, your banking experience is fast, secure, and rewarding. Whether you want to send money, save money, or make payments, the Moniepoint app gives you everything you need in one digital banking platform.

How to Open a Moniepoint Bank Account

- Download the Moniepoint Personal Banking App on your phone. - Sign up to open your bank account in less than 5 minutes. - Request your debit card directly in the app â€” it will be delivered to your doorstep within 48 hours. No paperwork. No branch visits. Just simple online banking made for your progress.

Stay Connected

Helpline: 01 888 9990 Website: www.moniepoint.com WhatsApp: +234 908 843 0803 Instagram, Facebook, X (formerly Twitter), YouTube: @moniepointmfb Address: Plot 7A, Block 4, Admiralty Road, Lekki Phase 1, Lagos State, Nigeria.

Download Moniepoint Personal Banking today.

Enjoy secure online banking that lets you send money, save and earn up to 18% interest, pay bills, and manage your bank account easily â€” all from one trusted mobile payment app. Moniepoint is the online bank built for your financial freedom.

scraped_reviews.content: I'm really impressed with the free version of this. I may buy the full version in future. One helpful addition would be a more thorough tutorial for those who don't have any experience with various features. I don't quite know what some of the options do without trying them & then sometimes I lose an adjustment I did to my photo & can't get back to the previous change I had made without a complete reset & that's not the result I wanted. But otherwise it's great.

I really enjoy the editing tools, especially the free ones. They do have the option to buy different filters but what they do give you for free are still really cute! and they give you blemish removal for free which is probably my favorite thing they offer. but you can do just about every standard/new-age editing on this app for free. Uninterrupted by ads in the middle of editing, and also I have a tendency to switch pages and it always restores if I hadn't finished my edit.

I finally convinced myself to buy the pro version, and it's sincerely the best $17.00 (I think that's what I spent ðŸ¤”) that I ever spent! Can't believe I waited so long. I'm a casual user, and it's perfect for my needs. Thank you! Edit -- still loving the app, but I am trying to delete some photos within the app and can't figure out how to do it. I have ALOT of images and need to get rid of the older ones that I no longer need. Can I get a little assist please? (11/12/25)

Definitely in my top 5 time-spent-using apps, not cuz it's tedious, but cuz it's awesome af. For the programmers: I would love to see the AI cutout function in reverse, erasing the subjects leaving the bg in tact, and/or a custom shape cutout option. Say you are using the cutout function (either AI or erase), similar to creating a sticker, there would be the option the create a cutout shape...conceptualize a custom cookie cutter creator. Many thanks for all your continued efforts. ðŸ™

Bought the one time fee for lifetime access! Worth every penny ladies, couldn't be more happy with it. Never a problem uploading on any new device and they always have the top-notch, cutting edge ðŸ”ª options as well. You don't ever feel like ur missing out on something. Definitely a great experience Then, Now, & 4 Many Years to Come! (Also super grateful it wasn't some fluke, I wonder if they will ever pop off with an additional fee sometimes just cuz this deal seems like such a steal!)

Amazing app for editing, super helpful and intuitive. I wish there wasn't AI slop stuffed into it, but whatever. RECENTLY; and the only reason I'm giving 3 instead of 5 stars, is I have had to uninstall and reinstall the app almost every time I use it because it drops my Pro status and gives me ads, despite me having Polish Pro for over a year. Please fix this issue, especially since it isn't the first time that Pro has been a pain.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi there! We're truly sorry for the inconvenience and frustration caused. Currently, our PRO license is tied to the Google Play account used for the purchase. If multiple accounts exist, the app may not correctly detect the subscription. We understand this is not ideal and are working hard to improve the experience. Thank you for your patience!

scraped_reviews.content: The free version of this app is so overwhelmed with ads, you either use it paid, or don't bother. I would be a lot less irritated by this if it didn't even pretend to have a working free version. At this time, every time I load the app it goes to the same ad that never leaves my screen. I can't close it, it doesn't go away with time, it just sits there until you click on it. Screw that. I'll watch ads for a free service but when you force me to click? Bye
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Dear Tripp Nessa, we are sorry for the annoying ads, but to keep our app for free, we need revenue from ads. By the way, If you would like to try our ads-free version, take a 7-day free trial to see if it meets your expectation. If not, make sure to cancel it at least 24hrs before it ends. Have a good day!

scraped_reviews.content: I just needed a simple app to add text to an image (specifically location names to a map), this did it perfectly and quickly. I wasn't looking for precision or uniformity so text sizing being a click and drag thing instead of numberd sizes like in pc photo editors wasn't a problem, but if that's a level of precision you want I didn't see it (might be there though, I just didn't care to look) And I didn't notice any full screen ads in the time I used it, though I only used it a few minutes.

I loved Polish, it was my favorite photo editing app, I used it all the time and the effects are still really good. There's so many options. It has more ads now though, and half the time they malfunction so it takes several tries to get a free effect. I wouldn't mind that so much, except the app also crashes. I can't edit any more photos now because after I add one filter (yes, literally one, nothing else like stickers or anything) and hit save, the whole thing just dies. Had to uninstall. :(
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Sariah Lyman, so sorry for the trouble.Does the problem occur with the filter function?Please share more details and some screenshots about the problem at polish@inshot.com. We need more information to locate and solve the issue. Many thanks in advance.

scraped_reviews.content: Offers the best basic editing elements that are most commonly featured in similar apps... and works extremely well compared to those other apps. I use it before moving on to something with more advanced features, get the adjustment levels where I want, and basic effects if at all. One feature I like is the Add Text, and is the deciding factor among similar apps, which have no text. Bad if, like myself, you need to put copyright or trademarks on sample work.

So far, so good. Has gotten what I need to get done done. I've only used it to crop & blur a couple spots on a pic. One ad popped up in the middle of cropping, like I was dragging the line down, and BAM! ad pops up. I was able to resume cropping my picture where the line was when the ad interrupted me, so at least I didn't have to start over. I could see that being extremely annoying, though. There are free features and premium features under each section, so I just use the free ones.

Awesome, easy to use, LOVE it. I have been seeing split screen photos, collages, etc., and could not find an easy, quick way to do it from my phone. (I have the Adobe CC suite but I didn't want to fire up my laptop to make a FB post or make a meme on the go). I've only had it for a week or so but it's great. Takes a little bit of experimentation, but what app doesn't? I did the 7 day free trial and bought the pro version at the end. Great for IG too. Lots of templates, effects, etc. Very happy!

It works well with editing photos and gives you many free options. It has many ads which can be very annoying when editing photos. You can also use the options that are for premium, just by watching an ad. At first I was it looked kind of sketchy and looks like it could give my device a virus or something but it does work well. It gives you options to use text with your choice of color and font, blur, drawing tool, effects, and add ons to photos. Overall, it works well and comes with a lot.

Missing basic features. I can't access file folders in a folder structure hierarchy, only arbitrary photo albums that you can't sort or filter. This has nothing to do with permissions, just a bad product that makes this app unusable. You can't edit an image and save to the same location the picture is in, only a pre-determined folder. Very frustrating.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Sorry for the inconvenience, you can check whether you have opened the permission to access the phone album. Would you please tell us more details about your operating steps or send us the log through "Settings â€” Feedback" at polish@inshot.com? Your help means a lot to us. Thanks in advance. ðŸ™

scraped_reviews.content: Not only do I use this app for the pics that I add to my YouTube videos, so that my pictures are more clearer, crisper and richer in color with a bunch of different choices to make - more than any one else has - like, double exposure, blur, adding photos, filters, and more, so much more...... The bonus is I've Never had a problem with this app, it has always worked perfectly. The only thing I couldn't find was a negative /invert option that wasn't in a color.

Honestly, this app is great. With some of the layouts and even just with the basic editing features, I've had people ask me how I managed to do that kind of stuff just on my phone. Yeah, there are ads, but they're usually way less than 10 seconds long, and the result is always worth the wait. If there's one feature I'd like, it's splicing full images together. Making a collage, pics have to be majorly cropped go fit in their templates. Aside from that, amazing app!

Pretty good photo editing app. Lots of options even with some of them pay blocked. Very little practice to get great results. The pen option is slightly buggy even using a stylis pen tip on screen (there is a slight delay and it can mess you up, but a few times erasing and trying again gets the job done.). Would love to be able to flip/reverse photo chosen for double exposure & stickers made from gallery. Thanks for all the hard work.

I started checking this app out around dinner time. It's just after midnight, and my wife is giving me the stink eye. I haven't been able to put it down, since. Its user friendly, has an amazing library of images, effects, and blending tools. Unfortunately, I still haven't been able bring an outside image, even when I converted it into a .png format, and was well under the 2G max limit. I bypassed that by downloading Polish Photo Editor, and created an awesome, customized business card logo.

I like it for the most part, but the "transparent" background it gives you when trying to use the cutout feature is way too dark! It's hard to see the details of what you're doing around the edges, which inevitably leaves you with janky bits leftover no matter how meticulous you are... It also makes it hard to see if you accidentally remove something you don't want to. This really needs to be changed to the standard light grey-and-white checkerboard pattern that most photo editing programs use!

Amazing. I love the different filters and ways to manipulate the picture(s) into something different. This app allows you to explore and find what you like to do. Even starting to edit pictures for a more unique way to photograph is great ! I can't wait to create other things! That bit of the down side is that if you want some certain features, you have to pay for them or watch videos. But it isn't really a big deal. Plus the app is easy to use!

Pretty damn good actually. Yes, there is pay to have options, but it is pretty flexible as is! Yes, it has ads but they do deserve to make some $$$ from their work and most of the ads are short. Does quite a bit more then your OS photo editor. It has a bit of a learning curve, but as you go you discover the smaller detail adjustments you can make!

Amazing app especially for free. This is the type of developer that needs to be more common. I enjoy being given a free trial, no invasive ads, and free version still works great. I'll be considering making a purchase for the pro version. There IS a learning curve to this as with any editing software so it isn't going to be the easiest thing to do unless it's something simple. This app can do simple and complex things quite well especially for mobile. Keep up the good work devs!

I used to love this app. Then as always the ads got out of hand. Seriously, an ad before and after every single photo is just ridiculous. More often than not you'll even get one in between. You'll get an ad before selecting your photo, after selecting it but before you can edit it, then another after you edit your photo. Sometimes more than one. Come on, that's overkill.. you're begging people to delete your app.. Incredibly disappointed.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi friend, so sorry for the ads. We have been trying our best to make it not disturb your photo editing always, and we promise to keep improving it. If there is any problem with the ads, could you please share some screen recording via the Settings â€“ Feedback at polish@inshot.com? We will improve it. Thank you for your help.

scraped_reviews.content: A one-time purchase of $16 for access to the wealth of resources in this app is a stupendous value. (Another option is $8 for one year.) I wanted one good photo editing app that didn't require a subscription, and a little noodling with this one told me I'd found what I needed. I am *wallowing* like a pig in mud in all these filters and backgrounds and effects. I have never spent so much for an app. No regrets.

Im fairly familiar with editing on my Laptop, Editing from my phone can be tricky , So far! Im impressed! I've only just begun to discover all the tools packed inside. With this you can cut out part of a photo and and paste it to another. By using it's filters and tools, You can adjust color to perfection, and so much more, all in the palm of your hands. I will do another review when I've had more time using it. If you enjoy photo editing. You will love this app! Hood job to the developers.

Free Trial is not worth the additional options provided in the pay-for version. Do NOT make the mistake of using the 7-day trial advertised within, there are plenty of other free photo-effects available. The price/value ratio is terrible though, so if you looking for a pay-for photo editor I suggest you continue shopping and not waste the time your time playing with the "7-day free trial"

The interface is very well done. I do think there are too many ads. Even as I was writing a review, ads were popping up in the background. Anything you do prompts for ads to pop up. There is no Save as button. 90% of the features are locked unless you try or buy the pay version. For a phone ap, I think the pay version is too expensive $15. It's the price of a lot of PC software.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Kevin Dondrea, sorry for the inconvenience. Our app won't suddenly appear advertising, and about the subscription, if you want to buy it for life, it will cost you $15.99. You can also choose an annual subscription for $7.99, and you can cancel the subscription at any time. If you have any other questions, please feel free to let us know.

scraped_reviews.content: Very easy to use editing app. I can add borders and other neat details in a few taps through the menus. You do get access to basic photo correction tools in the free version. There's a ton of stuff to use even without paying for premium! Quite happy with how, well, polished I can make my friendship bracelet instagram posts with Polish. I'd love a way to watch an ad to unlock one palette or background set for a week or something. c: Tyvm devs for keeping this up to date and (mostly) free.

This was amazingly easy. I've tried others and this was was the best. It worked right from download & the start buttons are user friendly. Commands are hard to figure out because I don't have a mouse to hover over each, but you can select and it will tell you what it is as it opens up to be used. One example is removing an object is the eraser symbol. It has a magenta trace as you outline what you want to smooth or blur. You can easily hit undo as well!

I have downloaded COUNTLESS photo apps. Always ending in frustration on over usage in ads, or being "too intricate"... Like impossible to just do a simple straight forward collage or something. Everywhere else is just over the top. I can't just turn a photo to black and white or something. It's always "add unicorn wings" "add strobe lights"... But this is just 1-2-3 EASY, straight forward, and by far the best app when all you want to do is touch up a photo! 110% recommend!

It's pretty damn good for a free app! Of course you have to deal with ads, but they don't take long and are actually relevant so not super annoying. I'm having a grand ole time making really cool pics with just the free stuff. It actually seems worth buying it to unlock more options, and this is the first photo app I've ever used where I've felt that way. I'm impressed, good job! My only critique is that it'd be nice if you could edit your complexion on the cartoon filters. It makes me too light

I liked that it had an undo feature -- which my last photo editing app lacked -- but the blur tool was frustrating. For some reason, when you select the blur option, the app automatically and randomly blurs the entire image. So the first thing you have to do is UNBLUR the whole image, then blur the actual parts you wanted blurred. It's weird and obnoxious. There also doesn't seem to be a way to just make a basic rectangle, if you wanted to highlight a particular area of the image.

What can I say, it's the best free one I've found, so the price is right, and I've tried many. There are definitely some little annoyances. It constantly thinks I'm trying to move, draw, erase etc when I am actually trying to zoom in or out., I wish they would separate out the controls for zooming versus editing so that would stop happening. But again, it works well overall, I like it.

Easy to work with for collages. Very simple, quick, intuitive. But not much to it. If you're looking for something simple, this will do the job well. I wasn't bothered by sudden disruptive video ads blasting at 100% volume - another ðŸŒŸ, but filters aren't very exciting. No blending, layers, fx, layouts...and not sure if it moves to SD card. I'm sticking to my go-to, LINE.

This app was great, I even paid to use the extra features. This is when it started going downhill. I cancelled the subscription so it would not auto repay without my knowledge. The next time I logged into the app, it tried to make me pay again even though my subscription is good for a year. The extra features no longer worker, citing a network error. I've uninstalled and reinstalled the app. Without restoring my purchase, the app works with adds, but stops after restoring purchase.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Kelsey Winkler, sorry for the trouble.You can uninstall â€œPolishâ€-open Google play-switch to the subscribed account and download again - Open â€œPolishâ€-Click restore. I hope it helps. If you need help, please feel free to contact us at polish@inshot.com.

scraped_reviews.content: Pretty decent app. Layout is very nice. Kind of a learning curve, but once figured out, it's pretty easy to navigate. Recommend getting the paid upgrade. Yeah, a little steep in price, but well worth it imo as you get a bit more editing tools and support the company. Tip: If you're having trouble trying to ajust a layer while zooming, make the layer a sticker first, then you can zoom and adjust with ease. Runs decent on my low spec phone (Galaxy A15 5G). Overall, I highly recommend ðŸ‘ðŸ‘.

Never got to try out app. Just ad spam. It just kept loading ads and never got to the app. Gave up after almost 5 minutes of ad spam. Update, just got a response telling me they need that many ads to keep it free. No, you don't need that many ads. There is a difference between keeping it free and trying to make extra money. I know the general amount made off shown, clicked and successful sale commissions off these ads. Not gonna use this app anyways. It'd be easier to get a sub with adobe.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Samuel C. Thank you for your feedback! The ads you encountered shouldnâ€™t be that longâ€”there may be a bug with the ad. If you could kindly share a screenshot or video at polish@inshot.com, weâ€™ll investigate and resolve the issue as quickly as possible. We appreciate your patience and apologize again for the inconvenience!

scraped_reviews.content: Easy platform, loads of options, and just a bit to pricey. The features are worth it, but photo editing should be fun for the regular Joe, but it costs the professionals fee to get results that should be less costly. I know you guys have overhead and employees, but the fun is removed at the end of the trial, when I'm in love with the app, but have to marry her at $$$$$, and Matter of fact... f' with out even a reach around.. not even a kiss?! Damn but ill pay it. Later. On payday. ðŸ’‹

A few things. first please allow us to zoom in on the picture. trying to align text where I want it fully zoomed out is almost impossible. second, please take all of the pro stuff and put it in it's own category. yes, I get it we all need money out here. but I find it irritating when every other option is pro. you have to sift through it just to use anything free first before deciding to buy. just maybe add a "pro button at the beginning that shows off the features. that's all.
scraped_reviews.replyContent:
Hi, thanks for your feedback. We really appreciate your suggestion. We've already taken "zoom in" function into consideration and will realize it in the future. Regarding "Pro" features and materials, we'll consider your suggestion and keep improving the APP. Hope you will like our APP. Thank you.

InShot Team

scraped_reviews.content: Honestly, it's a pretty good editing app. It's exactly what you need if you're not doing anything super professional, and if you are, you probably shouldn't be editing on your phone. Features aren't behind a paywall, all though extra stickers and little things are (which is a good way to approach it) and the ads are tastefully placed after you're done editing. Good decisions all around. First 5 star rating I've ever given any ap (I think).

I like this app for certain things in editing, but the low rating is for the following: Not all the available options work. None of the "effects" do, they just keep saying it timed out try again and do nothing. There's no black and white or negative options. It's lacking some key workers just in these items. Otherwise, what I use it for is ok.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Diana S, so sorry for the trouble. May we know which features you were using when the problem occurred? Please share more details and some screenshots about the problem at polish@inshot.com. We need more information to locate and solve the issue. Many thanks in advance.

scraped_reviews.content: I like this app. It's quite free of bloat and annoying popups, on top of having a wide selection of powerful tools that rival other apps. It's still subject to some nasty bugs though, like the image resolution being butchered after cropping and saving it. Aside from that, all I have is pointers: better organization of tools and effects would be handy, as well as letting you stretch text vertically and horizontally. Good work so far, I expect it'll only get better.

For someone that has zero clue what they're doing with anything relating to technology and really should not even be aloud to touch anything that gives you options on a touch screen, I found Polish to be very easy to figure out and quickly as well. I use this primarily for work and editing my photos rarely needing to add a filter but use the adjustments tab to fix lighting issues and actually make the object or person in your photograph look as good as they do in person is a huge plus.

Pretty straightforward and easy to use, user-friendly interface. Adds new features every now and then. Has a pretty wide variety of editing tools that are a pain to find all in one place anywhere else. Only thing I wish would change is less ads (but I understand that's what enables it to run all these features for free) as well as more fonts. And possibly a background eraser if it does not already have one. Two thumbs up! ðŸ‘ðŸ¼ðŸ‘ðŸ¼ðŸ˜Š

So far, after a week, its great. The only gripes I got, are the fact its designed to edit peoples body structure. You can crop and edit cat photos, and dog photos, sure. But each time you finish, the quality of the photo goes down. If you can make it where the photo can be more 'refined' so the quality doesn't drop whenever I finish, then it'd be 5 stars.

This is an amazing app!! I used to use Picsart, but after their latest update, I started using Photo Editer Pro. The only problem I have is the cropping. I think you should add in another option to "cut out" the image. By that, I mean you should be able to trace the image you want to use- cutting out the background of the whole image. Sorry if that was a little complicating, and, other than that, the app is GREAT!!

Paid $17.19 for lifetime and still seeing ads. Requesting a refund Edited to add: per your request, I sent you an email with photos. I should not have to put up with ads in an app that I paid almost $20 for, even if they are ads for others apps that you have developed. ðŸ˜¡ Edit#2 I keep getting bounce reports for the email address you gave in your comment. I can't email the pictures without a working address.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi friend, thanks for your reply. We have received your email and have also replied to it. Please check it and hope the email helps. Your feedback is always welcome. We will keep improving the app. Thank you.

scraped_reviews.content: I used only free stuff from the app and was able to do everything I wanted and more. I'm guessing that if I paid for the full version, I'd be lost in there forever because it gives you so many options and different ways to customize said options. Never a bad thing when it comes to editing. Genuinely pleased with this app, and pleasantly surprised at its expansive capabilities (even though I've only explored the free portions). I recommend everyone try it out at least.

So far I've had a pretty decent experience with this app. It's helped me on multiple occasions and is my favorite app to use to edit pictures. However, there is a major downfall that had me pulling my hair out the other day. Everytime I tapped on a picture I wanted to edit, or the edits I wanted to do I was greeted with an ad. I understand having an ad at the end of the editing process, but during it? Really? It made me almost give up and uninstall the app. Please do better.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Dear Nia Sohma, sorry for the annoying ads. We are working on reducing the frequency of ads to provide a better editing experience. By the way, If you would like to try our ads-free version, take a 7-day free trial to see if it meets your expectation. If not, make sure to cancel it at least 24hrs before it ends. Have a good day!

scraped_reviews.content: IF YOU'RE LOOKING FOR A FREE PHOTO EDITING APP, that's really free,& doesn't have a ton of invasive ads, look no further!!Simple user interface..A lot of features other apps make you pay for are totally free on this one. I was also impressed with the little "home" icon on the save screen; so many other apps make you back all the way out of the save screen and then it's a 1 in 20 chance it saved the edited pic completely! Great job developers, you guys rock!

title: Local Weather Alerts - Widget
description:
All weather information is gathered on one page for easy viewing. View and manage weather information of multiple cities at the same time. You can predict the weather in the next few hours and days. Weather warning information to help you plan ahead.

ã€Product Featuresã€‘
 

Real-time weather data:
    Provide weather forecast information for 24 hours and 25 days.
Air quality information: 
    Monitor air quality in real time and care for your health.
Alert notification: 
   Provide weather notifications for rain, snow, lightning, haze, storms, etc.
Desktop Weather Widget: 
  Multiple desktop widgets are available, and you can choose a style you like.
Accurate forecast of rain and snow up to the hour: 
   Get accurate weather temperature changes to hours in advance to plan ahead for your appearance.
Global weather queries for any latitude and longitude: 
     Supports weather queries for any latitude and longitude in the world.
Multi-day weather forecast: 
    Multi-day weather trend forecast, forecast the rain early to make plans.
Radar map: 
     Clear radar map of precipitation trends, providing accurate weather forecast trends to protect your travel.
Various weather backgrounds:
     Beautiful weather realistic background, according to different weather information cut map is not the same weather background picture.
A list of city management:
   View weather information for multiple cities at the same time, add or remove the city weather you want.
 

 
Contact us and feedback
Email: vitalityappstudios@gmail.com

summary: Accurate weather forecast, daily weather changes are easy to grasp

scraped_reviews.content: Update: As of late October 2024, the precipitation amount does not work anymore, and shows 0, even though we have had wet weather everyday. I have reinstalled to no avail. The most information and user friendly. Ads are not interruptive, and easily bypassed. Love the layout, and current precipitation forecast. The app also takes less space than others. I emailed support for more information, and replied within a few days, and explained what I wanted to know about very thoroughly.

I've been using Local Weather Alerts for two months. Their batting average is better than most and it tells me what I need to know right away for my locale: hurricane prediction, temperature, rain chance, humidity, UV level, sunrise/sunset times. Honestly, I can't live without it. And no ads. Can you believe it?!! I almost forget. it changes your location automatically and with pinpoint precision.

I have had this app for a few days now, I'm not particularly happy with it, and I paid for premium. There are no audio severe weather alerts, and it was absolutely pouring outside and both my radar and weather page said it was partly cloudy. I suggest you use it for a few days before you pay for premium. The app does look entertaining, and is easy to navigate, just wish it would do what it says it does.

This would be the perfect app if the notification bar actually worked. Ads aren't obnoxious. There are plenty of customizations, and it's fairly accurate. Doesn't seem to have a bunch of trackers either. The only real issue is that the projected precipitation (both rain and snow) is always miniscule and never actually matches the weather descriptions. For example, the blurb may state 1-2in one day but only have .4 listed in the stats. Another day, it says 4.8in but only lists 2.2.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: We tested the ongoing weather notification and did not reproduce the issue you described. You can send an email with a detailed description or record a video. Thank you so much.

scraped_reviews.content: This app gives me all the features I want. It only took 5 min. to set up. (There haven't been any video ads, like other weather apps that have blasting volumes , which can't be permanently turned off). If you want to stop the ads, it's only $3. The ads aren't very large, anyway. The app has been accurate and current temperature is always displayed on notification bar..

So far so good. I have been extremely disappointed in weather apps since I purchased my new phone. My old phone had a wonderful app that did not transfer with my other data. I like the minimal permissions. I like the many display choices for the widget. I like that I can save multiple cities for quick weather checks before I go fishing. So far the ads are minimal and not intrusive. Accuracy not known yet, as I have just started using today. I am sure I won't be disappointed.

I like the app, it seems to be pretty accurate. I am having issues with the widgets though, they freeze up and the information disappears. You have to open the whole app to reset it. Could be an internet issue, but I don't seem to be having any trouble with anything else internet wise. Don't know. ðŸ¤·â€â™€ï¸ It does seem to be a pretty nice weather app, other than the one issue. Would recommend.

Small package, for a big punch. This is literally everything anyone would want in an app, especially for a weather app. Very little storage and memory used. There are minimal ad based intrusions, I didn't even notice at first. Any details you would want to know about the weather are provided. You can tailor the options you want to see within the app. So far the only weather app that includes all the information I've been looking for. I've only just started using this very impressed so far.

I have had this app for about a week. I love it! No popup ads, no shady stuff. I had 2 other weather apps, and they were both inaccurate at times and had so many ads and popups it was ridiculous. This app gives you up to date, comprehensive weather and other great info, like air quality, wind chill or "feels like" temp and wind speeds.

ðŸ¥°Love the layouts, navigation is a breezeðŸ˜‰ and five dollars to have the Pro version without ads for the LIFETIME! It's truly the number one cost effective at a decent priced application of ALL TIME! Life is too short as it is to bombarded with ads, it's so nice to have peace instead of misery. PLEASE! Keep it this way, don't enhance it because it's working for you. Try it in building another but leave this one alone.

Todays date:8/19/24. I've now been using this free app for many months. It continues to beat all the other weather apps I've ever tried. It's fast, accurate, easy to use, and provides lots of extra information relevant to my local weather beyond just the temperature and rain/sun. All of the important weather info is right at the top of the page. You can add additional cities to check the weather where your friends and family members live, too. This app is easy to use and is very well set up.

Stopped updating temperature on home screen and now I have to open the app to check. Kind of defeats the purpose when I can't just look at my phone to see the current temperature; it takes about the same time to go online and check as it does to open the app. Other than the temperature range for the day it's not accurate (says it's supposed to be sunny all day and it's overcast all day or vice versa). Love the layout and the ads aren't horrible.

This is a fun app to have. About the only thing it doesn't forecast is my future. There are several themes, widgets & icons to give the app your choice of flare. For a one time fee of $3.00 you can buy the option to drop the ads. There's also a VIP version but there's no clear description of what that entails. I'm happy with the way I've set it up and if I get bored I can change the looks. If ALL the weather apps out there this is definitely one of the best!

A plethora of well organized and detailed weather informationðŸ‘ðŸ˜Ž I have my area weather and weather from the other side of the globe, which I track also, using two of the three SlidexSlide screens. Up to this point I've only 2 suggestions. 1.) The transparent widget works best for me but it only shows a wind directionâ†—ï¸ not the speed. 2.) The radar map when fully opened does not show the time represented with the â–¶ï¸bar at the bottom. Neither the time for where it is or the time as it's moving.

Update: August 2023 just paid $5 to remove ads and got an ad within 2 minutes of using the app. Not cool. Please explain why that happened. I'm not paying for any more upgrades. Previous review: I Iove the detail on this app! So much better than others I've used. Easy swipe to change cities. Humidity, air quality, wind, precip, sunrise/sunset. No ads yet but I'd pay for ad-free due to the quality.

Does everything it's supposed to. Nothing it's not. Has The most options and features for a free weather app I've ever had. And I've had most of the bigger names. The weather channel, accuweather, weather bug, even noaa's site isn't this user friendly. Had for months, and haven't had to watch a single video ad since day one. Plus you don't have to give it a bunch of access permissions on your phone that it doesn't need. Could this be the perfect weather app? Finally? ðŸ¤žðŸ™ ðŸ¤” It just may be. ðŸ¤—â¤ï¸

Just installed the free version. Love the visual graphs, such as the hourly line graph for temp and precipitation at top, and the graph for wind speed farther down the page. Wish I could rearrange these boxes of info, tho - would likely give 5 stars then. App says it's not collecting personal data, had no permissions besides location and whether to allow notifications or not. Love that simplicity and un-invasivness!

Paid the less than $5 fee to get ad-free, and this is my favorite weather app to date. I've been using weather apps for more years than I'll admit to. I like to see the radar, hourly weather, allergy pollen levels, burn meter (early burn alert for redheads), and "the sun and the moon" (Sheryl Crow). Everything you want to know related to weather plus more is in the app. Well worth the $.

I really wanted to like this app. The app doesn't sell your information or collect information. Love the layout and all the information it provides from humidity levels to uv exposures. Easy to use. Unfortunately the app is not accurate on the weather but is with the temperature. Example, it's says it's mostly sunny right now, however the sky is gray and there's no sun. App is inaccurate on the actual weather which defeats the point of using it.

I've had 3 previous weather apps, the last was NOAA because of its simplicity. However, it had frequent downtimes. I went looking again. I found that this company has harnessed ALL the weather info I need, and they managed to get it right. I've had this app for 2+ weeks, it's forecasting is very accurate. The widget has a beautiful display and interface. I purchased the app, and it is well worth it. No longer do I need to navigate around useless ads. The best I've found.

I've been using it a lot lately and it has become my favorite weather app. It shows more detail than other weather apps, and it has an enjoyable appearance. I really like getting the barometric pressure reading. It matches my real barometer. And it can be customized in many ways. I put 3 cities on it so far and I can choose between them.

We have found this weather app to be superior to others I have used. The user interface is easy to understand, it provides up to the minute weather updates, and gives sufficient data to keep a weather enthusiate happy. We live where high winds often occur and summer and winter weather can be an issue. My wife travels 100 miles r/t a few times a week for work and I use this App to help her navigate best times for driving to avoid bad weather which causes traffic backup and extended driving time.

Easy to set up, notifications are timely and non intrusive. I was able to customize the notifications and believe me, that was a relief! The forecast is the most accurate for Montana, that I have tried and the best feature is when I use Dark Mode, it stays in Dark Mode without fail so I am able to see all the information quickly. This app deserves the 5 Star rating.

I use this app along with two other weather apps. This app is the best for my needs. It will show how long until precipitation up to 120 minutes so I know if I can get a bike ride in. The hourly % chance of rain has a much greater and precise range and seems more accurate. I prefer the radar on a different app. It's easy to read and has a hour back range to see where the rain is heading. This app is the most useful overall. I like the appearance but it took me a while to get used to it. Premium.

Had the app for a week. So far I like it. It is so easy to read and gives lots of detail information. I also like the the variety of widgets for my homepage. I found one negative thing. The radar page. I don't understand it. I can't get actual 3 hour radar segments like other weather apps. That needs to be fixed. Otherwise it's great!!! I hate the ads on any app. When I can clear them I do. I bet most people don't even look at the ads because they were doing something on their phones.

This app is simpler to use, user-friendly, you might say. Less "finger flipping" to find want you are looking for. Edit: Still using this easy to decipher weather app that accurately forecast all the daily highs and lows along with potential stormy weather heading your way. Good as any, better than the other weather apps I've used in the past.

I use various weather apps to get forecast averages mostly due to a family run home business which is always affected by weather conditions. Living in a small mtn town, forecasts are subject to variables larger metro areas aren't. These folks seem to get it. The temps, winds and precipitation forecasts are very accurate, often more than other weather apps we use. I have a home weather station I use to compare live data also. Thank you for helping us prep for whatever weather is heading our way.

I really like this app: It doesn't collect personal information and sell to third parties as far as I know, anyway that is what it advertised. The app is user friendly and accurate compared with other apps I tried which wanted all of my personal information and didn't work properly and wouldn't allow Uninstaller on my phone. But this app is a breeze so, I purchased onetime lifetime subscription for $3.30. I think it is a bargain as it is hassle free.

I like the app but the widgets are bad. The widgets look nothing like their previews. Some forecasts are on a solid background and others can be made transparent, but if you want a specific config you're stuck with that background. The spacing and kerning are bad, on at least one the date says "May 027". The resizing either makes you take up way too much room or cuts off the middle of a forecast line. Very strange.

I love this app! It gives all the information I need for gardening. The ads are very unobtrusive. The accuracy is awesome. Even the 25 day outlook gives a great prediction and can be trusted once it's about 15 days out. I would give it 5 stars if the widget could be smaller on android. 3x2 instead of 5x3. There is a ton of wasted space in the widget on my Motorola Stylus phone. Thanks!

Used for about 12 months. I run 8 different weather app widgets as a resource, plus 3 of my own weather stations, and this app is literally never in alignment on temperature. Other metrics are hit or miss, but the temperature is always notably different than the rest of my resources. It doesn't make sense when it uses the same data resources as other apps do, or evidently, it doesn't. Uninstalled.

Great weather app for me. Its forcasts are more accurate for my rural locale in Alaska than the others I've tried, much closer to the physical thermos on the property. The snow/rain predictions tend to be more on point for me as well. Given the closest monitoring station is 6 miles away, at higher elevation, the next being nine, I'm quite pleased.

Really liked this app. My 2 biggest complaints: radar takes forever to load, esp if you zoom in/out or pan. The deal breaker for me is it uses AccuWeather's data so the "days" start at sunrise instead of 12am. ðŸ‘ŽðŸ» When you have animals and plants that need prep for cold weather it makes it difficult to plan accordingly as the low for Tuesday is shown as Monday's low. I'm tired of scrolling thru the hourly trying to determine when it's going to freeze. The hourly could also be laid out better.

Nice (pro version). Very accurate (uses AccuWeather). Wish it had radar showing clouds. Lots of information. Pro version is reasonable at $4.99. Problems: The widgets sometimes do not update, the % chance of rain are all partially cut off on the Daily Forecast, cloud cover value is never correct. Had some storms go through last night. There was a tornado warning but the warning never showed in the app. Dropped a star because it has had some problems for months that never seem to get fixed.

I was really enjoying this weather app. I even paid for the premium/no ads version, but I later realized that unless I'm missing something somewhere, I don't get notifications for severe weather alerts. Which I really depend on, so whether I continue to use this app or not remains to be seen.

Nice app. The widget displaying hourly forecast takes up too much height leaving huge gaps at top and bottom for no reason. Developers Please could you fix this, as I had to remove many icons to fit the hourly forecast widget and it is taking up too much space for no reason. I'll give it 5* if this is fixed. it's bothering so much I'll probably end up uninstalling the app soon.

Boy, I'm so glad I paid for this app. Now I get the privilege to look at the VIP radar instead of just the radar. Oops, they are the same screen. They should have just told us it is just ad free and no other privileges. There are 3 other weather apps that I saw that look and are the exact as this one except different names. So must be a computerized program they use. Like radio and tv stations using the airport radar. I figured

I'd like to ask the dev to see if the radar can be moved up the screen as I always use it to see where the cloud/rain covers are. I have to scroll down currently and then click on it. Or the option to arrange the layout would be amazing! Great weather app overall.

It's a good app Let's me know what's happening where I am There's one flaw . . . It keeps telling me it is too old to do things. I have deleted the app three times and added another with a similar appearance 3 times with the same appearance with the same result. I even tried the update process, and it made changes to my phone that my Verizon store had to remove and reset it the base app is all I need, and the performance is really good. It tells me what I want to know.

Love it!!! I am really liking this app but I keep getting double notifications with it. And I'm not sure what I've done to cause that. So I'd like to resolve that issue. UPDATE: I had two widgets on my screen. Maybe that was the issue because I don't have the problem anymore. I really love the screens full of info on this app. Lots of information and alerts if needed for each city I'm following.

Beautiful layout with everything you want to know right there! One short ad to watch after opening the app. This helps to keep the app free. Award-winning widget showing real-time weather and whether it's day or night! Working the night shift, before this widget, we had to phone the Operator to ask if it was day or night in the summer!

so far so good nice clear vision just downloaded 1/10/2025 see if alerts on rain notification come up on screen to alert before rains hits. or if it only works if pay for subscription which pensioners can't afford these days. hopefully this still allows those who can't afford subscription still get alerts on rain storms heat waves. this app was easy to setup lots choices in widgets background art themes. maps easy clear touch on +- gave great zoom on area great choice on other cities countries

Always it is updated. specially wen travelling anywhere by any means-- walking, driving, biking, aeroplane. it is very much helpfully. I don't need to ask the metrology office. now everything is in my hand in my mobile.There for those who travell every time I recommend them to Use this app.

had Weatherbug. This app is more thorough regarding information delivered, and its presentation easier to understand and use. Also allows me to track cities I'll be visiting with a simple swipe after the city is saved. MUCH better than any other weather app I've lived with.

I have only had it in a few days and I am delighted with it as many weather apps I have had are not so accurate being in Northern Ireland and the amount of information I got for the weather warnings was very comprehensive it continues to be a good weather app the team should be very ðŸ˜Š
Perfect, a lot of complete infos; rain, pollen, mold, wind, many places settings, etc... A very reasonable price of one shot, great deal! Beautiful background and color choices too. Thanks.
This app is the best weather app I've used. Not to many adverts. Good precise information. Switching between locations couldn't be easier. even with a few adverts it's still the best I've used.

Nice weather prediction app. But mostly inaccurate sometimes. It tells you that it will certainly rain in few minutes and start indicating rain drops on the app, but no rainfall anywhere around the area many hours after.
Good selection of weather widgets, including one that gives current temp, feels-like, daily temp range and an icon showing conditions without taking up a lot of space on my home screen. Thanks!

Great app. Has everything on it. Just what l was looking for. Keeps me up to date with the days ahead , good all rounder. Except on my tablet it keeps saying to update it but when l go into the update , it's not even the same weather app and is not as half as good as this one. ðŸ˜¡

title: FaceApp: Perfect Face Editor

FaceApp gives you everything you need to create Instagram-worthy edits. No more extra tapping on your screen! Use a fantastic set of face filters, effects, backgrounds, and other tools to create a seamless and photorealistic edit in ONE TAP. You will never have to spend hours photoshopping again!
