summary: Natural Beauty, Selfie Retouch

scraped_reviews.content: Even paying for this app has its limits. It's terribly frustrating to be restricted from making edits in the middle of a project. Not worth the hassle! I have used the free version for years with no issues, but as soon as I paid for a subscription I was restricted almost immediately. Lesson learned: just use the free version or find another app. Edit: I don't appreciate the patronizing response by the developer. They can't admit they have a buggy app. I have already canceled my subscription.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Kendra! We understand your frustration with the limits. They are based on our service's technical capabilities and help us prevent abuse of the app. We have included a detailed explanation in our Terms of Use to provide transparency on this matter.

scraped_reviews.content: absolutely nothing is free anymore. its extremely misleading to have a bunch of features labeled "pro" and then have 1 or 2 with no "pro" sticker on it but when you click the button, to apply it to the image you have to pay for pro. VERY misleading and extremely greedy. don't bother getting the app unless you want to pay because itll be useless otherwise.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi! Each section except Impressions has at least one free filter, like Long hair, Bob cut, Freckles, Makeup 4, Classic smile, etc. Contact support if you canâ€™t see them.

scraped_reviews.content: Still nothing special. Don't spend money on this app, they have eliminated the best option by far, the face swap, so there's nothing special about it. Paid for the pro sub to ensure I had the face swap option. They've taken that option away, so I'm canceling my subscription ASAP. Your own phone editor can do a better job. Gender swap, but no face swap, really? And thanks in advance for the canned response that you're giving to dozens of other subscribers, it really means a lot. Such a shame.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello, the Face Swap feature was removed as it no longer aligns with our development concept. Please note that Face Swap feature was never included in Pro benefits; it was always a free feature. We encourage you to try our other features, which we hope you'll find useful and enjoyable.

scraped_reviews.content: It's fun to use and the results are very impressive. It's not perfect; profiles don't work well, it doesn't match skin color or lighting, and it has a tendency to mung clothing when transforming the face... but when it's good, it's amazing. Too bad they removed the face swap. UPDATE: now the icons are blurred and it's claiming I'm not connected when I clearly am
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi, James! We would love to help you, but we would need more information. Please navigate to FaceApp > Settings > Support > Report an issue and send logs.

scraped_reviews.content: Garbage. Had it installed until they removed the morph and face swap options, which were in my opinion the best features of the app. So i uninstalled it a while back. Then recently thought I'd give it a try again for simple photo editing. Had it open for less than a minute and ended up removing it again because all the options are PRO. Nothing is available without purchasing it. So, it's only free to download, not free to use.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello! We are sorry to know that you are not completely satisfied with the updates. Our developers decided to remove Face Swap because this feature doesn't really line up with our application's development concept. There are a lot of free filters in the app. If you have any questions, please contact us at support.android@faceapp.com

scraped_reviews.content: Every time I try to load an image, I'm told that too many requests have been received from my network and I'm not allowed to edit the image. This is ridiculous that I'm not being allowed to use the free version and being compelled to purchase the pro version. Update: Nearly a year later, and the same issue persists. I processed just seven images through the app and was told too many requests had been received from my network. I was then not allowed to edit any more.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: We understand that you may be frustrated with our filter usage limits, but please know that these limits are in place to protect the integrity of our platform and prevent abuse. Our technical capabilities allow for a specific volume of photo and video content to be processed at a given time.

scraped_reviews.content: I used to love this app and had quite a bit of fun with it, and I didn't mind the filters that were only accessible if I watched an ad. I come to edit a photo today, and EVERYTHING is locked behind the PRO Subscription. There really isn't anything you can do on this app anymore without having to pay a ridiculous monthly price for it. I'd pay to own, not to rent. I simply don't edit enough photos to justify that amount of money.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi. Currently, we are testing the ads feature, so sometimes it might not work. Still, the PRO subscription works fine if you'd like to purchase. Also, there are still a lot of free filters in the Showcase folder.

scraped_reviews.content: After 3 days I was charged $101.64, even though I had uninstalled the app because I could find no way to stop usage otherwise and I didn't want to be charged beyond the 3-Day trial period because the app was pretty disappointing (continually froze or wouldn't upload most pictures). Wow! That's a HUGE fee and was not disclosed anywhere that I could see. I'd give a zero star rating if I could. Let's see if I can get a refund...

It would be higher, except the free version has FEW options and even some of those aren't marked PRO, but when you go to apply them it shows that you'll have to use the paid version after all. It's almost useless without buying the PRO version... Also, I have switched phones many times and have had to get the PRO version every time due to never being able to sign in and create any sort of account. You need to create that option, and offer way more free options and you'll have a 5 â­ app. Too bad.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello! We do have a lot of free filters in the app. If you do not see any of them, please consider editing photos directly from the app, or contact us at support.android@faceapp.com so we could assist you.

scraped_reviews.content: The app is good and great at what it does, BUT! be wary of limits on editing. I'm a pro user, the cost of paying for the pro version isn't too much imo for how often I use it, however, there seems to be a limit on how many photos you want to edit, from reafing around it looks like that limit is around 25 photos a day! which is insane, why isn't it either higher, or limitless for pro users! I would rate 5*s, but this limit is a huge roadblock, especially if you pay to use it, it needs fixing!
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello, some users can experience limits if they edit too many photos during a short period of time. If you have any questions, please reach us via support.android@faceapp.com

scraped_reviews.content: The app is okay. But you really can't even try many features at all. And if i wanted to subscribe, I'm not going to pay 3.99 a month for something that is just for fun. And i can't imagine using the app for a year in order to get the cheaper price by going that route. I mean there's only so much you can do with this app before you probably end up forgetting all about it. So sorry. Too cost prohibitive IMHO update: Since you did respond to my opinion and because you are considering a free trial=*
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi! Thank you for sharing your opinion. We might introduce a free trial soon.

scraped_reviews.content: Wow... Much better than some apps and more realistic. Only problem I had were the odd and disruptive ad placements. I understand you need ads with a free app. But put them in between image processing. The ads as they are can pop up at any time so if you try to pic a filter, an ad may pop up right as you go to press the filter you want. If you can just place them during the processing image that would be much better.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi! Thank you for your feedback! We will definitely reconsider the number of ads in the free version of FaceApp. If you have any extra questions or concerns, you are welcome to contact our support team at support.android@faceapp.com

scraped_reviews.content: EDIT: Down from 3 to 2 stars because yet again, they've put more of the free filters behind the paywall. Not long ago they had it so an ad watch unlocked whatever one you wanted. Great compromise! But no, that was removed after only months! A great app IF they stopped block access to the filters. Bring back the ones we lost and add more to make this app worthwhile.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello. Thanks for the honest review. A good thing to remember is that there are multiple tabs with free filters. Also, if you scroll through the Editor you can find a lot of free editing options. If you have any further questions, feel free to ask at support.android@faceapp.com

scraped_reviews.content: Intuitive, unique app that allows you to do a good deal of testing out what they have to offer - without having to purchase the paid version. Easy to use, fun, but not so accurate when it comes to assuming what one will look like, or did look like, older and younger. All in all, a mildly entertaining app that caught the internet's eye for at least a week or two.

Something changed and not for the better In previous versions the app showed a retouched realistic face. Now when makeup is applied it changes the shape of the face to a babyish appearance with all of the looks. Most of the impression looks have similar problems not just the "younger." It's no longer "natural." I was on the verge of purchasing and had previously tried twice (for some reason had errors) and I am glad I didn't. Edit- it's not what filters are there, it's how they're functioning.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello! We totally understand your disappointment. We would be grateful if you could send screenshots that might illustrate the issue to our support team at support.android@faceapp.com so that we can have a look and offer some possible solutions.

scraped_reviews.content: I really enjoyed this app when it works. it has a lot of really cool features. a lot of times however it just stops loading photos. Also, I wish we could edit the pictures that are not necessary "selfies". there's a lot of things I would love to use on regular photos, like filters and Saturation/shadows adjustments. an option to "add a face" would really be awesome, I'd definitely pay the yearly fee if that was the case.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello. The only unconditionally working way to edit your photos is to select them from the Faces gallery inside the FaceApp itself. Our application will automatically detect faces while loading the gallery, so all the pictures that are left outside of it are undetected by our AI. Any questions? Contact us at support.android@faceapp.com

scraped_reviews.content: It went haywire on me... . It worked fine in the beginning, although I only used it on two photos. The results were great. However yhe options were very limited if you didn't get the pro version. After that it seems like the app was trying to take over my phone. It started jumping around my other apps, opening and closing apps, etc. I uninstalled it quickly.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello. Thanks for the honest review. A good thing to remember is that there's the Fun tab that has more than 30 free filters. Also, if you scroll through the Editor tab you can find a lot of free editing options. In case, if you have any further questions, feel free to ask at support.android@faceapp.com

scraped_reviews.content: My rating would be higher if the free features weren't all gone. I use this app sparingly, but when I need it, it's great to have. Annoying to have to watch a video to access pro features, but now even that isn't an option. Literally nothing can be done except one smile choice without having to opt into a pricey subscription. I'd rather watch the ads pay a fee for as little as I use the app. But I can't find a free alternative, so I'm SOL.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello! Thank you for your review. We have both paid and free filters in our app, hope you can enjoy our free filters if you wish. If you have any questions, please contact us at support.android@faceapp.com

scraped_reviews.content: App is great, has lots of cool tools and can do things I don't see often- if you wanna pay for it. I'm happy the devs have the ability to have it be subscription based but there wasn't even a symbol for pro on the light hair option, but I can't apply it without subbing. Props also to disallowing screenshots. Great tool if you wanna pay, I'm sure. I only needed to make one picture but now I'm leaving this review. Keep up the work devs, there will be people who are willing to subscribe but not me.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello. Thanks for the honest review. A good thing to remember is that there are multiple tabs with free filters. Also, if you scroll through the Editor tab you can find a lot of free editing options as well as in the Showcase.

scraped_reviews.content: I usually love this app, but I have one massive complaint! When using it, the app will sometimes stop letting you use it entirely. They limit your usage even if you have a payed for subscription!! I'm currently trying to edit a Facebook photo to make the hair appear less blurred and more detailed, and I have been stopped from further editing any photos. The app should not be allowed to limit the usage for paying customers! 2 stars.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: We understand your frustration with the filter usage limits. Please know that we have set the usage limits based on our technical capabilities and to prevent abuse of our service. We have included a detailed explanation of our Terms of Use to provide transparency on this matter.

scraped_reviews.content: I never will consent to a "trial" where my credit card will be charged if I don't cancel. Things happen. You can forget. This one is for only 3 days. Paid subscription is just not a good model for a smartphone app. Most of my serious editing is done on a PC. The ad thing can be annoying but at least it is a way of generating income for the app creator. Also, this is an app I would only use occasionally.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi. That's why the subscription exists as there are people using FaceApp from day to day, so it totally depends on the usage of the application. If you try it once a month, you might be able to enjoy free filters only.

scraped_reviews.content: The app was better when face-swapping was available. Wish they'd bring it back. Harder to do some makeovers now. There is a "Paint" option to paint on color, but the color selected doesn't always match the color that comes out. Easy to give someone bright green eyes or bright blue eyes, but not possible to give someone nice dark brown eyes. All the dark colors come out significantly lighter. Black comes out as a light gray. Fix this.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello, the Face Swap feature was removed as it no longer aligns with our development concept. We are sorry, but it's permanently discontinued and won't return. We encourage you to try our other features, which we hope you'll find useful and enjoyable. If there's anything else we can assist you with, please contact us at support.android@faceapp.com

scraped_reviews.content: I've tried to cancel my subscription as well but I can't find where to do that. I uninstalled it hoping that would cancel it but it didn't. You say to cancel just like every other app, but I'm telling you there is ABSOLUTELY NO CANCEL LINK ANYWHERE!!! So you need to stop resting on your laurels & go actually look for yourselves. I'm on a galaxy note 8 if that means anything. & I would like a refund of this months subscription too.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi! You can cancel your subscription the same way that you cancel any other Google Play subscription (it can be done in your Google Play account). Should you have any questions or concerns, please do not hesitate to contact us at support.android@faceapp.com

scraped_reviews.content: Great app for what it claims to do, and I've frequently purchased a month of the pro version from time to time for additional editing. HOWEVER in the last couple months I've had an issue where it says I need to wait before I can edit more, even though I haven't used the app in several days. If I'm paying for the pro version, I shouldn't be unable to use the product. I've contacted support about this but its always the same unhelpful bot response. Might be done paying for pro if this continues.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi, we are currently balancing server load and some users can experience such an issue if they edit too many photos during a short period of time. If you have any questions, please reach us via support.android@faceapp.com

scraped_reviews.content: Pros: easy to cancel subscription, has a free trial, easy to navigate, lots of fun effects, no ads, as far as I can remember. There is a feature to correct it if it gets someone's gender wrong too, in settings. Cons: They can't make up their mind about which features are pro features and which aren't, requires a good internet connection, often changes multiple faces in a picture, and crashes sometimes, but it's pretty rare so it's probably my phone's fault.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello. For such cases, there's an option in the Settings > General called "Show gender switch icon". It allows you to manually choose the filters' gender. In case, if there are any questions left, contact us at support.android@faceapp.com

scraped_reviews.content: What's a total SCAM! I've paid pro 3 times in less than a year. I've had FACEAPP pro since this app came out. I even have my emails when it was a "one time purchase" They couldn't fix it the 1st time, so I had to purchase it a 2nd time. Now, with the same phone, because the app needed an update, it's saying I no longer have pro even though they took my money in November. They are now expecting me to pay for pro for a 4th time. Avoid this scam at all costs!!!
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi! We understand your frustration and would be very grateful if you could describe the situation in details and send us an email with photos to us at support.android@faceapp.com. We will do our best to resolve the issue.

scraped_reviews.content: So this is pretty much a big scam, Hate to break it to the developers but they knew what they were doing when they didn't specify that the *Monthly Subscription* couldn't be cancelled, at least not FOR ANOTHER YEAR. I was reading through the comments because I was trying to see if someone had the same problems as me, this one guy commented he couldn't cancel his subscription, and the devolper replied with "go to the subscriptions to cancel it" problem is the subscription doesn't even show up.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Charges are done by Google Play Store. Subscription can be cancelled in your Google Play account settings. Please check that you're using the same GP account that was used for the purchase. Purchases are linked only to 1 GP account. If you've any questions or concerns, please don't hesitate to contact us at support.android@faceapp.com

scraped_reviews.content: UPDATE! NOW THEY ARE JUST REMOVING FEATURES! Restrictions on use even with PRO and now taking stuff away also!! WORST EVER!! PITA! Even with PRO, there is an arbitrary limit to how much you can do. No warning. You're going along, then all the sudden it pops up "You sent too many requests to our servers..." and you can't do anymore. No telling how long it could be you havet to wait. I'm over a day and counting now. Customer support is worthless. Good app, too bad their policies ruin it!
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello, some users can experience limits if they edit too many photos during a short period of time. If you have any questions, please reach us via support.android@faceapp.com

scraped_reviews.content: I've been using this app for a long time. And all I needed was the free basic applications. Not the pro. I got on today to edit a photo, abs everything on the app has went to PRO and I have to pay for the free basic part of the app that I dearly loved so much. I don't think it's right, and deleted it. It's not the point of paying, it's because the basics were free for years. I'll find a different app n gladly pay for it. Very disappointed ðŸ˜ž It's BS actually.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi! You never have to pay for basic filters available in Showcase and every other folder.

scraped_reviews.content: The app is alright but it does not seem to recognize faces that are not the standard. I am a man with long hair but it only recognizes me as a woman for some reason. It also has difficulty with hair that is not smooth and keeps lightening skintones. There are also too many advertisements. I am sure this app is good for european beauty standards but it does not work quite right with anything else.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi! You should go to the General settings menu and switch on the option "Show gender switch icon". If it is on, a head icon will appear in the Editor mode in the upper right corner of the screen. If you have any questions, please contact us at support.android@faceapp.com

scraped_reviews.content: I enjoy using the app, but paying for the subscription and then getting limited on how many edits I can do is annoying and something that should be stated clearly. I don't think I should be limited at all since I'm paying for the service. I would have given the app a 5 star otherwise. Even though there are a few features that are not working well such as the eraser.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Dear User, really appreciate your suggestion. We will consider it and improve our app in the new version. If you have questions or suggestions please contact us at support.android@faceapp.com.

scraped_reviews.content: 32 dollars is a lot of money for this app! (Stopped payment and unsubscribed) I really use to love this app. It would fix any AI art face. Recently y'all have taken off so many things. The app has gone downhill. The part where you could match the look of a celebrity. Not to mention the morphing and face swap was honestly the best. I'm not paying as much as I do for an app that has lost its luster and creative features. If y'all bring it back then I'll rejoin but until then....
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello! Thank you for your honest review. We will transfer your opinion to our developers to improve the application.

scraped_reviews.content: pretty good... it's a really nice app where you can do LOTS of stuff to your pics. And, it is really fun! two things, 1, I don't like that you have to pay for PRO to get everything, it should all be free but I understand that's how they get some money. so there's limits w/out PRO. 2, sometimes when I morph faces, it says there's a problem and I need to try again. it happens A LOT. that needs to be fixed. overall, it's very fun and you can do so much on it.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thanks so much for your support and feedback!

scraped_reviews.content: This app is basically useless unless you want to pay $30 a year. There are maybe two options for each section that are actually free. They used to do ads, but that's obviously not a thing anymore. And every response from them are "must be a glitch, but you can still pay ðŸ˜‰". I'll be uninstalling this, which sucks cuz I used to use it all the time.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Dear User, really appreciate your suggestion. We will consider it and improve our app in the new version. If you have questions or suggestions please contact us at support.android@faceapp.com.

scraped_reviews.content: I just don't understand why I can't make corrections to the hair color? When you use the hair color option and it misses spots, there is an option for "erase" and "paint", but you can't actually paint in the missing pieces, so some of the photos don't look right. I can erase extra tinted areas and paint it BACK ON of I went too far, but it won't allow me to paint in the parts the app missed?? This is a HUGE problem and makes an otherwise great editing app often unusable.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello! Thank you for the valuable feedback. Currently, hair color corrections can be made only by erasing the applied color and restoring it back. We are constantly working to improve our tools. We have passed your feedback to the development team.

scraped_reviews.content: I just wanted an app that would apply lipstick, and this app has many full face makeup options - but no option just to apply lipstick (I love that Zoom does that - works really great!). It only has one free makeup option, and my face actually looked worse after I applied it than before, with blue-gray shadows all around my mouth - and no apparent lipstick at all! If I could, I'd give this zero stars, but that wasn't an option.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello. It is disappointing to see that you're having an unpleasant experience with FaceApp. There's always a space to improve and it will get better with time. On our part, we shall do our best to provide the greatest experience possible. If you have any suggestions or complaints, feel free to contact us at support.android@faceapp.com

scraped_reviews.content: The only thing that made the app stand out was it's morphing/face blending ability, and they just got rid of it. Do yourself a favor and download Snow instead if you're looking for hair color, make up, and facial feature editing. Even the free version of it is more versatile and useful than this app now. If you only care about the old age filter that still works well, though.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello, the Face Swap feature was removed as it no longer aligns with our development concept. We are sorry, but it's permanently discontinued and won't return. We encourage you to try our other features, which we hope you'll find useful and enjoyable. If there's anything else we can assist you with, please contact us at support.android@faceapp.com

scraped_reviews.content: Good, but useless unless you pay- and that's why I don't recommend it. Can't use any features unless you use a "trial" subscription that is designed in the hopes you forget to cancel so they can bill you for an entire year. There are far too many other editing apps that don't act shady, so I would not bother with this one. Sadly, this could be a 5 star app if it weren't designed in such a scammy, anti-consumer way.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Sorry to hear you are unsatisfied with the progress of the updates. I hope you can enjoy our app again in the future.

scraped_reviews.content: Sorry, was thrilled to find this for Android and what a disappointment.  You offer next to nothing without paying 40 dollars.  You don't even allow for ONE free item of each type to see if it's something I would be interested in purchasing.  Not even with a watermark.  I'm not buying anything I can't see.      If I had to base it no the ONE goofball smile you  are allowing us to see or the ridiculous set of bangs.  No thanks.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi! You could always subscribe to our 3-day free trial. If you can not find it in the app, you should delete FaceApp and download it again from the Google Play store to your device. Please let us know if you have any difficulties finding your free trial offer support.android@faceapp.com

scraped_reviews.content: Amazing app so far! No ads (so far.), pretty decent amount of options for free, I'd reccomend for light editing. I use it to make Billie Eilish edits and edit pics of myself; mainly. While it's a great app, I need more filters and effects FOR FREE, such as a shaping/reshaping effect, more than 1 free makeup filter, a tattoo and peircing option, more than 3 hairstyles, and maybe hairdye? (FOR FREE, or you could watch an ad.) Bye!
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Dear User, really appreciate your suggestion. We will consider it and improve our app in the new version. If you have questions or suggestions please contact us at support.android@faceapp.com.

scraped_reviews.content: Amazing how real and accurate the hair color/hair styling tools are! Probably the best one of the photo editing apps I've tried . . . And ive tried A LOT of them! I wish they had a little more options when it comes to the makeup; as far as colors are concerned. The editing is very real looking . . . That i appreciate b/c I'm not always "ready" or feeling ready for pictures when they're taken!
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thank you so much for your elaborate review of our application! We are glad you are enjoying it and that it helps you :) We will try our best to keep up with the standards!

scraped_reviews.content: I needed a quick edit of a photo, but can't use anything since it's all for the paid version, now. I can't remember the last time I used FaceApp, as I deleted it since I was running out of room. I just reinstalled it, but seeing everything marked with a big, fat "PRO" was depressing. I can edit photos myself on my drawing app, but it just takes forever. FaceApp was LEGENDARY for quick transformations. I reckon I'll uninstall again, but I will definitely miss this app. It will be a fond memory...
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi there! Thank you for taking the time to share your genuine review. Keep in mind that there are various tabs with complimentary filters available. Moreover, exploring the Editor unveils a wide range of free editing tools at your disposal. For any further questions, please feel free to contact us at support.android@faceapp.com

scraped_reviews.content: Unless you pay for the PRO version, you can't use any features of the app. It's a shame, since before you could still use or at least try out some of the Pro impressions/make up etc. There used to be an option for some of the feauters, if you watch a short ad, to be able to at least try out the different features and save your picture. Not anymore unfortunately. The app is completely made to be used only if you pay the full version.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello, thank you for the review. It was decided that ads will not be available in the app. We are constantly working on adding more free filters to improve your editing experience. You may reach us at support.android@faceapp.com with any questions.

scraped_reviews.content: I have fun with this app with the many varieties of different ways you can dress your face or anybody for that matter. You do you have go pay for pro looks but 29.99 for a year is not bad. Update, I originally had 5 ðŸŒŸ, however, I, for some unknown reason can't access any of the Pro features I paid an entire year for. No refunds either. Sorry they say. The problem/bug is beyond my control.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello! Please contact us at support.android@faceapp.com, we can fix the problem you are facing. Thank you!

scraped_reviews.content: I love this app. It's so amazing and it works better than any other app I've tried. The gender transformation is awesome. You can add makeup, a beard, long or short hair, make your face fat or skinny. Would be great if they could add braided hair , ponytails, pulled up air in general. Maybe even some slicked back hair and punk hair styles. It's a great app.

I used to love this app! It was so great and had so many choices, with NO ADD POP UPS!! Now, you can't use the app unless you watch an add first!! And, that's every single damn time! What used to take a couple minutes, now takes forever cause of the f****** pop up add! I'm livid over this! You add constant pops up adds just to make more money getting people to buy the no pop add version!!! That freaking greedy! I give you 2 weeks! If it doesn't change, I'm deleting this app! So will my friends!
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello. Thanks for the honest review. A good thing to remember is that there's the Fun tab that has more than 30 free filters. Also, if you scroll through the Editor tab you can find a lot of free editing options. You can also watch ads instead of paying. In case, if you have any further questions, feel free to ask at support.android@faceapp.com

scraped_reviews.content: This app is pretty awesome! I really enjoy using it, and I even went pro. However, thereâ€™s certainly room for improvement. It could use some more options! Especially for the pro version. Which, by the way, is a little pricy. My biggest critique is that the filter where you go from female to male reeeeallly needs updating. It looks extremely awful.

Garbage. Nothing but pop-up ads literally every few seconds and when I was finally able to try it, I was only given an option to add a wig. This is the dumbest app and the worst responding app I've ever used. I rec'd the, "not responding" message three times in under 5 min. The only apps I ever deleted faster, were the ones I downloaded for a reward.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello. Thanks for the honest review. A good thing to remember is that there are multiple tabs with free filters. Also, if you scroll through the Editor tab you can find a lot of free editing options as well as in the Showcase.

scraped_reviews.content: I continuously send emails to the developer but have received no replies to my issue. I purchased a monthly subscription to pro and it suddenly stopped working. So I attempted a yearly subscription and pro is still not working anymore. I keep getting a message saying "error your order is processing, your item will be available in a few minutes" but it isnt. It was working a few weeks ago, but not anymore. I love the app. When it works it's great and the filters look great! This bug needs fixing.

First it says that it's completely FREE to use. Then after it's downloaded, you get a choice of $8/mo, or $40/year to use this app!!! I uninstalled it immediately because I'm tired of being lied to. Don't say it's FREE to use, then try to charge for using it!! IT'S ONLY FREE FOR 7 DAYS, then you're forced to pay for it!!
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi there! Please note that our app is available for free and offers a variety of features such as "Makeup," "Dimples," "Freckles," and more at no cost. Plus, our dedicated team is always working on new features to ensure they are both useful and enjoyable for you. Thank you!

title: Capital One Shopping
description:
Capital One Shopping helps you save money while you shop online.

Free for everyone - no Capital One account required

With Capital One Shopping:
- Find deals and savings from stores you love
- Earn Rewards and redeem for gift cards
- Easily find and apply available coupon codes
- Enable Accessibility Service API and get free rewards offers in Chrome

It does the work for you -- it's kinda genius.

In the last year alone, Capital One Shopping found over $160 million in savings.

Capital One Shopping is just another way Capital One is looking out for you and your money.
descriptionHTML:
Capital One Shopping helps you save money while you shop online.

Free for everyone - no Capital One account required

With Capital One Shopping:
- Find deals and savings from stores you love
- Earn Rewards and redeem for gift cards
- Easily find and apply available coupon codes
- Enable Accessibility Service API and get free rewards offers in Chrome

It does the work for you -- it's kinda genius.

In the last year alone, Capital One Shopping found over $160 million in savings.

Capital One Shopping is just another way Capital One is looking out for you and your money.
summary: Access free, exclusive savings on the go thanks to Capital One Shopping!

scraped_reviews.content: Overall disappointing. Good app to get a coupon code for a site you may be visiting. Getting Rewards $$ has been less than acceptable. Only get about half of my purchases recorded or credited. Definitely doing correct- the trip gets reported at the time but don't get credit or rewards as promised most of the time. When I do it actually takes months for it to be applied. Very disappointed. Feels almost like a scam to get CO credit and never get the rewards when using my actual CO card. ðŸ‘Ž

Your program is crashing the site I'm trying to buy from. Tried it on phone and computer - didn't work. Tried in a different browser, it worked. It worked fine yesterday when I was on the app, so I don't understand why it's a problem now. Now I either have to wait for it to resolve itself and lose the coupon that ends today or buy through a normal browser and lose the cashback. Thanks a lot.

When Capital One shopping rewards works correct it's a fantastic shopping tool to get great rewards. Too many times the shopping trip goes unrewarded and I have had to make sure I take screenshots of every part of the process to submit them to get the rewards monies. It always takes several emails to get anywhere because they respond generically to the first one. There is no phone number to call. many times the rewards should be over $100 and it really makes a difference deciding to purchase.

I'm writing this review as a warning to others: avoid Capital One Shopping at all costs! After being a loyal customer for over 5 years, I was shocked to discover that my account was terminated without any notice. To make matters worse, I was not given the opportunity to redeem my hard-earned rewards. If you have an account, be awre not to keep much rewards left in your account.

Deceptive: Leads you to lower prices, lowered because they offer money back at certain sellers. I followed their lead and purchased an item from a seller where I would not typically shop. After the purchase, Capital One Shopping lists the purchase as not qualified for the $ back that led me to this item. They led me away from 2 sellers that had considerably better prices on the same item, even without a rebate or false promises.

do not use this! they bait and switch. I followed one of their coupons and followed the process. my rewards were pending credit to my account. a few days later they terminated my account stating I violated their terms. it is a complete lie with no proof. no phone number to call, just a generic email. extremely disappointed this company is ruining what was otherwise a good experience with capital one.

Im okay with the solicitation. Sometimes, I find something I really want. The web browser part is almost useless. constantly, i am promised a significant savings. All i have to do is leave my current web page and see. but 99 out of 100, it is a waste. It's either expired, not the same product or justme Stop look ovet here. We can save you money. Come look. so I look, but 99 out of 100, it is expired, not the same product or just plain wrong.

Rewards seem to rarely be given, I've waited months and not seen anything. My biggest dislike is that it doesn't show a product even at all the big chain stores. It's an impressive app either way. Should integrate a function for the user to indicate the product is found at other stores (i.e. Best Buy, Target, "Other"). I typically use this app as a starting point for product and then search other stores. Have found cheaper options many times on my own search.

Not sure how they can claim they save you money, on more than one occasion I've compared prices between this app, and the actual site/app I would normally shop from i.e. Amazon (as an example) and the price is exactly the same, often times I can get "coupons" directly through Amazon without having to use this app! Just seems like an unnecessary layer. Probably to track your purchases and record your spending behavior.

Limiting, deceiving and a theif. There MANY exclusions and included products are limited. Also is confusing to understand what is included. pulls you in to make you think you are getting a good deal. I ordered through macy's and didn't receive any rewards. I guess what i ordered was excluded even though it wasn't listed as an exclusion. If it was, it was NOT clearly defined. The only reason I bought it from Macys was for the 10% reward. Now I have to go through the trouble of canceling. It .
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi, we're sorry to hear that and we would love to take a look at the issue. Please reach out to our customer support team at help@capitaloneshopping.com.

scraped_reviews.content: So, first of all: I have not received probably a third of the rewards I'm owed by this deal. I get the notifications and emails that it's coming. It shows pending since over 2 mo ago. But when I open another link in the app, it only shows 2 rewards pending - not the 5 or more I've been waiting on! If Cap One doesn't want to pay a $20 reward then STOP OFFERING THEM! Secondly: as to the claims of savings & 'we'll check everything for you' - WRONG! They miss a lot!! Don't just rely on them!

The app saved me $15 on my first shopping attempt. The sign-in process is too cumbersome though, too many steps and marketing "noise" before you can just get to what you want to do, which is look for discounts on what you want to put purchase. Also, when you finally get to a merchant's website to purchase, program says it will automatically check available coupon codes for you at checkout. It didn't. I had to try each one myself, though one finally did work.

I tried shopping with the app and never had any luck. It certainly does not scan the internet for prices. Most of the time it can't even find what I'm shopping for and I'm looking right at it so I know it's on the internet, so start scanning! Advertising says it works in the background while you shop, searching for better prices; that's never happened. Cannot believe Capital One wants their name on this.

I have tried to use this several times, the link it sends me is broken and the deal wasn't that good anyways. I have used this in the past to buy Hotels, should have gotten a reward of $80 based on advertised, but it never applied correctly and I got nothing. this is too hard to use. you are scamming customers. Plus I get "reminders" every time I log on app about Shopping feature that doesn't even work!

It is slower then most apps. The rewards take too long to arrive, it doesn't even post your award pending until after the item ships, them it sits pending for months before you can get them. They stated they will watch for a lower price after your purchase and refund the difference if it does within 30 days of purchase, well thats a lie and you contact customer support and they blame the store you purchased it from. That's a scam you can't advertise you will do something and then not do it.

Sorry to say, the concept is brilliant, but the app is worthless. I did a search on diet colas, for instance, and the results showed products three or four times the going prices for these products. I then did a search for fire pits and I had already found many of the best prices online. Kind of insults my intelligence and makes me wonder how many people buy into the information provided and make ridiculous purchases.

I'm very disappointed with this app. I've had multiple purchases now that don't show up because the app does not keep you signed in. It also will not keep you signed in with the retailers. It's very frustrating! I wouldn't mess with it unless you don't mind.. For instance opening the app (which isn't fast) making sure you are logged in and then going to the retailer and logging in there again. All for a possible savings that isn't guaranteed. Good luck everyone!!

It was good now its not. I started using this about a year and a half ago. It was great. It gave credit for all purchases. After a few months it started to go bad. I had to email their customer service every time i used the app. I had to send receipts to prove what i bought. I still have 3 or 4 hotel rewards still listed as "pending". I went to these hotels about 7 months ago. I tried to redeem points but that too didnt work right. The app is a wonderful idea, it simply fails too much

I'm torn on this app. I've located coupon codes that I couldn't find otherwise and I've made a decent amount on cash back for gift cards. Having said that, he app is laggy, slow, and I've had to deal with the app not recording purchases. I've had to reach out to customer service several times regarding this issue. It may not seem like a big deal, but after going back and forth several times through email it makes it more trouble than it's worth. Good concept but, the app needs to be fixed.

This app is a waste. It's supposed to find the best deals and apply coupons the user wouldn't otherwise find. It always recommends Amazon and compares Amazon price to eBay. The "coupon" it applies is literally the coupon you get by clicking the checkbox above the "add to cart" button. I pay the same price through the capital one app as I do the Amazon app, and half the time I find the item cheaper elsewhere by searching on my own. Don't bother. Do your own research, you'll be better off.

Great concept but I find it's more trouble than it's worth at this point. Using this app can feel like a chore. It often doesn't record purchases so you have to get customer service to manually issue the funds to your account, which can take up to 30 days. Also, the mobile app and desktop extension often issue different amounts of cash back for the same site on the same day, so you might have to toggle between them to get the best deal.

Installed and used this app to look for the best price on something that was a little out of my budget at the moment but I really needed. The app automatically attempts every coupon available until the valid one with the highest discount is applied. This is a great time saver instead of having to search online. I ended up getting a $400 item for $279. So far so good, no glitches or issues with the app performance and no battery drain.

An app no one asked for. Signing in was a minutes long pain in the butt, confirming confirmations over and over. Once signed in, it's difficult to find any vendors I actually want to buy from. If you do find one, it's confusing which method to go about buying your thing in order to get credit through this app. There's no way to confirm it actually worked. And the prize is half of one percent of your purchase returned as a credit 3 months from now, if it worked, maybe. Then it logs you back out.

Good overall, but the app needs a bit of work in the area of recorded purchases. There seems to be a glitch where it doesn't credit properly- I'll get an email stating that a credit has been issued and is ready to use, only to find that it was never added to my balance. I then have to reach out for help. The discount code feature works really well- I've found tons of discounts that I wouldn't have gotten otherwise.

I haven't had any issues like other users getting my reward points. My issue is when you cash in your points for gift cards, the selection of stores is extremely limited, unless you shop at Macy's or Bass Pro Shop. There's only about 20 stores/restaurants you can get gifts cards for and every one is pretty useless. Get more stores on board with your reward redemption program and the app will be 10x's better!

It's a good way to save money if you don't know how to Google an item and find a cheaper price. Choosing between spending 900$ for a laptop through the app or 700$ through bestbuy was my determining factor. It's strange that the app didn't think to compare bestbuys prices in it's list of choices. All and all not a bad concept just needs a more updated selection to save the most money possible.

Disappointed..wanted to give it a 5 star. When you log in any account via order to get points, it gets glitchy sometimes. I couldn't use Fandango, it gave me an error checking out tickets, and my bank account has pending charges even though transaction hasn't gone thru. I know it'll go away because its pending, but the point still stands. CapitalOne needs to coordinate better with all these vendors they work with to have a more user-friendly exp. I also have other rewards pending for 2 monthsðŸ™„

Its very useful if your looking for deals and want cash back on your purchases. You don't have to have a credit card from Capital One in order to use the app. It also goes thru a list of discount codes looking to find you the best price for whatever item your buying. Then you can use the cash back you earned to purchase gift cards from different retailers. This app sometimes offer way more than the Rakuten App.

To test this app we searched for items we purchased on Amazon. This app did not come up with a single item on amazon. Everything it did come up with was a LOT more expensive than what we paid on amazon. It comes up with ebay which isn't a reputable seller in my opinion. For all the info, emails, browser usage and credit cards they want to monitor... the app is a joke. It's legal spying and gathering tons of info in my opinion. Don't waste time downloading!
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi, we're sorry to hear that and we would love to take a look at the issue. Please reach out to our customer support team at help@capitaloneshopping.com.

scraped_reviews.content: This seems like an okay app for online shopping, but it's like most where you have to shop through their app and wait and hope you actually get the savings at some point. That said Capital One will give about anyone a CC with a decent credit limit, but then their interest rates are some of the worst. At one point I had an 800 credit score and Capital One was still wanted to charge me 28% interest, lol.

I will never use CapitalOne shopping again. First, they mislead you into believing you're receiving "Cash back" on purchases when in reality, there's no "cash" back. There's "rewards" that can't even be deposited into your PayPal account. Just a slim handful of GIFT CARD options to random stores. And on top of that, they HOLD ALL rewards in a "pending" status for 3-4 months. I'm told my non-refundable hotel purchases are being held in case they're refunded or amended?! They're NON-REFUNDABLE!!!!

I've made purchases through both this app and the browser extension, but no pending rewards have shown up. It's a hassle to use the app to do shopping, since it opens an in-app browser even when I have that store's mobile app installed. Additionally, the app won't let me sign in with a Capital One account. It also signs me out periodically when I'm signed in through the "email link".

DO NOT USE THE PERSONALIZED DEALS. You will never be credited with it . Doesn't work most of the time. You have to wait a month a file missing rewards. Ridiculous. Update: customer service doesn't seem to understand when the deal doesn't track properly and you're not going to get paid unless you bother them and say hey. I ordered this and give them their details etc. It is infuriating using the app only for it to not work properly. To be told by customer service to just wait.

After getting 10 emails from Capital One to get this app I've tried 10 times and every time it says there's a problem. Everytime I have to change my password. Will NOT do it again! I have two credit cards with them and everything is just fine with that. They even have great customer service, but trying to get into this shopping app is just stupid and annoying.

Honestly, I don't see the purpose of this app. I had searched for a turtle beach 700 xbox one gaming headset. It told me I could buy it from a site and save $9. I select to view other offers. This app displayed the wrong pricing for various websites like Amazon, and Walmart. This app is useless. You are simply better off checking the individual sites for proper information.

Great way to boost your credit! We were able to buy a home after applying for a capital one credit card and paying our credit card on time for about 6 months. I couldn't believe how much both of our credit scores improved. We started in the low 400's and went to 640-650 in about 6 months. Also, a secure credit card helped our credit score so much until we could be approved for this credit card. (Quick Silver Cap 1)

On my phone, it doesn't work as an add on to chrome, it's just another platform to shop on and the supposed rewards are additional discounts for future shopping, not better prices. On my laptop, however, I do have the cap one add on and it does check prices and give coupon codes automatically. Just doesn't work that way on the phone.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi, please share the details of your issue at help@capitaloneshopping.com so that we can look into it & assist you in the best possible way.

scraped_reviews.content: This app is NOT a keeper! Just another drain on your battery. Just shop on Amazon for the best deals. Sometimes a local store has a better price but you have to leave home spending $$$ gas. And when was the last time you left a store with only what you had on your shopping list? Impulse merchandise is a huge add-on for grocery stores (I used to be a department manager). With Capital One's Visa card you already get a rebate on Amazon...it's fun to order something & you only pay .43cents

I was hoping this would be good, but it's very disappointing!!! It take a long time for your reward to apply to your account! Then, you can only use your rewards for gift cards!! No option to cash out to PayPal or your bank account!!! Other similar apps let you deposit the cash back to your account or PayPal! Lastly, they verify your email like other apps, but then ask for a credit card to verify you!!! Unacceptable!!!!! Stay away from this one! There are much better apps similar paying cash!!!

Wow.. don't even know where to start, I typed in First Lite (a hunting apparel brand) and it returned video games, fire alarms and something about imploding kittens. Effectively anything that contained the word first or lite. This search engine is poorly engineered, and doesn't even allow for basic Boolean searches (which shouldn't be expected of a user, but I tried anyways). Seems like an awesome idea, but may have been rolled out a bit too soon.

The app is well managed no doubt, for a multi billion dollar company I'd expect that. It makes it easy to control funds and I've never encountered a a glitch. What I do NOT like is it shoving checking account, credit cards and savings account applications down my throat everday. Not too mention reeling me in with a savings account API that went to just about zero after 24 hours. Congratulations on a near perfect app but shame on you for customer service.

Due to the massive ineptitude of the devs, you can't link cards, because buttons to confirm are off screen and you can't scroll to click. Or they show you a set of captcha images, but only the bottom 6 of the 9, and not the instructions at the top. Also any items you add to the watchlist are *only* watched on that one site, no others. You also don't get notified if the price changes. Any 'local' deals are 99% Burger King "offers". Completely Useless Garbage App.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Oh no! We sincerely apologize for the troubles you've had with the app. We'd be happy to take a look into this for you, please contact us at help@capitaloneshopping.com. Thank you.

Horrible Experience - It used to be great but now every time I go to the rewards section, it asks for login info. I ever password, it then sends me to Captcha, then goes to another login page. Prices are not accurate. This app supposedly compares prices against the Amazon price. For instance, say that your looking for an umbrella. This app lists the Amazon price and then compares that price to a half dozen other stores. I looked up 6 different items (art supplies) and this app listed each item on average about $20 more than the true Amazon price.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi, can you please contact us at help@capitaloneshopping.com and we will gladly help you in resolving the issue.

scraped_reviews.content: Unlike Rakuten, Capital One Shopping does not have a way to submit missing rewards, or talk to support in any way. Make a purchase but don't see the rewards populate? It seems you're out of luck with Capital One Shopping. Technology can be messy sometimes. These shopping rewards usually depend on things like direct browser links, cookies, emails, etc. Sometimes things go haywire. With out a way to submit previous claims or contact support you're going to lose your money. Also the search sucks.

This keeps getting deleted from my browser. I agree with many other reviews that it's a good idea, it just needs more work to get everything going. I don't know how the rating is 4.7 because I've seen more negative reviews than positive. Someone mentioned they keep getting sent to Amazon. Does Amazon have the market cornered for sites that send us to Amazon. There's no way Amazon is always the cheapest.

Uninstalled! I was so excited to use this app! When trying to sign up, I keep getting an error saying some of the "reCaptcha" images were missing. Ummmm NO! I have tried and tried, still the same message even though all requested images were selected! UGH!! And it doesn't help at all that the images are super small and half of them are blurry as heck!! So incredibly irritated!

I am a Capital One card member and I received an email for a promotional $10. I downloaded the app, and looked around for my $10 reward, which never came. I went back and read the fine print and realized that this is for new customers only. I had thought they had sent me the promo offer BECAUSE I was a loyal customer! They shouldn't send this promo offer to existing customers if we are ineligible! Disappointing. I will be uninstalling this right away.

title: Google Classroom
description:
Classroom makes it easy for learners and instructors to connectâ€”inside and outside of schools. Classroom saves time and paper, and makes it easy to create classes, distribute assignments, communicate, and stay organized.

There are many benefits to using Classroom:
â€¢ Easy to set up â€“ Teachers can add students directly or share a code with their class to join. It takes just minutes to set up.
â€¢ Saves time â€“ The simple, paperless assignment workflow allows teachers to create, review and mark assignments quickly, all in one place.
â€¢ Improves organization â€“ Students can see all of their assignments on an assignments page, and all class materials (e.g., documents, photos, and videos) are automatically filed into folders in Google Drive.
â€¢ Enhances communication â€“ Classroom allows teachers to send announcements and start class discussions instantly. Students can share resources with each other or provide answers to questions on the stream.
â€¢ Secure â€“ Like the rest of Google Workspace for Education services, Classroom contains no ads, never uses your content or student data for advertising purposes.


Permissions Notice:
Camera: Needed to allow the user to take photos or videos and post them to Classroom.
Storage: Needed to allow the user to attach photos, videos, and local files to Classroom. It's also needed to enable offline support.
Accounts: Needed to allow the user to choose which account to use in Classroom.
descriptionHTML:
Classroom makes it easy for learners and instructors to connectâ€”inside and outside of schools. Classroom saves time and paper, and makes it easy to create classes, distribute assignments, communicate, and stay organized.

There are many benefits to using Classroom:
â€¢ Easy to set up â€“ Teachers can add students directly or share a code with their class to join. It takes just minutes to set up.
â€¢ Saves time â€“ The simple, paperless assignment workflow allows teachers to create, review and mark assignments quickly, all in one place.
â€¢ Improves organization â€“ Students can see all of their assignments on an assignments page, and all class materials (e.g., documents, photos, and videos) are automatically filed into folders in Google Drive.
â€¢ Enhances communication â€“ Classroom allows teachers to send announcements and start class discussions instantly. Students can share resources with each other or provide answers to questions on the stream.
â€¢ Secure â€“ Like the rest of Google Workspace for Education services, Classroom contains no ads, never uses your content or student data for advertising purposes.


Permissions Notice:
Camera: Needed to allow the user to take photos or videos and post them to Classroom.
Storage: Needed to allow the user to attach photos, videos, and local files to Classroom. It's also needed to enable offline support.
Accounts: Needed to allow the user to choose which account to use in Classroom.
summary: Connect with your classes and do assignments on the go.

scraped_reviews.content: It's a decent app when it works. The biggest problem is have is when it randomly decides to not open. all it shows is a blank dark screen or a screen with the logo. The web version on computer works just fine but the mobile app needs some work. Uninstalled and reinstalled to get it to work. I've done that on 3 separate occasions in the 2 - 3 weeks I've needed to use the mobile version.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Clayton. In that case, if it continues to occur after following the recommended steps, we suggest visiting our Help Center: https://goo.gle/2W67AQL or visit our Community Forum here: https://goo.gle/3wY3447. Thanks.

scraped_reviews.content: It's good for school and stuff like that. But I feel like what would make it better is being able to pin classworks. For example: if you're trying to find a revision work that a teacher sets up but there are 35+ classworks uploaded, then it would waste time for the person to revise. But if we were able to pin classworks then it would be easier to find the work instead of going through so many of them.

Every time I open the app on my phone, it freezes. When I'm on the computer, it doesn't freeze, but almost every time on my phone, it freezes. This only started happening recently, but it means I can't access my classwork while on the move. It doesn't even say anything wrong with my page it just stays on the icon screen, and then even when I get off and on the app multiple times, it doesn't work. scraped_reviews.content: After the latest update, the app won't launch, even after a reinstall. It used to give me mobile access to my courses, but even when it worked, the interface was difficult to use. Text was poorly formatted, buttons overlapped, features didn't work or were absent, and updates from instructors or classmates were delayed for hours or sometimes days before notification, if I ever got a notification. Needs a LOT of work and proper testing before release.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi, Jonathan. Thank you for taking the time to provide feedback. We're sorry to hear that. We ask that you submit a feedback within the Classroom app by clicking the Menu button then Send Google feedback. Thank you!

title: WeatherBug: Weather Forecast
description:
Get reliable weather forecasts with WeatherBug! With over 20 map layers, including Radar and Severe Storm Risk, WeatherBug provides comprehensive weather insights to help keep you safe. From real-time lightning to real-time precipitation, WeatherBug ensures you are always informed. Stay updated with customizable weather alerts, hourly and 10-day Forecasts, and Hurricane Outlooks.

Trusted since 2000, WeatherBug ensures you're always prepared with reliable weather data. Join millions of users and Know BeforeÂ® severe weather strikes with one of the most comprehensive Weather Apps in the Industry. 


THE WEATHERBUG ADVANTAGE
â€¢ Sparkâ„¢ Lightning with real-time lightning alerts near you
â€¢ Outdoor Sports Section with Disney Weather Checkâ€™s world-class weather safety standards
â€¢ Air You Breathe Section with Air quality information, including top allergy triggers around you
â€¢ Hurricane Tracker with a 7-day storm forecast and Outlook for the Tropics
â€¢ Extensive weather observation networks and unique severe weather detection
â€¢ Over 20 Weather Radar map Layers with rain, temperature, and storm radar views
â€¢ Ad-Free Subscription Options Available!
 
WEATHER ALERTS
â€¢ Get Severe Weather Alerts from WeatherBug, NWS & NOAA (USA), NMS (UK and DE), and SMN (MX)
â€¢ Weather Notifications: Receive live alerts and forecast updates for your preferred locations
â€¢ Manage Alerts according to your location and preferences:

1. Weather Alerts: Get notified when severe weather alerts have been issued
2. Lightning: Get notified when lightning strikes close to your location and track live lightning updates
3. Real-Time Precipitation: Get notified when rain or snow is expected within 15 min.
4. Daily Precipitation: Get notified when rain or snow is expected in the next 24 hours
5. Severe Storm Risk: Get notified when there is an increased risk of storms.
6. Pollen: Get notified when pollen levels are medium or high
7. Air Quality: Get notified when the air quality index is low 
8. Hurricane Tracker: Get informed about hurricane activity and warnings 
9. Trending News: Get notified about current news, user videos, safety tips, and more!

AIR QUALITY, HEAT, WILDFIRES
â€¢ Get Track UV Index information, wind speeds, live weather observations, and forecast data
â€¢ Global wildfire data to know when you are at risk
â€¢ Air quality with an in-depth look at the air quality around you
â€¢ Pollen count:  Locally and nationally 
 
WEATHER CUSTOMIZATION
â€¢ Weather Widgets: Add local weather information to your home screen 
â€¢ Temperature Units:  Fahrenheit (Â°F) and Celsius (Â°C)
â€¢ Wind Units: MPH, KPH, Knots & MPS
â€¢ Pressure Units: Inches & millibars
 
RADAR WEATHER MAPS
â€¢ Weather Forecast Map: Track local weather conditions, temperature, pollen levels & and more with Doppler radar & and interactive maps
â€¢ Severe Storm Risk: Know when convective weather is expected to hit. Storm radar shows severe storms, tornados, hail, high winds live


CONNECT WITH US  
â€¢ Facebook: @WeatherBug
â€¢ Instagram: @weatherbug
â€¢ TikTok: @officialweatherbug

 
This app may include "Interest-Based Ads" (https://www.weatherbug.com/legal/privacy) for more information) and may collect or share "Precise Location Data" (https://www.weatherbug.com/legal/privacy for more information)

scraped_reviews.content: In general I like the app. It seems fairly accurate, as far as weather prediction can be. My problem that every few days, it won't reload/ update information, even when I pull down to refresh. Sometimes I end up restarting my phone, just to get the app working again. It's not my phone, since other apps are able to refresh. Anyone have any suggestions?

Consistently wrong. Always 5 to 10 degrees warmer or cooler than what is forecast in the 5 cities I have saved. The radar maps are good. to many ads to make it worth having on my phone. Very limited settings for the details I need. The widget is useless now. Use to keep up daily. The update button on it doesn't work either. It used to be really good before you had to subscribe. Get it together, Weather Bug.

Have used Weatherbug for years, since G1 and launch of market. Have tried other weather apps, always remove pre-installed weather apps on new phones for Weatherbug. Love the alerts, radar and spark. Love the ability to have multiple locations saved that I travel to so I can ck ahead with a swipe. update: getting worse all the time. Tonight it is completely frozen during a nor-easter and all I'm getting is a blank blue screen. wth. This used to be a 5 star alp.
scraped_reviews.replyContent:
Dear User,
Weâ€™re sorry the app froze during the norâ€™easterâ€”thatâ€™s especially frustrating, and we appreciate your years with WeatherBug. Please reinstall, try another network or disable VPN, and confirm date/time are automatic and OS is up to date. If it persists, email support@weatherbug.com
with device info/screenshots so we can investigate.

We can see how close the lightening is, and when it will pass us. So we know if we should wait or if we should go home!!! Also always spot on with the forecast! UPDATE 2025- wish the app had a notification option for your location only and yiu could turn off getting alerts for other locations as needed. I don't need alerts for all my locations all the time.

I like the features on the app because of the work I do. The problem is in the morning when I look at it, the ads will show up and sometimes the 10 day forecast will show and nothing else. It might start working in 5 minutes sometimes a lot longer. This happens so frequently that my phone sends alerts saying the weathering apps crashes frequently and wants to put it in a deep sleep. I wish this issue could get fixed.

Could you please try clearing the app cache, deleting the app, rebooting your device, and reinstalling the app to see if that resolves the issue? If the issue persists, please share a screen recording with us at Weatherbug.android@gmail.com for further investigation. Thank you kindly! -WeatherBug Team

scraped_reviews.content: Sometimes map does not work. I walk five miles at five thirty every morning, at least twice a month the hour function is not updated at that time. Also the hourly changes frequently, which makes the forecast unreliable.

Very capable, no doubt about it. But, for me, perhaps TMI. I don't need or want a weather app on my phone to be this big, providing information I will never use.
